icCuH kAmayituM tvaM mAm ityasO jagade tayA ..’ Ba. kA. 5-59.

(I-BvAdiH-857. saka. sew. para.) jvalAdiH .

sarvARi rUpARi kucaGAtuvat (200) jYeyAni .
A. ‘sehe ca rAmAjanaKelanaM yA kucorusIdatpariSadrutoyA .
kroSErjanAH kocagalAn marAlAn boDanti yatrAmburuhAM vikAse ..’ DA. kA. 2. 24.

‘saNkoce kucatIti syAt, kocet samparcanAdizu .’ (Slo-54) iti devaH .
kocakaH-cikA, 2 kucitA-trI, 3 kucan B -ntI-tI, kucizyan-ntI-tI,
kuk-kucO-kucaH, kucitam-taH-tavAn, kucitavyam, kucanIyam, kucyam, [Page0197+ 25]

kucaDAtuvadrUpARi jYeyAni .

zvapi jYeyam .

(1-2-4) iti NidvadBAvAnna guRaH .

dBirjanAn . suDAcCuritavisPuwasmitarucEva DEryaM muwan Danustruwanato manAk pratuwa-
nAya SAlAmagAt ..’ DA. kA. 2-80.
1. ‘nizWAmAmaniwa iti vaktavyam’ (vA. 7-3-52) iti vacanAt, asya nizWAyAM
sewtvAt ‘cajoH—’ (7-3-52) iti kutvaM na Bavati .

iq Bavati—iti prakriyAsarvasve .

kASyapaH . ‘sam’ ityupasargapUrvakAt kucaDAtoreva kuwAditve'pi guRaH, anyatra
na—iti kecit . tezAM mate ‘kucanam’ ityeva . nirupasfzwAdapi guRa
eva ityanye . tanmate ‘kocanam’ iti Bavati .

vipratizeDena ‘gANkuwAdiByaH—’ (1-2-1) iti vihitaM nityaNittvameva Bavati .
ata eva, ‘anudAttaNita Atmanepadam’ (1-3-12) ityatra ‘upadeSe’ ityasya
NidaMSe'nvayasya sArTakyaM Bavati .

iditkaraRAt Rico vEkalpikatvam . prAyeRAyaM ‘ava’ pUrvakaH . A ava-

saYcukuRWayizya, cukuRWayizam 2, cukuRWayizitvA 2. iti viSezaH .

(236) “kusma kutsitasmayane” (X-curAdiH-1712. aka. sew. Atma.)
AkusmIyaH .
1 kusmakaH-smikA, cukusmayizakaH-zikA;
kusmayitA-trI, cukusmayizitA-trI; 2 kusmayamAnaH A, 3 cukusmayizamARaH;
kusmayizyamARaH, cukusmayizizyamARaH; 4 kuH-kusmO-kusmaH; -- 5 kusmitam-taH-tavAn, cukusmayizitaH-tavAn;
kusmaH, 6 kusmanaH, cukusmayizuH;
kusmayitavyam, cukusmayizitavyam;
kusmanIyam, cukusmayizaRIyam;
kusmyam, cukusmayizyam;
IzatkusmaH-duzkusmaH-sukusmaH; --
kusmyamAnaH, cukusmayizyamARaH; [Page0226+ 29]
kusmaH, cukusmayizaH;
kusmayitum, cukusmayizitum;
kusmanA, cukusmayizA;
kusmanam, cukusmayizaRam;
kusmayitvA, cukusmayizitvA;
prakusmya, pracukusmayizya;
kusmam 2, kusmayitvA 2, cukusmayizam 2; cukusmayizitvA 2.
‘kusma nAmno vA’ (gaRasUtraM curAdO) iti paWyate . ‘— ‘kusma’
iti DAtuH kutsitasmaye vartate .’ iti durgamEtreyO . tadanusAreRa RyantAt,
RyantaprakftikasannantAcca sarvARi rUpARi pradarSitAni . gaRasUtrasya evamarTA-
Byupagame ‘nAmnaH’ ityasya vEyarTyamApatati . tadarTaM— “aTa vA, ‘kusma’
iti prAtipadikAt DAtvarTe RijBavati .” iti bahuBirvyAKyAtam . tatra pakze
RicaH prAtipadikaprakftikatvena, ArDaDAtukatvaM nAsti . ataH ‘ato lopaH’
(6-4-48) iti lopo na Bavati . kintu— ‘prAtipadikAd DAtvarTe
bahulamizWavacca’ (gaRasUtraM curAdO) iti izWavadBAvAtideSena prAtipadikAntyasya
akArasya lopo vaktavyaH . evaM sati, kusmakaH-smikA, cukusmayizakaH-
zikA, ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi purastAt liKitadiSA jYeyAni .
arTaBedaH paramuBayorvidyate— ‘kusma’ DAtoH kutsitasmayanamAtrasya pratItiH .
prAtipadikaprakftikaRyantasya tu kutsitasmayanakarmakakaraRapratItiH— iti
viSezaH . na cEvaM sati ‘prAtipadikAd DAtvarTe bahulamizWavacca’ (ga. sU
curAdO) ityeva Rici sidDe sati, atra pAWasya vEyarTyamASaNkyam . ‘prAti-
padikAd DAtvarTe—’ (ga. sU. curAdO) iti RijutpattO padadvayaM syAt . atra
pAWAt tu AkusmIyatvena Atmanepadameveti viSezaH .
1. ‘Reraniwi’ (6-4-51) iti RilopaH .
2. ‘AkusmAdAtmanepadinaH’ (gaRasUtraM curAdO) iti Atmanepadameva .
A. ‘ityAdi vAdyaSatadevanamaDya eva lokaH samAlapadagAritakfzRavIryaH .
kaMsastvavedayamatirBayamAnito'pi niryAvanaH kuyuDi kusmayamAna Asta ..’ DA. kA. 3-37.
3. ‘pUrvavat sanaH’ (1-3-62) iti Atmanepadam .
4. Rilope makArasya saMyogAntalope, sakArasya rutve, ‘rvorupaDAyAH’ — (8-2-76)
iti dIrGe visarge ca rUpam . prAtipadikARRijutpattO tu RilopawilopayoH satoH
makArasya saMyogAntalopaH, dIrGavisargO ca .
5. ‘nizWAyAM sewi’ (6-4-52) iti RilopaH .
6. ‘anudAttetaSca halAdeH (3-2-149) iti yuc tAcCIlikaH .

anyAni sarvARyapi rUpARi pUrvaliKita (240) cOrAdikakUwayativajjYeyAni .
saMkUwinaM vartate . samanatAd dAha ityarTaH . ‘aBiviDO BAva inuR’
(3-3-44) iti inuRi, inuRantAt ‘aR inuRaH’ (5-4-15) iti aR
tadDitapratyayaH . AdivfdDiH . ‘saNkUwanam ityapi lyuwA samAveSa izyate,
‘BAve’ iti vartamAne punarBAvagrahaRAt .’ iti BAzyam . inuRantaH svaBAvAt
napuMsake vartate iti kASikA .

Urjanam = balanam prARanaM vA . curAdizu paWitasya CadaDAtorADfzIyatvena
RijvikalpanAt svArTe RijaBAvapakze mittvArTo'yamanuvAdaH . DAtUnAmanekArTatvA-
dUrjane vfttiH . CadantaM prayuNkte Cadayati = balavantaM prARavantaM vA karotItyarTaH .
yadA tu CAdayatIti svArTe RyantaH, tadA balIBavati, prARIBavati, apavArayatIti
vA'rTaH . tadA, ‘nAnye mito'hetO’ (ga. sU. curAdO) iti vacanAt mittvaM na .
‘Cadirarjane’ iti kutracid dfzwaH pAWo na sAmpradAyikaH . ‘Ceda apavAraRe’
iti curAdAvevottaratra vidyamAnasya DAtorapi ‘Cada’ ityeva kzIrasvAmisammataH
pAWo'pyanArza iti jYAyate . devapuruzakArAvapyasmaduktArTopazwamBakAveva .

gamakAnItyapi jYeyam .

ScuH’ (8-4-40) iti Scutvena cakAraH . evaM sannante yaNante ca boDyam .

(6-1-75) iti tuki, tasya Scutvena cakAre rUpam . evamuttaratrApi rUpanizpattirjYeyA .

hetumaRRici parataH, upaDAvfdDO, ‘mitAM hrasvaH’ (6-4-92) iti hrasve, ‘CadakaH-
dikA’ ityAdIni, UrjanArTe vidyamAnasyAsya DAtorRO boDyAni .

tAvat svaM balamacCadan juzitavAn muzwyA halI muzwikam ..’ DA. kA. 3-50.

iti parasmEpadamapi Bavati .

SOriH SUrakagarvacUraRaparaH santapyamAnaH satAm .’ DA. kA. 2. 60.

1. pacAdizu (3-1-134) devaw iti pAWAt igupaDalakzaRaM kapratyayaM (3-1-135)

yuc’ (3-2-148) iti yuci, anAdeSaH . devanaH = kitavaH .

nAdikaM ca Bavanti . ‘vakArAdO kNiti pratyaye parataH ‘cCvoH SUW—’
(6-4-19) ityUW vA Bavati iti kecit .’ iti prakriyAkOmudIkAra-
darSitamatAnusAreRa, UqaBAve valilope ca didivAn iti rUpaM pradarSitam .

pratyaye akAdeSe ca rUpam .

devateridam . Ryantasya dIvyatestu na . lAkzaRikatvAt, aRyantasAhacaryAt,
sakarmakatvAt, ‘GinuR akarmakARAm’ iti BAzyokteSca .’ iti bfhacCabdendu-
SeKare proktam sAhacaryapariBAzAyA anityatvAt, asya DAtoranekArTatvena,
akarmakatvasya vyavahArAdizvarTezu samBavAt, kvacidalAkzaRikatvasyApi bahula-
grahaRAcca asyApi DAtoH paridevIti pradarSitamiti jYeyam .
D. ‘SastrErdidevizuM saMKye dudyazuH pariGaM kapiH .’ Ba. kA. 9. 32.
1. ‘GaYarTe kaviDAnam—’ (vA. 3-3-58) iti GaYarTe = aDikaraRArTe kapratyayaH .
kittvenopaDAguRanizeDaH . divaH = dyulokaH . tridaSAH dIvyantItyaDikaraRe
kapratyaye pfzodarAditvena (6-3-109) daSaSabdasya lope tridivaH iti rUpam .
yadvA, trayo devAH-vizRubrahmeSvarAH dIvyantyatreti aDikaraRe kapratyayo vA .
2. ‘udito vA’ (7-2-56) iti ktvAyAmiqvikalpaH . iwpakze, ‘na ktvA sew’
(1-2-18) iti kittvanizeDAd guRaH . iqaBAvapakze UqAdizu dyUtvA iti
rUpamiti ca jYeyam .
3. ‘kfviGfzvicCavisTavidavikikidIviH’ [da. u. 1-26] ityanena kvinpratya-
yAnto dIrGopaDaSca nipAtitaH . ‘kiki’ iti dIvyatIti kikidIviH =
cAzaH . ‘Syenena kikidIvinA’ (fgvede 10-97-13) iti, ‘CagalaM
kalmAzaM kikidIvi’ iti tEttirIyakaprayogAcca dIrGatftIyo'yaM SabdaH, kecittu
dIrGadvitIyaM kikIdiviH ityapi paWanti .

pratyayaH . pratidivA = divasaH .
5. RyantAt ORAdike [da. u. 8-40] kvipi, Rerluki, devayatIti dyOH =
svargo'ntarikzaM vA .
6. ‘diverdyu ca’ [da. u. 8. 81] iti zwranpratyaye, ‘dyu’ iti prakfterAdeSe vfdDO ca
dyOtram iti Bavati . dIvyanti tasmin sukftinaH iti dyOtram = tridivaH,
vimAnaM vA .
7. ‘vfzAdiByaScit’ [da. u. 8-109] iti kalapratyaye, bAhulakAd guRe ca rUpam
devalaH = fziH .

2. ‘Kano Ga ca’ (3-3-125) ityatra cakArAt saMjYAyAmanyatrApi Gapratyayo Bavati
iti jYAyate-ityASrayaRena Gapratyaye rUpam .
3. ANpUrvakAdasmAt saMjYAyAM Gapratyaye, ‘AspadaM pratizWAyAm’ (6-1-146)
ityatra nipAtanAt suqAgamaH .
B. ‘kftAspadA BUmiBftAM sahasrErudanvadamBaHparivItamUrtiH .’ Si. va. 3-34.
4. ‘gozpadaM sevitAsevitapramARezu’ (6-1-145) ityanena sevite asevite pramARe ca
vizaye suw nipAtyate . zatvaM ca Bavati .
5. ‘sampadAdiByaH—’ (vA. 3-3-94) ityanena striyAM BAvAdO kvip . ‘ktinna-
pIzyate’ (BAzyezwiH 3-3-94) iti vacanAt ktini sampattiH ityAdikamapi
sADveva . pratipat = jYAnam, praTamA tiTiSca .
6. ‘saMjYAyAM samajanizadanipata—’ (3-3-99) ityatra ‘nipada’ iti kzIra-
svAmipAWamASrityAtra kyap boDyaH . padyA = kAvyaviSezaH . ‘ekapraGawwakaM
padyA muktakAnAM nibanDanam .’ iti tallakzaRam . atra pakze ‘upeyivAn—’
(3-2-109) ityatra ‘upa’ ityasyeva atra ‘ni’ ityasyAvivakzitatvaM jYeyam .
1. ‘viSipatipadiskandAM vyApyamAnAsevyamAnayoH’ (3-4-56) iti sopapadAt
Ramul . ‘tftIyApraBftIni—’ (2-2-21) iti samAsavikalpaH . samAse, ‘nitya-
vIpsayoH’ (8-1-4) iti dvirvacanaM na Bavati . samAsenEva nityavIpsArTayoruktatvAt .
2. ‘Ricca kasi padyartteH’ [da. u. 1-168] ityUpratyayaH, pratyayasya RittvaM ca . padyate
iti pAdUH = pAdukA . ‘pAdukA’ ityatra saMjYAyAM kani, ‘ke'RaH’ (7-4-13)
iti hrasvo jYeyaH .
3. ORAdike [da. u. 7-26] manpratyaye rUpam . padyate maDukarEriti padmam =
kamalam . arSaAdyajante matvarTIye padmA = lakzmIH . matvarTIya eva inipratyaye
padminI iti ca .

varDamAnaH .

RyantAt ‘RicaSca’ (1-3-74) iti SAnajBavatyeva .
1. kvipi, ‘GumAsTAgApA—’ (6-4-66) ityAdinA Itve rUpamevam .
2. nizWAyAm, Itve rUpamevam . evaM ktinktvApratyayAdizvapi ItvaM jYeyam . pItaH
ityatra, pratyavasAnArTatvAdasya DAtoH (pratyavasAnam = galabilADaHsaMyogAnukUla-
vyApAraH) aDikaraRe ktapratyayo jYeyaH . arSaAdyajantatvena ‘pItA gAvaH’
ityAdizu sTalezu prayoga upapannaH .

‘pAGrA—’ (7-3-78) ityAdinA pibAdeSe, pararUpe ca rUpam . nirupasfzwAdevAyaM
Sapratyaya iti kecit . sopasfzwAdeveti pare sADayanti .

rAkzasAdiH .

Dvoriti vaktavyam’ (vA. 3-2-8) iti vacanAt upapadaniyamaH . striyAM wittvAt
NIp Bavati surApI-SIDupI iti . anyopapadezu tu ‘Ato'nupasarge kaH’
(3-2-3) iti kapratyaye wApi kzIrapA ityAdikaM BavatIti viSezaH .
C. ‘vrIqajAqyamaBajan maDupA sA svAM madAt prakftimeti hi sarvaH ..’ Si. va. 10-18.
8. ‘supi sTaH’ (3-2-4) ityatra, ‘supi’ iti yogaviBAgAt kapratyayaH . dvAByAM
pibatIti dvipaH = gajaH .
D. ‘SarmadaM mArutiM dUtaM vizamasTaH kapidvipam .’ Ba. kA. 6-89.

titaH . kuRqena pIyate'smin soma iti kratuviSeze'BiDeye kuRqapAyyaSabdaH
sADuH .

10. ‘Ato maninkvanibvanipaSca’ (3-2-74) ityanena kvanipi Itve kzIrapIvA
iti rUpam . striyAm, ‘vano ra ca’ (4-1-7) iti NIp rePaSca Bavati .

2. ‘anyeByo'pi dfSyante’ (3-2-75) iti vicpratyaye rUpam .

1. ‘pUNaSca’ (7-2-51) iti nizWAyA iqvikalpaH . ‘pUNH ktvA ca’ (1-2-22) iti
nizWAyAH kittvanizeDAd guRAvAdeSO . evaM ktvAyAmapi rUpadvayasyopapattirjYeyA .

2. kartari, ‘pUNyajoH SAnan’ (3-2-128) iti SAnanpratyayaH . Sapi, ‘Ane muk’
(7-2-82) iti mugAgamaH .
3. nandyAditvAt (3-1-134) kartari lyupratyaye, anAdeSe ca rUpam . pavanaH = vAyuH .

itrapratyayaH . fziH = agniH . ‘agniH pavitram, sa mA punAtu,’ (Apa. SrO.
sU. 12-19-6) ‘vAyuH somaH sUrya indraH pavitram, te mA punantu .’ (Apa. SrOtasUtre
12-9-6) ityAdizu yaTA . fzO karaRe, devatAyAm kartari cAyaM pratyayo jYeyaH .
5. ‘tfn’ (3-2-135) iti tacCIlAdizu kartfzu tfnpratyayaH . bAhulakAt
iqAgamABAvaH .
B. ‘jagat pipavizurvAyuH kalpAnta iva durDaraH ..’ Ba. kA. 9-53.
6. RyantAt sani, upratyaye rUpam . atrApi ‘oH puyaRjyapare’ (7-4-80) iti
aByAsasyekAraH . tatpradarSanArTamevAtra rUpamekaM nidarSitam .
7. ‘na BABUpU—’ (8-4-34) ityatra ‘pU’ ityanena pUYa eva grahaRam, na tu pUNaH
iti kASikAdizu dfSyate . tenAtra RatvaM Bavatyeva . kzIrasvAmI tu
aviSezeRa pUNo'pi prakftasUtre grahaRaM manyamAnaH prapavanIyam iti RatvABAva-
GawitaM rUpamudAjahAra .
8. ‘RyantaBAdInAmupasaMKyAnam’ (vA. 8-4-34) iti RatvanizeDo'pi nAsya DAtoriti
pakze rUpamevam . kzIrasvAmimate tu pUrvavadatrApi RatvanizeDaH .
1. ‘vipUyavinIyajityA muYjakalkahalizu’ (3-1-117) ityanena muYje'BiDeye vipUrvakA-
dasmAt kyapi rUpamevam . anyatrArTe tu ‘aco yat (3-1-97) iti yati,
avAdeSe ca pavyam iti rUpam .
A. ‘vasAnAM valkale SudDe vipUyEH kftameKalAm .’ Ba. kA. 6-61.
2. ‘orAvaSyake’ (3-1-125) iti Ryat . AvAdeSaH . avaSyamo makArasya
‘lumpedavaSyamaH kftye’ (kASikA. 6-3-109) iti lopaH .
3. ‘Fdorap’ (3-3-57) iti BAve'ppratyayaH . GaYapavAdaH .
4. ‘niraByoH pUlvoH’ (3-3-28) iti nizpUrvakAdasmAt GaY . nizpAvaH = DAnya-
viSezaH . ‘parimARAKyAyAM sarveByaH’ (3-3-20) iti GaYyapi rUpamevameva . tadAnIM
nizpAvaH = parimARaviSezaH .
5. ‘udi SrayatiyOtipUdruvaH’ (3-3-49) iti GaY .
6. ‘halasUkarayoH puvaH’ (3-2-183) iti karaRe zwranpratyaye rUpam . potram =
sUkarasya, halasya vA muKam .
B. ‘BUdAra eva vanapotravatAmatAnIt BUdAraSabdamasahizRurivAntamezAm ..’ ca. BA. 1. 20.
7. ‘puvaH saMjYAyAm’ (3-2-185) iti karaRe itrapratyayaH . pavitram = darBaH,
cakrAyuDaM ca .
C. ‘sUto'pi gaNgAsalilEH pavitvA sahASvamAtmAnamanalpamanyuH .’ Ba. kA. 3. 18.

DAnyaviSezaH .

SoDyate tuzAdyapanayanena yastaRqulAdiH saH nizpAvaH . SUrpasyApi prAkkAle
parimARavAcakatvAt pratyayotpattiriti jYeyam .’

2. ‘puvaH saMjYAyAm’ (3-2-185) iti karaRe itrapratyayaH . pavitram = darBaH, cakraM ca .

guRastu Bavatyeva . paviH = vajram . ajAdiH = ajaDAtuprakAraH .

5. ORAdike [da. u. 6-7] tanpratyaye rUpam . punAti iti potaH = agniH, putraH
samudrayAnaM vA . bAhulakAdiqAgamo na .

rUpamevam . hrasvaviDAnasAmarTyAt guRo na .

prakzipya sadyo'Bizutya pUtvA pIyate . sa PARwa iti tadvidaH .’ ityAha .

2. ktini, ‘titutrezvagrahAdInAm—’ (vA. 7-2-9) iti vacanAt iqiti jYeyam .
DAtUnAmanekArTakatvAd atra SabdArTakatvamityapi jYeyam .

‘vasvekAjAdGasAm’ (7-2-67) itIw .

badDvA, banDayitvA, biBantsitvA, bAbaDitvA;
anubaDya, prabanDya, prabiBantsya, prabAbaDya; 2 cakrabanDaM badDaH, 3 awwAlikAbanDaM badDaH;

jYeyam .

3. tfci, ‘JazastaDoH—’ (8-2-40) iti Datvam . ‘JalAM jaS JaSi’ (8-4-53)
iti DAtuDakArasya dakAraH . tasya, ‘Jaro Jari—’ (8-4-65) iti pAkziko lopaH .
evaM tavyadAdizvapi prakriyA jYeyA .
1. Satari, kryAditvAt SnApratyaye, ‘aniditAm—’ (6-4-24) iti DAtunakAralope,
‘SnA'ByastayoH—’ (6-4-112) ityAkAralope ca rUpamevam .
2. cittavatkartfkatvavivakzAyAm Ryante'tra parasmEpadameva . acittavatkartfkatvavivakzAyAM
tu Atmanepadamapi BavatIti jYeyam .
3. syapratyaye'pi BazBAvacartvAdikaM yaTAyaTamUhyam .
4. kvipi, upaDAnakAralope, BazBAvacartvavikalpayo rUpam .
5. ktapratyayAntAt, ‘saptamI—’ (2-3-36) iti yogaviBAgAt samAsaH .
6. sutamanubaDnAtIti sutAnubanDaH . ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) ityaR .
A. ‘jYAtASayastasya tato vyatAnIt sa karmaWaH karma sutAnubanDam ..’ Ba. kA. 1. 11.
(atra karmaRyaRi sutAnubanDam iti napuMsakaliNgaSravaRAsamBavAt vyAKyAtfBiH
sutAnubanDi iti pAWamASritya, tasya ca sutamanubanDuM SIlamasyeti vyutpattyA
tAcCIlye'rTe RinipratyayAntatvamiti samarTitam . tadeva ca sADviti pratiBAti .
7. paryaNke banDaH paryaNkabanDaH . ‘sidDaSuzkapakvabanDESca’ (2-1-41) iti saptamItatpuruzaH .
‘tatpuruze kfti—’ (6-3-14) iti prAptasyAlukaH ‘nensidDabadDnAtizu ca’
(6-3-19) iti nizeDaH .
8. anu baDyate ityanUbanDaH = pratyayagataH kittvaNittvAdirviSezaH . ‘upasargasya
GaYyamanuzye bahulam’ (6-3-122) iti dIrGaH .
1. DAtoH saMyogAntatvena gurutvAt, ‘guroSca halaH’ (3-3-103) ityakArapratyaye rUpa-
mevam . ktini vivakzite tu kittvenopaDAnakAralope badDiH ityapi sADuriti jYeyam .
2. ‘aDikaraRe banDaH’ (3-4-41) iti Ramul . cakre badDa ityarTaH . kazAditvAt
yaTAviDyanuprayogaH .
3. ‘saMjYAyAm’ (3-4-42) iti Ramul . awwAlikAbanDa iti banDaviSezasya
saMjYA . evaM krOYcabanDaM badDaH, padmabanDaM badDaH, SarabanDaM badDaH, ityAdizu sarvatra
RamulupapattirjYeyA . atra sarbatra banDaH ityanena vyUhaviSezasya, kAvyagatasya banDa-
viSezasya ca tantreRa grahaRamiti jYeyam .
4. ORAdike [da. u. 1. 95] upratyaye rUpamevam .
5. ORAdike [da. u. 8. 26] kiracpratyaye, pratyayasya kittvenopaDAnakAralope ca
rUpamevam . badDamasya SravaRendriyamiti baDiraH = SrotrendriyahInaH .
6. ‘banDerbraDibuDi ca’ (da. u. 5-38) iti nakpratyaye braDi-buDi-ityAdeSayoSca
rUpe sidDyataH . kittvAdupaDAnakAralopaH . braDnaH = sUryaH . buDnaH = saNkalpo manaH,
devo vA .
7. bAhulakAdORAdike uracpratyaye rUpam . ‘banDUra banDurO syAtAM namrasundarayostrizu .’
iti rantidevavacanAd dIrGamaDyamo'pyastIti vijYAyate .
8. ORAdike (da. u. 3-46) Ukapratyaye rUpam . banDUkam = puzpaviSezaH .

‘vugi—’ ityasya pAWaBedo'yam . ‘Bugi Barjane ityeke .’ iti kzIrasvAmI .
buNgakaH-NgikA, buNgakaH-NgikA, bubuNgizakaH-zikA, bobuNgakaH-NgikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakuRWativat (209) jYeyAni . Ryati-- C buNgyam .
C. ‘vijuNgya buNgyaM guRasaMGadaNGakA alaNGitAnandarasAttaGarGanAH .’ DA. kA. 1. 22.

(1121) “buDa avagamane” (I-BvAdiH-858. saka. sew. para.)
jvalAdiH .
‘buDyate boDatItyevaM buDeravagame dvayam .
buDiro boDanArTasya boDate boDatItyapi ..’ (Slo. 119) iti devaH .
avagamanam = udboDaH, jYAnaM ca . Adye-akarmakaH, dvitIye-sakarmakaH .
boDakaH-DikA, boDakaH-DikA, buboDizakaH-bubuDizakaH-zikA, bobuDakaH-
DikA ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakolativat (231) jYeyAni . [Page0927+ 29] 1 boDayan SizyaM Darmam . 2 praboDI-pratiboDI . rAjYAM 3 boDitaH-buDito vA . 4 vibuGaH A -boDaH, B aviboDayan .
1. ‘buDayuDanaSajaneNprudrusruByo ReH’ (1-3-86) iti RyantAdasmAt parasmEpadameva .
yadA'yaM cittavatkartfkaH, tadA'pi, ‘aRAvakarmakAt cittavatkartfkAt’ (1-3-88)
iti RyantAt parasmEpadameveti jYeyam . atra, ‘gatibudDipratyavasAnArTa—’
(1-4-52) ityanena buGdyarTatvAt aRyantAvasTAyAM kartuH, RyantAvasTAyAM karmasaMjYetyapi
jYeyam .
2. ‘Bavizyati gamyAdayaH’ (3-3-3) iti sUtre, pra—pratipUrvakasyAsya RinipratyayAnta-
tvena gaRapAWAt BavizyatyarTe RiniH .
3. ‘matibudDipUjArTeByaSca’ (3-2-188) iti vartamAne AdikarmaRi ca ktapratyayaH .
‘udupaDAd BAvAdikarmaRoH—’ (1-2-21) iti kittvavikalpaH . ‘ktasya ca
vartamAne’ (2-3-67) iti zazWI . atra kzIrataraNgiRyAM bodDA, budDaH iti
iqrahitaprayogO pradarSitO . aniwkArikAsu (7-2-10) buDyati iti SyanA
nirdeSAt dEvAdikasyEvAniwtvamiti, asya BOvAdikatvena seqrUpARyeva BavantIti
ca yuktamutpaSyAmaH .
4. ‘jvalitikasanteByo RaH .’ (3-1-140) iti kartari RapratyayavikalpaH . tasya
vEkalpikatvAt, kartari pakze igupaDalakzaRakapratyaye buDaH, bibuDaH ityAdInAM
sidDiH . ‘aBiDAnalakzaRAH kfttadDitasamAsAntAH, (BAzyam-3-3-1) iti
vacanAt sAmAnyena vihitAnAmapi kftAM kvacit saMjYAyAmapi samBava iti, atra
kapratyayaH saMjYAyAmapi . tena buDaH iti grahaviSezasya, jAtiviSezasya ca saMjYA .
A. ‘… tamahamito vilokya vibuDEH kftottamAyoDanam .’ Ba. kA. 10. 37.
B. ‘tataH prAkAramArohat kzapAwAnaviboDayan .’ Ba. kA. 8. 56.

(1122) “buDa avagamane”
(IV-divAdiH-1172. aka. ani. Atma.) [a]
‘buDyate boDatItyevaM buDeravagame dvayam .’ (Slo. 119) iti devaH . [Page0928+ 29]
boDakaH-DikA, boDakaH-DikA, 1 buButsakaH-tsikA, bobuDakaH-DikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi dEvAdikakzuDyativat (315) jYeyAni . 2 budDaH, 3 buDAnaH, 4 bubuDAnaH .
[a] ‘tattvaM buDyate’ iti DarmakIrtti prayogAt, ‘kramAdamuM nArada ityaboDi saH ..’
(Si. va. 1. 3) iti mAGaprayogAcca sakarmakatvamapyasyAstIti jYAyate . paraM tu
‘atra buDAdInAM caturRAm, ‘aRAvakarmakAt—’ (1-3-88) ityeva sidDe,
vacanamidam acittavatkartfkArTam .’ iti pratipAdayato vfttikArAderetadanaBimata-
miti jYAyate . mA. DA. vfttO tu ‘ayamarTaBedena sakarmako'karmakaSca .’ iti
samAhitam .
1. sannantARRvuli, ‘halantAcca’ (1-2-10) iti sanaH kittve, BazBAve cartve ca rUpam .
2. ‘kticktO ca saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-174) iti saMjYAyAm ktapratyayaH . buDyatIti
budDaH = sidDArTaH .
3. ‘yuDibuDidfSeH kicca’ (da. u. 5-33) ityAnacpratyayaH, kicca . kittvAnna guRaH .
buDAnaH = AcAryaH .
4. ‘mucibuDiByAM sanvacca’ iti mA. DA. vfttyupAttena ORAdikasUtreRa
Anacpratyaye, tasya sanvadBAvAt dvitve, kittve ca rUpam . bubuDAnaH =
bodDumicCuH .

(1123) “buDir boDane” (I-BvAdiH-875. saka. sew. uBa.)
‘buDiro boDanArTasya boDate boDatItyapi ..’ (Slo. 119) iti devaH .
cAndrAH, kzIrasvAmI ca ‘buDa—’ ityaniritaM paWanti .
boDakaH-DikA, boDakaH-DikA, buboDizakaH-bubuDizakaH-zikA, bobuDakaH-DikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakolativat (231) jYeyAni . 5 boDayamAnaH, A viboDyaH, 6 tattvaboDaH- 7 tattvaboDinI .
5. ‘buDayuDa—’ (1-3-86) ityatra, akarmakEH yuDa-naSa-janEH sAhacaryAt tAdfSasyA-
karmakasyEva grahaRamiti, sakarmako'yaM na tatra vivakzitaH . tenAsmAt ‘RicaSca’
(1-3-74) ityasya pravfttyA yaTAsamBavaM RyantAt SatA SAnacca BavatIti viSezaH .
A. ‘yA neditorvIpariSarDivIcIvimfdDavfkzAdiviboDyaSEtyA ..’ DA. kA. 2. 26.
6. ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) ityaRi rUpamevam .
7. tAcCIlye Rinipratyaye rUpamevam . striyAM NIp .

(1124) “u bundir niSAmane”
(I-BvAdiH-876. saka. sew. uBa.)
‘u bunDir 8 —’ iti nandI . ‘u bedir—’ ityanye .’ iti kzIrasvAmI .
‘u cundir—’ iti kASakftsnacandrO peWaturiti kzIrataraNgiRIwIkA . [Page0929+ 26]
bundakaH-ndikA, bundakaH-ndikA, bubundizakaH-zikA, bobudakaH-dikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikatumpativat (742) jYeyAni . 1 bundamAnaH-bundizyamARaH, 2 bunnam-bunnaH-bunnavAn, 3 bunditvA-buttvA, 4 budbudaH
ityAdIni rUpARyasya DAtoH viSezeRa samBavantIti viSezaH . A prabundyaH .
8. “… AcAryapravfttirjYApayati— ‘nEvaMjAtIyakAnAmididviDirBavati’ iti; yadayami-
ritaH kAMScinnumanuzaktAn paWati— ‘u bundir niSAmane’… .” iti BAzya-
(1-3-7) vacanaprAmARyAt DakArapAWo'prAmARika iti jYeyam . anenEva BAzya-
vAkyena kutracidDAtuzu arTanirdeSaH pARinIya evetyapi boDyam .
1. asya DAtoruBayapaditvAt SAnajapi BavatIti viSezaH .
2. udittvena kttvAyAmiqvikalpanAt ‘yasya viBAzA’ (7-2-15) iti nizWA-
yAmiRnizeDe, upaDAnakAralope, nizWAtakAra-DAtudakArayornatve ca rUpamevam .
3. ‘udito vA’ (7-2-56) iti ktvAyAmiqvikalpaH . iwpakze ‘na ktvA sew’
(1-2-18) iti kittvanizeDAdupaDAnakAralopo na . iqaBAvapakze tu nakAralope,
DAtudakArasya cartve ca buttvA iti dvitakArakaM rUpamiti jYeyam .
4. GaYarTe kapratyaye, ‘kfYAdInAM ke dve BavataH’ (vA. 6-1-12) iti dvirvacane,
pfzodarAditvAt (6-3-109) halAdiSezABAve ca rUpamevam .
A. ‘prabundyaveRIjavavenamAnA KAtAntikA cIvariBirnizAdEH .’ DA. kA. 2. 27.

(1125) “bula nimajjane” (X-curAdiH-1602. aka. sew. uBa.)
‘cula samucCrAye’ (547) iti curAdiDAtoH kzIrasvAmisammataH pAWa evam .
itare sarve'pyamuM na paWanti . bolakaH-likA, bubolayizakaH-zikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi cOrAdikacorayativat (546) jYeyAni .

(1126) “busa utsarge” (IV-divAdiH-1219. saka. sew. para.)
bosakaH-sikA, bosakaH-sikA, bubusizakaH-bubosizakaH-zikA, bobusakaH-
sikA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi dEvAdikakusyativat (234) jYeyAni . 5 busam, B 6 Kalebusam, 7 bustaH . [Page0930+ 27]
5. igupaDalakzaRe kapratyaye rUpamevam . busam = DAnyAdInAM nissAro BAgaH .
B. ‘… vedavyozakfdapluzo bisitaDIkusyajjanAMhobusam .’ DA. kA. 2. 66.
6. yasmin kAle Kale busaM vartate sa kAlaH = Kalebusam . tizWadgupraBftizu (2-1-17)
pAWAt avyayIBAvasamAsaH, saptamyA aluk ca .
7. ORAdike (da. u. 6-7) tanpratyaye, ‘titutrata—’ (7-2-9) ityAdinA iRnizeDe ca
rUpamevam . yadvA, arDarcAdizu (2-4-31) busta iti pAWAnnizWAyAmaniwtvamiti
boDyam .

(1127) “busta AdarAnAdarayoH”
(X-curAdiH-1591. saka. sew. uBa.)
‘—banDane .’ iti kzIrasvAmyudDftaScAndrasammatapAWaH . ‘mudritacAndra-
GAtupAWe tu ‘— vaYcane’ ityeva dfSyate .’ iti kzI. wIkA . ‘— dAnA-
darayoH’ iti DA. kA. vyAKyAyAM (3-20) dfzwaH pAWaH .
bustakaH-stikA, bubustayizakaH-zikA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi
cOrAdikakusmayativat (236) jYeyAni . asyoBayapaditvAt SatA'pi
BavatIti viSezaH . A sambustitaH .
A. ‘saMbustite girimaKe paricodya gopAn
prAnakkayadDarimaKaM madaDakkanArTI ..’ DA. kA. 3. 20.

(1128) “bfha vfdDO” (I-BvAdiH-735. aka. sew. para.)
‘… bfMhati barhati .
vfdDO, BAzArTavizaye bfMhayed barhayediti ..’ (Slo. 198) iti devaH .
barhakaH-rhikA, barhakaH-rhikA, bibarhizakaH-zikA, barIbfhakaH-hikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikadarhativat (866) jYeyAni . 1 paribfQaH B,
paribfhitaH, 2 bfhat .
1. paripUrbAdasmAnnizWAyAm, iqaBAvaH, takArasya Qatvam, hakArasya lopaH iti, ‘praBO
paribfQaH’ (7-2-21) ityanena praBAvaBiDeye nipAtitaH . anyatra paribfhitaH .
atra bfMhatereva sAnuzaNgasyedaM nipAtanamiti vArtikakArapakza iti padamaYjarya-
nusAreRa mA. DA. vfttAvuktam . BAzye darhatidfMhati vizaya eva prakftyantarasadBAve
pramARaM pradarSitamiti boDyam . kiYca, atra sarvatra BAzyakoSezu ‘praBO parivfQaH’
(7-2-21) ityupAdAya parivfQaH ityeva rUpasampAdanaM kftamiti jYAyate . ataSca
dantozWyAdiH varhatirliKizamAREva BAzyopAttetyapi jYAyate . atra tattvaM vidvAMso
viBAvayantu .
B. ‘tAn dfzwvA'tidfQAn DfzwAn prAptAn paribfQAjYayA .’ Ba. kA. 9. 18.
2. ‘vartamAne pfzadbfhat—’ (da. u. 6. 5) iti katipratyayaH, tasya SatfvadBAvaSca .

(1129) “bfhi vfdDO Sabde ca” (I-BvAdiH-736. aka. sew. para.) [Page0931+ 26]
atra SabdaH-gajaSabda eva, loke taTEva prayogAt . ‘bfhir—’ iti
candradurgO . ‘… bfMhati barhati .
vfdDO, BAzArTavizaye bfMhayet barhayediti ..’ (Slo. 198) iti devaH .
bfMhakaH-bfMhikA, bfMhakaH-bfMhikA, bibfMhizakaH-zikA, barIbfMhakaH-hikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikadarhativat (866) jYeyAni . 1 paribfQaH- A upabfMhitaH, 2 barhiH, 3 brahma .
1. atrApi praBAvaBiDeye, ‘praBO paribfQaH’ (7-2-21) iti ktapratyayasyAniwtvaM takA-
rasya QatvaM nakArahakArayorlopaSca nipAtyate . anyatra bfhitam ityeva . ‘bfMhitaM =
karigarjitam .’ iti amaraH (2-8-107) .
A. ‘yAnErapyupabfMhito vihitavAn prAtaH prayAtuM manaH .’ DA. kA. 1. 92.
2. ‘bfMhernalopaSca’ (da. u. 9-31) itIsipratyaye nalope ca rUpam . paScAt guRaH .
barhiH = vedyAstaraRam .
3. ‘bfMhirno'cca’ (da. u. 6-74) iti maninpratyaye DAtUpaDAnakArasya akAre, paScAd
yaRi ca rUpam . brahma = paraM tejaH, vedaSca .

(1131) “bfhU udyamane” (VI-tudAdiH-1347. aka. vew. para.)
kzIrataraNgiRI-DAtukAvyAdizu dfzwaH pAWa evam . anye sarve dantozWyAdi
‘vfhU—’ ityeva paWanti . tatra kzIrasvAmI ‘bfhu—’ iti uditaM papAWa .
barhakaH-rhikA, barhakaH-rhikA, bibarhizakaH-bibfkzakaH-kzikA, barIbfhakaH-hikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi tOdAdikatarhativat (777) jYeyAni .
Rinipratyaye-- A janajIbabarhI iti .
A. ‘murAdibanDuH kzuraGoracetAH puran KalAnAM janajIvabarhI .’ DA. kA. 2. 77.

(1132) “brUY vyaktAyAM vAci”
(II-adAdiH-1044. aka. [ani.] sew. uBa.) 1 vAcakaH-cikA, vAcakaH-cikA, 2 vivakzakaH-kzikA, vAvacakaH-cikA;
vaktA-vaktrI, vAcayitA-trI, vivakzitA-trI, vAvacitA-trI; 3 bruvan-tI, vAcayan-ntI, vivakzan-ntI; --
vakzyan-ntI-tI, vAcayizyan-ntI-tI, vivakzizyan-ntI-tI; --
bruvARaH, vAcayamAnaH, vivakzamARaH, vAvacyamAnaH;
vakzyamARaH, vAcayizyamARaH, vivakzizyamARaH, vAvacizyamARaH; 4 suvAk-suvAg-suvAcO-suvAcaH; — -- 5 uktam-uktaH-uktavAn, vAcitam-taH, vivakzitaH, vAvacitaH-tavAn; [Page0933+ 28] 1 bruvaH, brAhmaRibruvA, 2 viduzibruvA-viduzIbruvA, SreyasibruvA-SreyasIbruvA, 3 vidvadbruvA, SreyobruvA, vAk- 4 vAcA, 5 anUcAnaH, A 6 vAggmI, vAcAlaH-vAcAwaH, 7 pravacanIyaH (brAhmaRaH, anuvAko vA), 8 guRavacanaH, vAcaH viva kzuH, vAvacaH;
vaktavyam, vAcayitavyam, vivakzitavyam, vAvacitavyam;
pravacanIyam, vAcanIyam, vivakzaRIyam, vAvacanIyam; [Page0934+ 28] 1 vAcyam-vAkyam, 2 pravAcyam, avivAkyam, vAcyam, vAkovAkyam, vivakzyam, vAvacyam;
IzadvacaH-durvacaH-suvacaH; — --
ucyamAnaH, vAcyamAnaH, vivakzyamARaH, vAvacyamAnaH;
vAcaH, 3 anuvAkaH-prAqvivAkaH, vAcaH, vivakzaH, vAvacaH;
vaktum, vAcayitum, vivakzitum, vAvacitum;
uktiH, 4 niruktam-punaruktiH, vAcanA, vivakzA, vAvacA;
vacanam, vAcanam, vivakzaRam, vAvacanam;
uktvA, vAcayitvA, vivakzitvA, vAvacitvA;
procya, saMvAcya, pravivakzya, pravAvacya;
vAcam 2, uktvA 2, vAcam 2, vAcayitvA 2, vivakzam 2, vivakzitvA 2, vAvacam 2; vAvacitvA 2; [Page0935+ 35] 1 kfkavAkuH A, 2 ukTam, 3 vaktram, 4 vacaH, 5 vacaknuH .
1. ArDaDAtuke vivakzite ‘bruvo vaciH’ (2-4-53) iti vacyAdeSe rUpamevam .
evameva tfjAdizu sarvatra SudDe, RvulAdizu Ryante ca vacyAdeSe rUpaM jYeyam .
2. sannantARRvuli vacyAdeSe rUpam . tatra vacyAdeSasya ‘paciM vaciM—’
ityAniwkArikAsu (BAzye-7-2-10) vacanAdaniwtvam . kutvazatvayoH rUpamevam .
evameva santante sarvatra prakriyA jYeyA .
3. Satari, adAditvAt Sapo luki, SatuH sArvaDAtukatvena NittvAt, ‘aci SnuDAtu—’
(6-4-77) ityAdinovaNi rUpamevam .
4. tAcCIlike kvipi, ‘kvib vacipracCi—’ (vA. 3-2-178) iti dIrGo'saMprasAraRaM ca
Bavati .
5. nizWAyAm, ‘vacisvapiyajAdInAM kiti’ (6-1-15) iti vakArasya saMprasAraRe,
‘samprasAraRAcca’ (6-1-108) iti pUrvarUpe ca rUpamevam . evameva ktini, ktvAyAM
ca rUpanizpattirboDyA .
1. bravIti iti bruvaH . kartari pacAdyaci rUpam . ‘GarUpakalpacelawbruva—’ (6-3-43)
iti sUtre ‘bruva’ iti nipAtanAt guRABAve, vacyAdeSABAve ca rUpam . anenEva
sUtreRa BAzitapuMskAt parasya NIppratyayAntasyAnekAco hrasvaH . kASikAyAmeva
(8-1-27) sUtre ‘bruva iti bruvaH kan, nipAtanAt vacyAdeSABAvaSca .’ ityukta-
mapyatrAnusanDeyam .
2. ‘ugitaSca’ (6-3-45) iti bruvaSabde pare hrasvavikalpaH .
3. ‘puMvadBAvo'pyatra pakze vaktavyaH’ (kASikA. 6-3-45) iti vfttikAra-
vacanAdatra puMvadBAve vidvadbruvA, SreyobruvA iti rUpe BavataH . paraMtu BAzye
nEtAdfSaM vacanaM dfSyate .
4. kvibantAt striyAM wApi rUpamevam . ‘ApaM cEva halantAnAM yaTA vAcA niSA
diSA .’ iti BAgurivacanAt wAp iti si. kOmudI . BAzye tu nEtAdfSaM
vacanaM dfSyate .
5. ‘upeyivAnanASvAnanUcAnaSca’ (3-2-109) ityanena, ‘anu’ ityupasargapUrvakAdasmAt
liwaH kartari kAnaci, samprasAraRe pUrvarUpe dvitve savarRadIrGe ca ‘anUcAnaH’ iti
sidDyati . anUcAnaH = sANgavedADyetA .
A. ‘idamUcuranUcAnAH prItikaRwakitatvacaH ..’ kumArasamBave 6-15.
6. vAkCabdAt ‘vAco gminiH’ (5-2-124) iti matvarTIye gminipratyaye
rUpamevam . praSastavAgvati pratyayo'yam . atrEva prakaraRe ‘AlajAwacO bahuBAziRi’
(5-2-125) iti kutsitArTe matvarTIye Alac-AwacpratyayayoH vAcAlaH, vAcAwaH
iti rUpe ityapi jYeyam .
7. ‘BavyageyapravacanIya—’ (3-4-68) ityAdinA kartari anIyar pratyayaH .
pravacanIyaH = brAhmaRaH . atra karmaRyeva pratyayo nipAtyate iti mate tu pravaca-
nIyaH = anuvAkaH .
8. guRam uktavAn iti guRavacanaH . ‘kftyalyuwo bahulam’ (3-3-113) iti BUte
kartari lyuwpratyayaH . atra ca nidAnam, ‘guRavacanabrAhmaRAdiByaH—’
(5-1-124) ityatra ‘guRavacana—’ iti nirdeSa eveti jYeyam .
1. ‘ArDaDAtuke’ (2-4-35) ityatra vizayasaptamItvASrayaRAt pratyayotpatteH prAgeva
vacyAdeSe halantalakzaRe Ryati ‘vaco'SabdasaMjYAyAm’ (7-3-67) iti kutva-
nizeDe vAcyam iti rUpam . SabdasaMjYAyAM tu kutve vAkyam ityeva .
vAkyam = vArtikAdirUpaH SAbdikasaMjYAsidDaH granTaH .
2. ‘yajayAcarucapravacarcaSca’ (7-3-66) ityanena kutvanizeDe pravAcyam iti
rUpam . ‘pravAcyam = granTaviSezaH’ iti vfttyAdizu proktam . paraM tu
BAzye (7-3-66) pravacigrahaRapratyAKyAnaprakaraRe ‘prapUrvaSca vaciraSabdasaMjYAyAM
vartate .’ ityuktatvAt granTaviSezasya pravAcyamiti saMjYeti pakzaH cintya iti
uddyote prakftasUtre sPuwam . avivAkyam ityatra tu pfzodarAditvAt (6-3-109),
nyaNkvAditvAt (7-3-53) vA aharviSeze kutvam . dvAdaSAhe daSarAtrasya yajYa-
viSezasya daSamamahaH avivAkyam, yasminnahani yAjYikAH na vibruvate = na
nAnAvAkyAnyuccArayanti . anyatra avivAcyam ityeva .
3. SabdasaMjYAtvAt kutvamatreti jYeyam . anuvAkaH = SrutO viBAgaviSezaH .
pfcCatIti prAw . viSezeRa sUkzmekzikayA nyAyAdikaM bravIti-iti vivAkaH .
prAw cAsO vivAkaSca prAqvivAkaH = nItisTale nyAyavAdI . atrApi ‘halaSca’
(3-3-121) iti saMjYAyAM GaYi kutvamiti jYeyam .
4. punaruktiH, niruktam ityatra ‘kticktO ca saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-174) ityanena ktic
ktaSca saMjYAyAM BavataH . punaruktiriti asakfdAmnAnasya saMjYA . evaM nirukta-
miti granTaviSezasya saMjYA .
1. ‘kfke vacaH kaSca’ [da. u. 1. 91.] iti YuRpratyaye kakArasyAntAdeSe ca rUpa-
mevam . kfkeRa = galena bravItIti kfkavAkuH = kukkuwaH .
A. ‘anunayamagfhItvA vyAjasuptA parAcI
rutamaTa kfkavAkostAramAkarRya kalye .’ Si. va. 11. 9.
2. ORAdike (da. u. 6. 32) Takpratyaye samprasAraRe ca rUpamevam . ukTam =
sAmaviSezaH .

devadattaH . Bakzayati piRqIM devadattena .’ iti RyantAdDetumaRRici prayojyasya

kAmiBakzyAcariByo RaH’ (vA. 3-2-1) ityatrApi bArtika-BAzya-kEyawoddyo-

Rika eveti jYeyam . spazwamidaM mADavaDAtuvfttO prakftaDAtuprakaraRe iti jYeyam .

(1136) “Bakza adane” (X-curAdiH-1557. saka. sew. uBa.)

1. ‘SIlikAmiBakzyAcariByo RaH’ (vA. 3-2-1) iti karmaRyupapade RapratyayaH .
mAMsaM BakzayatIti mAMsaBakzaH . striyAM RapratyayAntatvena wApi mAMsaBakzA iti

atra BakzayatiH ‘sarve sacetanA BAvAH’ iti nyAyena hiMsAyAM vartate . yavAnAM
sacetanatvAt hiMsyatvam .
3. ‘paryAyArharRotpattizu—’ (3-3-111) ityanena arhArTe Rvuc pratyayaH . ikzuBakzaRamarhati
iti ikzuBakzikA .
4. RyantAdasmAt kvipi, saMyogAntalope jaStvacartvayo rUpamevam .

iti wAbantaprayogo loke dfSyate . tasya SAstraM mfgyameva . RyantAt stryaDikArIye

haraDanurasO vallIBaYjaM baBaYja ca mETili .’ SrIguRaratnakoSe 54.

1. sannantARRvuli, ‘halantAcca’ (1-2-10) iti sanaH kittve, dvirvacanAdizu kftezu
DAtudakArasya cartvena takAraH . evamuttaratrApi prakriyA jYeyA .
2. yaNante dvirvacanAdikezu kftezu, ‘guRo yaNlukoH’ (7-4-82) ityaByAse guRaH
sarvatra boDyaH .
B. ‘AttAyuDAhitajanEH saha saMyatitrI SatrormanoraTaSatAnyaTa beBiditrI .’ vA. vi. 3. 51.
3. Satari, ‘ruDAdiByaH—’ (3-1-78) iti Snam vikaraRapratyayaH . sa ca antyAdacaH
paro Bavati . ‘SnasorallopaH’ (6-4-111) iti Snamo'kArasya lopaH . evameva
SAnajante'pi prakriyA jYeyA .
C. ‘nihataSca sTitiM Bindan dAnavo'sO baladvizA .’ Ba. kA. 7. 68.
4. ‘satsUdvizadruhayujavidaBida—’ (3-2-61) ityAdinA karmaRyupapade, upasarge
upapade'pi kvippratyayaH . gotraM BinattIti gotraBit = indraH . udBit =
latAgulmAdiH .
5. ktapratyaye Sakale'BiDeye ‘BittaM Sakalam’ (8-2-59) ityanena nizWAnatvABAvo
nipAtyate . Bittamiti SakalaparyAyo rUQiSabdaH . atra BidikriyA Sabdavyutpatte-
rnimittam . spazwamidaM prakftasUtre BAzyAdizu .
6. SakalAdanyatra, ‘radAByAM nizWAto naH, pUrvasya ca daH’ (8-2-42) ityanena nizWAta-
kAra-DAtudakArayornatve rUpamevam .
1. ‘igupaDa—’ (3-1-135) ityAdinA kartari kapratyayaH . kittvAnna guRaH .
2. ‘kelimara upasaMKyAnam’ (vA. 3-1-96) ityanena kelimarpratyayaH . DAtorasya
sakarmakatvAdayaM karmaRi sampadyate . vfttyAdizu tu ‘karmakartari cAyamizyate’
(kASikA. 3-1-96) ityuktam . ‘BidelimAH saralAH—BettavyAH .’ iti BAzye
(3-1-96) karmArTakena tavyapratyayena vivaraRAt karmArTakatvamevAsya pratyayasyeti
boDyam .
3. ‘vidiBidicCideH kurac’ (3-2-162) iti tAcCIlikaH kuracpratyayaH . karma-
kartari pratyayo'yamiti vfttO lakzyate . BedanakartuH vajrAyuDasya ‘Biduram’ itya-
BiDAnAt SudDakartaryevAyaM pratyaya iti pratiBAti .
A. ‘ayaSo BidurAloke kopaDAmaraRAdfte .’ Si. va. 19. 58.
4. Binatti kUlamityarTe nade'BiDeye kartari ‘BidyodDyO nade’ (3-1-115) iti kyap
nipAtyate . BidyaH = nadaH; aDunA ‘jammU’ rAjye ‘baI’ iti deSaBAzayA
vyavahriyate .
B. ‘toyadAgama ivodDyaBidyayornAmaDeyasadfSaM bicezwitam ..’ raGuvaMSe 11. 8.
5. karRa BinattIti karRaBedI = rUkzaDvaniH, piSunaSca . tAcCIlye Rinipratyaye rUpamevam .
C. ‘tezAM nihanyamAnAnAM saMGuzwEH karRaBediBiH .’ Ba. kA. 9. 21.
6. karmaRyupapade'Ri rUpamevam . ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) ityatra BAzye evaM prayuktam .
7. liwaH kvasO dvirvacanAdikezu kftezu rUpamevam . ‘vasvekAjAdGasAm’ (7-2-67)
ityatra kftadvirvacanasya ekAca eva grahaRAdatra neqiti jYeyam .
8. nandyAderAkftigaRatvAt, ‘kftyalyuwo bahulam’ (3-3-113) iti bahulagrahaRAdvA
kartari lyuH lyuw vA pratyayaH . BedanaH = rogaviSezaH, varAhaSca .
1. striyAm, ‘BidA vidAraRe’ (ga. sU. 3-3-104) iti BidAdipAWAd BAvAdO
aN . anyatra BittiH ityeva . BittiH = kuqyam . svArTe kanpratyaye BittikA
iti Bavati . ‘ik kfzyAdiByaH’ (vA. 3-3-108) itIkpratyaye BidiH ityapi
Bavati .
2. yaNantAt Rici lyapi, ‘lyapi laGupUrvAt’ (6-4-56) iti RerayAdeSaH . kASi-
kAyAm (6-4-56) udAhfto'yam .
3. ‘pFBidi—’ (da. u. 1-108) iti kupratyayaH . BiduH = vajram .
4. ‘izimadimudiKidicCidiBidi—’ (da. u. 8-26) iti kiracpratyaye rUpamevam .
Bidiram = BedaH .
5. ORAdike (da. u. 8-31) rakpratyaye rUpamevam . BidraH = SaraH .

8. ahetuBaye tu (karaRAdijanye Baye tu) RijnimittakavfdDO, AyAdeSe ca rUpamevam .

1. ‘BIsmyorhetuBaye’ (1-3-68) iti RyantAdAtmanepadam .
A. ‘SatrUn BIzayamARaM taM rAmaM vismApayeta kaH .’ Ba. kA. 5-58.
2. ‘YItaH ktaH’ (3-2-187) iti vartamAne kartari ktapratyayaH . vfkaBItaH ityatra

B. ‘aBIruravasaM strIBirBAsvarABiriheSvaraH ..’ Ba. kA. 7-25.

5. viSezeRa BIzayata iti viBIzaRaH . RyantAt nandyAditvAt (3-1-134) kartari
lyuH . zugAgamaH .
C. ‘biByurbiqAlekzaRaBIzaRAByo vEdUryakuqyezu SaSidyutiByaH ..’ Si. va. 3-45.
6. ‘Seze viBAzA'kaKAdAvazAnta upadeSe’ (8-4-18) iti upasargasTAnnimittAt
parasya neH RatvavikalpaH .
1. ‘ajviDO-BayAdInAmupasaMKyAnam, napuMsake ktAdinivfttyarTam’ (vA. 3-3-56)
iti vacanAdatra ‘erac’ (3-3-56) iti BAve'cpratyayaH . acpratyayAntasya

ityuktatvAt napuMsake BAve vihitaH lyuwpratyayo'pyasya DAtorneti jYeyam . vfkaBayam
ityatra ‘paYcamI Bayena’ (2-1-37) iti samAsaH .
2. striyAM BAve sampadAditvAt (vA. 3-3-94) kvip .
3. hetumaRRyantAt bAhulakena ‘a pratyayAt’ (3-3-102) ityakArapratyayaH, yujapavAdaH .
A. ‘jagatpatO paSyati jAtaBIzA prAyastadAliNganamaByanEzIt ..’ yA. a. 13-57.
4. ‘iRBIkA—’ (da. u. 3-21) iti kanpratyaye rUpamevam . biBetIti BekaH .
5. ‘AnakaH SINBiyaH’ (da. u. 3-26) ityAnakapratyayaH . biBeti tasmAditi
BayAnakaH = BIzaRaH . ‘BImAdayo'pAdAne’ (3-4-74) iti apAdAne'yaM pratyayaH .
6. ‘BiyaH zug vA’ (da. u. 7-35) iti makpratyayaH, pakze zugAgamaSca . biBetyasmA-
jjana iti BImaH, BIzmo vA . ‘BImAdayo'pAdAne’ (3-4-74) ityapAdAne'yaM
pratyayo jYeyaH .

1. sannante sarvatra ‘iko Jal’ (1-2-9) iti sanaH kittve, DAtujakArasya zakAre,
tasya ‘zaQoH kaH si’ (8-2-41) iti kakAre ca rUpanizpattirjYeyA .
2. Satari, Sapo ruDAditvena Snami, ‘SnasorallopaH’ (6-4-111) iti Snamo'kArasya
lope nakArasya Scatvena YakAre ca rUpamevam .
3. aByavahArArTe DAtorasya RyantAt, ‘nigaraRacalanArTeByaH’ (1-3-87) iti
SatEva . ‘gatibudDipratyavasAnArTa—’ (1-4-52) ityAdinA aRO kartuH RO
karmasaMjYA'treti viSezaH .
4. ‘Bujo'navane’ (1-3-66) ityanena avanaBinnArTe AtmanepadaM SAnac . Ryante'pi
pAlanArTe SAnajjYeyaH . sannante'pi pAlanArTe ‘pUrvavat sanaH’ (1-3-62) iti
SAnajBavatIti boDyam . DAtUnAmanekArTatvAt, ‘BuYjAnA mAnuzAn BogAn
sarvakAmasamfdDinI .’ (rAmA-ara. 47-4), ‘buBuje pfTivIpAlaH pfTivImeva
kevalAm ..’ (raGuvaMSe. 15-1) ityAdizu, anuBavArTe'pi AtmanepadaM BavatIti
boDyam . spazwamidaM mADavaDAtuvfttO .
5. karmaRyupapade ‘kvip ca’ (3-2-76) iti kartari kvip . baliBuk = vAyasaH .
A. ‘tUzRIM pratyaBijAnate baliBujo BItAH svayUTyasvarAn ..’ anarGarAGave 4. 1.
6. ‘AdikarmaRi ktaH kartari ca’ (3-4-71) iti kartari ktaH .’ ‘praBukto gorasaM kfzRaH
praBukto'nena gorasaH .’ iti pra. sarvasve . asya DAtorBakzaRArTakatvAt ‘kto'Di-
karaRe ca DrOvyagatipratyavasAnArTeByaH’ (3-4-76) iti aDikaraRe'pi
ktapratyayo boDyaH . pratyavasAnArTakAH = BakzaRArTakA DAtavaH .
1. igupaDalakzaRaM kapratyayaM bAGitvA ‘ajviDiH sarvaDAtuByaH paWyante ca pacAdayaH .’
(kA. 3-1-134) iti vacanAt kartari acpratyayaH .
2. viSvaM Bunakti iti viSvaBojaH . ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) ityaRpratyayaH .
3. ‘supyajAtO RinistAcCIlye’ (3-2-78) iti tAcCIlye RinipratyayaH . evaM
SItaBojI, kalahaBojI ityatrApi jYeyam . kalahaM Bunakti = pAlayati iti
kalahaBojI = nAradaH .
A. ‘… purato'Bavat kalahaBojino muneH ..’ ca. BA. 5. 53.
4. ‘vrate’ (3-2-80) iti RinipratyayaH . sati Bojane'SrAdDameva BuNkte ityatra vrataM
gamyate . eva kAMsyaBojI ityatrApi vrate gamye Rinipratyaya iti jYeyam .
5. ‘tAcCIlyavayovacanaSaktizu cAnaS’ (3-2-129) iti cAnaSpratyayaH . tAcCIli-
ko'yaM pratyayaH .
B. ‘balAt buBukzuRotkzipya jahre BImena rakzasA ..’ Ba. kA. 4. 2.
6. ‘BojyaM Bakzye’ (7-3-69) iti Ryati kutvABAvo nipAtyate . ‘Bakzye’ ityatropala
kzaRaM KAdanasAmAnyaDarmasya . tena ‘BojyA yavAgUH’ ityatra pAnArTakasyApi
BojyA iti sidDyati . BakzaRAdiBinnArTe tu ‘cajoH ku GiRRyatoH’ (7-3-52)
iti kutve BogyaH = kambalaH iti sidDyati .
7. ‘BujanyubjO pARyupatApayoH’ (7-3-61) iti pARAvaBiDeye GaYi kutvABAvaH,
guRABAvaSca nipAtyate . Bujyate'neneti BujaH = pARiH . ‘bAhAvaBiDeye Buja
iti prayogo lAkzaRikaH .’ iti bfhacCabdenduSeKare sPuwam . BujAdanyatra GaYi
kutve BogaH = SarIram .
8. ‘halaSca’ (3-3-121) iti saMjYAyAM GaY . BogaH = strIBogAjjAto'kzirogaviSezaH .
kAraRe kAryopacAro'tra . BogaH = sarpakAyaSca .
9. pUrvakAlatvABAve'pi SaknotyarTe ‘SakaDfzajYA—’ (3-4-65) iti tumunpratyayaH .
1. ‘ik kfzyAdiByaH’ (vA. 3-3-108) iti BAve ikpratyayaH . annaBojikA
ityatra utpattirUpArTe ‘paryAyArharRotpattizu Rvuc’ (3-3-111) iti striyAM Rvuc .
‘pAcikA me tvayA deyA protpannA me'nnaBojikA ..’ iti pra. sarvasve .
A. ‘asmAnattumito'Byeti pariglAno buBukzayA ..’ Ba. kA. 7. 84.
2. ‘viBAzA'grepraTamapUrvezu’ (3-4-24) iti agrepraTamapUrvaSabdezUpapadezu samAnakartfkayoH
pUrvakAle ktvARamulO vikalpena BavataH .
3. ‘BujimfNByAm—’ (da. u. 1-135) iti yukpratyayaH . BujyuH = ganDarvaH .
4. ‘ruciBujiByAM kizyan’ (da. u. 8-15) iti kizyanpratyayaH . Bujizyam =
Bogyam . BujizyA = dAsI .

(1162) jYeyAni . 5 BugnaH B -BugnavAn, 6 viBujan-ntI-tI, 7 mUlaviBujaH, [Page0960+ 27] 1 BujaH, 2 BogaH; imAni rUpARyaDikAnyatreti viSezaH .

viSezaH .

upasaMKyAnam’ (vA. 3-2-5) iti karmaRyaRo'pavAdaH kapratyayaH .
1. igupaDalakzaRe kartari kapratyaye rUpamevam .
2. ‘halaSca’ (3-3-121) iti saMjYAyAM GaYi ‘cajoH ku—’ (7-3-52) iti kutve ca
rUpamevam . ‘BogaH = sarpakAyaH .’ iti kzIrasvAmI . “aTavA Boga-
SabdaH SarIravAcyapi dfSyate . tadyaTA— ‘ahiriva BogEH paryeti bAhum—’
(f. ve. 6-75-14) ahiriva SarIrEriti gamyate” iti BAzya (5-1-9)
vacanaprAmARyAt SarIrasAmAnye BogaSabdasya vfttiriti gamyate .

(1164) “Buvo'vakalkane” (X-curAdiH-1748. saka. sew. uBa.)
“avakalkanam = miSrIkaraRam . BAvayati daDnOdanam . anityaRyantatvArTA
paYcamI . ‘vikalkane’ iti nandI . ‘BAvayed brAhmaRaM tapaH .’ —” iti
kzIrasvAmI . “avakalkanaM = cintanam . iti kASyapaH . kvacit
svAmigranTe'nukalkanam-iti paWitvA, ‘anukalkanam = miSrIkaraRam .’
iti dvaSyate . …vikalkanam = vipAcanam (= 3 vipakvI-
karaRam .) taTA ca prayujyate— ‘tapo BAvitamAtmAnam—’ iti . ‘--
avakalpane’ ityapare . taTA ca DanapAlaH…” iti mA. DA. vfttiH .
‘mUlaSudDistvatra kIdfSI? iti na vidmaH .’ iti puruzakAraH .
‘sattAyAM Bavati, prAptO Rici BAvayate taNi .
Bavate Sapi, tatrEva BAvayatyavakalkane ..’ (Slo. 3) iti devaH .
BAvakaH-vikA, 4 biBAvayizakaH-zikA, BAvayitA-trI, biBAvayizitA-trI; 5 BAvayan-ntI, biBAvayizan-ntI; BAvayizyan-ntI-tI, biBAvayizizyan-ntI-tI; [Page0961+ 28]

biBAvayiw-yizO-yizaH; A BAvitam-taH, biBAvayizitaH-tavAn; BAvaH, 1 BAvukaH, 2 BAvanaH, biBAvayizuH; BAvayitavyam, biBAvayizitavyam;
BAvanIyam, biBAvayizaRIyam; BAvyam, biBAvayizyam; IzadBAvaH-

praBAvya, prabiBAvayizya; BAvam 2, BAvayitvA 2, biBAvayizam 2;
biBAvayizitvA 2. iti rUpARyasya Bavanti .
3. ‘praBAvukamannaM Bavati .’ iti kASikAyAm (3-2-154) udAhftam . tasyAnna-
viSezyakatvena vipakvIkaraRArTe vfttirasya DAtoH iti kASikAsammatamiti jYeyam .
4. RyantAt sani, ‘oH puyaRjyapare’ (7-4-80) ityaByAse ikAraH . evamuttaratrApi
jYeyam .
5. ‘BU avakalkane’ iti paWitavye sati, ‘Buvo'vakalkane’ iti pAWaH ‘anitya-
RyantatvArTaM paYcamI .’ iti jYApayatItyAhuH . tena RijaBAvapakze, DAtoScintanArTakatve-
akarmakatvena, cintanasya ca cittavatkartfkatvena ‘aRAvakarmakAt cittavatkartfkAt’
(1-3-87) iti RyantAt parasmEpadameva . miSrIkaraRAdyarTAntare tu yaTAsamBavamAtma-
nepadamapi DAtorasya BavatItyapi boDyam .
A. ‘rozAnDyaBAvitamasfgBirakalpayat taM
kfzRo'pi nAkijanarAkitalAgyavIryaH ..’ DA. kA. 3. 41.
1. tacCIlatadDarmatatsADukArizvarTezu ‘lazapatapadasTABUvfza—’ (3-2-154) ityanena
ukaYpratyayaH . ‘Reraniwi’ (6-4-51) iti RilopaH . ‘na vAcamavamanyante nartakImiva
BAvukAH ..’ (yA. a. 1-7) ityatra, “BAvukAH = BAvanAkfto BagavadBaktAH .
‘Buvo'vakalkane’ iti BavaterRijantAt ‘lazapata—’ (3-2-154) ityAdinA
ukaYpratyayaH . ‘avakalkanam = cintanam .’ iti vyAKyAtam .” iti appayyadI-
kzitokteH DAtorasyEvokaYviDAyake sUtre grahaRamityapi jYAyate .
2. RyantAdasmAt nandyAderAkftigaRatvAt kartari lyuH . BAvanaH = cintakaH .
(atra BAvitam iti miSrIkaraRArTe DAtorvfttiriti jYeyam)

taTApi vArtikakAravacanaprAmARyAt lawaH SatrA'tra luNaH samAveSa iti jYeyam .

5. ‘SryukaH kkiti’ (7-2-11) itIRnizeDo'tra . evameva ktvA-ktinorapi iRnizeDo
jYeyaH .

guRAvAdeSayo rUpamevam . striyAm ‘indravaruRaBava-’ (4-1-49) ityAdinA NIzAnugO .
‘BavateSceti vaktavyam’ (kA. 3-1-143) iti vAkyaM kASikAyAM kartari vikalpena
RapratyayaviDAnaprakaraRe dfSyate . tena pakze kartari BAvaH ityapi jYeyam . paraM tu
vAkyamidaM BAzye na dfSyate .
7. ‘BavyageyapravacanIya—’ (3-4-68) ityAdinA kartari yatpratyayAnto nipAtitaH .
BavatyasO, Bavyamaneneti vA BavyaH .
8. ‘aBiBAvI BUte’ (ga. sU. 3-1-134) iti vacanAt BUtArTe grahyAditvARRini-
pratyayaH .
9. grahyAdizveva (3-1-134) ‘pariBavI-pariBAvI’ iti nipAtanAt Rinipratyaye,
tasya pAkzike vfdDyaBAve ca rUpe ete sidDyataH .
B. ‘pariBAvIRi tArARAM paSya manTIni cetasAm .’ Ba. kA. 6-75.
atra napuMsakaliNge numi, ‘prAtipadikAntanum—’ (8-4-11) iti Ratvam .
10. ‘acAmacittakartfkARAm’ (ga. sU. 3-1-134) ityatra pUrvasmAt gaRasUtrAt ‘--
pratizidDAnAm’ (ga. sU. 3-1-134) ityanuvartate . tenAtra Rinipratyaye rUpamevam .
prakftagaRasUtrasyAyamarTaH—acetanakartfkARAm ajantAnAM DAtUnAM naYyuktAnAM
(naYupapadakAnAm) RinirBavati—iti . tenAtra grahyAditvAt RiniH .
1. ‘Bavizyati gamyAdayaH’ (3-3-3) ityatra gaRe BAvI iti pAWAt BavizyatyarTe
RinipratyayaH .
2. vA'sarUpanyAyena ‘RvultfcO’ (3-1-133) iti yaTAkramaM Rvuli, tfci ca rUpa-
mevamiti jYeyam .
3. tacCIlAdizu kartfzu ‘tfn’ (3-2-135) iti tfnpratyaye rUpamevam .
4. AQyasuBagasTUlapalitanagnAnDapriyapadezUpapadezu satsu cvarTezu gamyezu acvyantezu
‘kartari BuvaH KizRucKukaYO’ (3-2-57) ityanena KizRuc KukaY ca pratyayaH
krameRAtreti jYeyam . pratyayayoH KittvAt, ‘arurdvizadajantasya mum’ (6-3-67)
iti mumAgamaH .
A. ‘AQyamBavizRuryaSasA kumAraH priyamBavizRurna sa yasya nAsIt ..’ Ba. kA. 3. 1.
B. ‘hfdayaNgamamUrtistvaM suBagamBAvukaM vanam .’ Ba. kA. 5. 67.
C. ‘dalodare kAYcanakEtakasya kzaRanmazIBAvukavarRareKam .’ nEzaDe. 6. 63.
5. ‘BuvaSca’ (3-2-138) itIzRucpratyayastacCIlatadDarmatatsADukArizvarTezu Bavati .
atra pUrvaMsUtrAt ‘—Candasi’ (3-2-137) ityanuvftteH CandasyevAyaM pratyaya iti
jYeyam . cAndrAstu BAzAyAmapyasya prayogamicCanti .
6. ‘glAjisTaSca gsnuH’ (3-2-139) iti sUtre cakAreRa tatpUrvasUtragataBUDAtorapyanu-
zaNgAt atra gsnupratyayaH . pratyayasya gittvAt ‘kNiti ca’ (1-1-5) ityatra
gakArasyApi praSlezAt guRo neti jYeyam . evaM ‘SryukaH kkiti’ (7-2-11) ityatrApi
gakArapraSlezaRAt iRnizeDo'tretyapi jYeyam .
7. ‘lazapatapadasTABU-’ (3-2-154) ityanena tAcCIlike ukaYpratyaye rUpamevam .
tAcCIlikezu vA'sarUpaviDirnAstIti BAzyAdizu spazwam . tena utsargeRa samAveSa
evetarezAM pratyayAnAmiti jYeyam .
8. ‘jidfkziviSrIRvamAvyaTAByamapariBUprasUByaSca’ (3-2-157) ityanena tAcCIlike
inipratyaye rUpamevam . atra sUtre pariBU ityukteH anyopasarge upapade pratyayo'yaM
na BavatIti jYeyam .
1. ‘BuvaH saMjYA'ntarayoH’ (3-2-179) iti kvippratyayaH . viBUH iti kasyacit
saMjYA . atra sUtre antaraSabdena DanikADamarRayorantarAlavartI ucyate . pratiBUH =
krayavikrayAdizu fRAdAnapratyarpaRAdizu ca maDyavartI sAkzI .
2. upasarge, padAntare ca upapade DAtusAmAnyavihitaH kvippratyayo'treti yaTAsamBavamUhyam .
3. ‘biprasaMByo qvasaMjYAyAm’ (3-2-180) iti BUDAtorasya vi-pra-saM-pUrvakasya
qupratyayaH . pratyayasya qittvAt werlopaH .
4. ‘quprakaraRe—mi[tra]tadru—AdiBya upasaMKyAnam—’ (vA. 3-2-180) iti qupratyayaH .
SaM BAvayatIti SamBuH . antarBAvitaRyarTo'tra Bavatiriti jYeyam .
5. BavatAt iti BavakaH . ASizi gamyamAnAyAm, ‘ASizi ca’ (3-1-150)
iti vun .
6. ‘DenorBavyAyAM mum—’ (vA. 6-3-70) iti mumAgamaH . DenurBavizyatItyarTaH .
bAhulakAdatra BavizyatyarTe Buvo yatpratyayaH iti jYeyam .
7. liwaH kvasO rUpamevam . ‘vasvekAjAdGasAm’ (7-2-67) iti sUtropAttanidAnasyAtra
lakzye'BAvAdiqAgamo na . mADavaDAtuvfttO tu kvasorBAzAyAM prayogABAvaH
sAgrahaM sADitaH . ‘viBAzA pUrvAhRAparAhRAByAm’ (4-3-24) ityatra BAzye, ‘papuza
AgataM papivadrUpyam—’ iti prayuktatvAt BAzAyAmapi kvasuprayogo nAprAmARika
iti jYeyam .
8. ‘kticktO ca saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-174) iti saMjYAyAM ktic . puMlliNgo'yaM SabdaH .
evaM BUtaH ityatrApi saMjYAyAM ktapratyayo jYeyaH .
9. nandyAdeH (3-1-134) AkftigaRatvAt RyantAt kartari lyupratyayo'treti jYeyam .
A. ‘praBurbuBUzurBuvanatrayasya yaH SiroDirAgAddaSamaM cikartizuH .’ Si. va. 1. 49.
10. RyantAt sani, ‘oH puyaRjyapare’ (7-4-80) ityaByAse ikAraH .
11. ‘na BABUpU—’ (8-4-34) ityAdinA upasargasTAnnimittAt parasya kftsTasya nakArasya
RatvanizeDaH .
12. ‘RyantaBAdInAmupasaMKyAnam’ (vA. 8-4-34) iti upasargasTAnnimittAt parasya
nakArasya RatvanizeDaH .
1. ‘orAvaSyake’ (3-1-125) ityAvaSyakArTe Ryat . ‘lumpedavaSyamaH kftye…’
(kA. 6-1-144) iti avaSyamo makArasya lopaH . AvaSyakArTe Ryadatreti pradarSa-
nArTamatra ‘avaSyam’ iti padamupAttam; na tu upapadatvena; vinEvAvaSyapadamapi
prayogaH sADureva . taTA ca prayuktam— ‘vipreRa SucinA BAvyam—’ (pra. kOmudyu-
pAtto'yaM SlokaH) iti .
2. ‘Buvo BAve’ (3-1-107) iti BAvArTe kyap . brahmaBUyaM gataH = brahmaBAvaM
gata ityarTaMH .
A. ‘mitraBUyaM gatastasya ripuhatyAM karizyasi ..’ Ba. kA. 6. 55.
3. IzadAdyupapadezu kartaMri karmaRi copapadayoH satyoH cvyarTe gamye ‘kartfkarmaRoSca
BUkfYoH’ (3-3-127) iti KalpratyayaH . upapadadvayaviDAnAt BAzyakAraprayogAcca
kartfvAcakasya copapadasya DAtoravyavahitapUrvaprayoga iti jYeyam .
‘akarmatvAd Buvo BAve kfYaH karmArTa eva tat .
cvyarTayogaSca vAcyo'tra BavatezatpawumBavam ..
apawoste pawutvena BavanaM laDvitIryate .
evaM svAQyamBavaM tena, tayA dussundarimBavam ..’ iti pra. sarvasva-
Sloko'trAnusanDeyaH .
B. ‘sEnyAnna yAtaH samayApi vivyaTe kaTaM surAjamBavamanyaTA'TavA ..’ Si. va. 12-52.
4. ‘Fdorap’ (3-3-57) iti BAve'ppratyayaH .
5. ‘napuMsake BAve ktaH’ (3-3-114), ‘BAve’ (3-3-18), ‘—BAvavacanAt’
(2-3-15) ‘BAvavacanASca’ (3-3-11) ityAdinirdeSaprAmARyAt uvarRAntatvena prApto-
'ppratyayaH pAkzikaH; tena, ‘abADakAnyapi nipAtanAni’ (pari. 121) iti nyAyena
GaYpratyayo'pi BavatIti kecit . BAzye ‘bADakAnyeva hi nipAtanAni Bavanti’
(BAzyam 1-1-27) ityuktatvAt GaYpratyaya eva BAvArTe nyAyyaH, na tu orappratyaya
iti pare vadanti . sarvaMTA rUpametadapi sADviti jYeyam .
6. ‘parO Buvo'vajYAne’ (3-3-55) iti vikalpena GaYpratyayo'trAvajYAne gamye .
pakze Otsargiko'ppratyaya iti jYeyam . parIBAvaH ityatra ‘upasargasya GaYyamanuzye
bahulam’ (6-3-122) iti dIrGavikalpaH .
C. ‘pariBAvaM mfgendrARAM kurvanto nagamUrDasu .’ Ba. kA. 7-54.
1. ‘striyAM ktin’ (3-3-94) iti ktini, iRnizeDe ca rUpamevam . ‘mantre vfzeza-
pacamanavidaBUvIrA udAttaH’ (3-3-96) ityatra BU ityupAdAnAt mantra eva BUti-
SabdaH prayogArha iti na mantavyam; pratyayasya nittvenAdyudAttatve prApte udAttatvArTaM
sUtramiti samADiH . spazwaM cEtat mA. DA. vfttO .
2. BavatyasyAM sarvaMmiti BUH . bAhulakena sampadAditvAt (3-3-94) aDikaraRe
striyAM kvip .
3. lyuwi rUpamevam . bAhulakAd guRABAvo'treti jYeyam . BawwikAvyavyAKyAne
(1-1) prAcInErvyAKyAkArErevameva samarTitam .
4. ‘ASite BuvaH karaRaBAvayoH’ (3-2-45) iti karaRe BAve cArTe ASita-
Sabde upapade KacpratyayaH . ‘arurdvizadajantasya—’ (6-3-67) iti mum .
ASito Bavatyaneneti ASitamBavaH = odanaH . karaRe'tra pratyayaH . ASitasya
Bavanam-ASitamBavaM vartate . BAve'tra pratyayaH .
A. ‘ASitamBavamutkruzwaM valgitaM SayitaM sTitam .’ Ba. kA. 6-107.
5. ‘viBAzA'grepraTamapUrvezu’ (3-4-24) ityanena ktvApratyayo'tra vikalpena BavatIti
jYeyam . evaM RamulapyuttaratrAnenEva sUtreReti jYeyam .
6. taspratyaye svANgavAcinyupapade DAtorasya, ‘svANge taspratyaye kfBvoH’ (3-4-61)
iti ktvApratyayo'treti jYeyam . ‘tftIyApraBftIni—’ (2-2-21) iti samAsa-
vikalpaH . tena samAse'tra lyabapIti jYeyam . RamulapyanenEva BavatItyapi boDyam .
7. ‘nADArTapratyaye cvyarTe’ (3-4-62) iti ktvARamulO BavataH . cvyarTakatvAt
anAnA nAnA BUtvA = nAnABUtvA gataH, iti vfttiratra jYeyA . tftIyA-
praBftitvAt (2-2-21) samAsavikalpaH . DArTapratyayAH ‘saMKyAyAH viDArTe DA’
(5-3-42), ‘dvivyoSca DamuY’ (5-3-45) iti sUtravihitAH pratyayAH .
8. ‘tUzRImi BuvaH’ (3-4-63) iti ktvARamulO BavataH . atrApi samAsa-
vikalpaH . tena lyabantaprayogo'pyupapannaH .
B. ‘tUzRImBUya BayAdAsAYcakrire mfgapakziRaH ..’ Ba. kA. 5. 95.
1. ‘anvacyAnulomye’ (3-4-64) ityanenAnvakCabda upapade DAtorasyAnulomye dyotye
ktvARamulO BavataH . tftIyApraBftitvAt (2-2-21) samAsavikalpaH . Anu-
lomyam = anukUlatA .
2. ‘BuvaH kit’ (da. u. 1-16) iti mipratyayaH, sa ca kit . tena guRo na .
BavantyasyAM BAvA iti BUmiH .
3. ‘adiSadiBU—’ (da. u. 1. 34) iti krinpratyayaH . BavatIti BUriH =
bahuH, suvarRaM ca .
4. ‘adi Buvo qutac’ (da. u. 6-22) iti qutacpratyayaH .
5. ‘BUvAdi—’ (da. u. 8-91) ityAdinA RitranpratyayaH . BAvitram = viDAnam .

boBUyakaH-yikA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi RyantaprakftikasannantaM
vinA BOvAdikaBUDAtuvat (1165) jYeyAni . asya DAtoH ADfzIyatvena
Rico vEkalpikatvam . RyantAt sani sarvARi rUpARi avakalkanArTaka-
BAvayativat (1164) boDyAni .
[a] ‘BU prAptO, AtmanepadI’ iti curAdizu (ADfzIyezu) paWyate . ADfzI-
yatvenAsya RijvikalpaH . RijaBAvapakze Atmanepadameva, parasmEpadameva iti cAtra
pakzadvayam . RicsanniyogenEvAtmanepadaviDAnam, RijaBAvapakze tu parasmEpadameveti
puruzakAre sapramARaM sAgrahaM ca sADitam . RijaBAvapakze AtmanepadamevAsya
DAtorityatra kzIrasvAminA ‘yAcitAraSca naH santu dAtAraSca BavAmahE .’
iti SlokaH kaScidudAhftaH . ‘manoramA BA Bavate—’ iti Sloko'pyAtmane-
padAnukUlatvena suDAkareRa BUvAdisUtre (1-3-1) udAhfta iti mA. DAtu-
vfttyAdigranTAt jYAyate . ‘Bavate Sapi tatrEva—’ (Slo. 3) iti vadan
deGo'pyatrAnukUlaH . ‘varzABvaSca’ (6-4-84) ityatra ‘varzAsu Bavati, varzA vA
Bavate’ iti kEyawavivaraRamapyatrAnukUlam . ‘anye tu purARavyAkaraRezu
‘Buvo RiN’ iti sUtrasya RiNo NakAraH pratyayAntAdAtmanepadArTaH, prakftO tu
kevalAditi SrIBadrAdiBiH vyAKyAnAt tantrAntaravacanAnuroDena sanni-
yoganyAyo bADyate ityAhuH .” iti DAtuvfttivacanAdAtmanepadaM RijaBAva-
pakze'pi prAmARikam, bahuvEyAkaraRasammataM ceti jYeyam .

rUpameva sarvatreti jYeyam . spazwamidaM BAzyapradIpoddyote (6-4-47) .
1. tfci, rePopaDAnivfttO ramAgame ca jakArasya zakAre zwutve BarzwA iti rUpam .
ramaBAvapakze tu, ‘skoH—’ (8-2-29) iti sakAralope zatvazwutvayoSca BrarzwA iti
rUpamiti jYeyam . evameva tavyadAdizvapi prakriyohyA .
2. Satari, tudAditvena kartari Sapratyaye, tasya sArvaDAtukatvena, ‘sArvaDAtukamapit’
(1-2-4) iti NidvadBAvaH . tena samprasAraRAdizu rUpamevam . evaM SAnacyapi prakriyA
jYeyA .
3. kvipi, padAntanimittake saMyogAdilope, samprasAraRe, jakArasya zatve jaStvacartvayoSca
rUpamevam . DAnABfw = BrAzwram . kASikAyAm (8-2-36) udAhftametat padam .
4. nizWAyAm, samprasArane pUrbarUpe zatvazwutvayoSca rUpam . evameva ktvA-ktinpraBftizvapi
prakriyA jYeyA . kzIrataraNgiRyAM ‘prasAraRavizaye nezyate—Bfzwaluci (Yci?)
tiliNgAt .’ iti vAkyaM lakzyate . tasyAyamarTaH — saMprasAraRayogyasTale ‘Brasjo
ropaDayo ramanyatarasyAm’ (6-4-47) iti sUtrasya pravfttirna; tatra nidAnaM tu
rAjadantAdigaRe (2-2-31) Bfzwaluci (Yci?) tapadasya nirdeSarUpAt liNgAt—iti .
atra gaRe (2-2-31) kASikAdizu mfzwaluYcitam ityeva padaM paWitam,
gaRaratnamahodaDO rAjadantAdigaRe (pu 120-121) “pUrvaM luYcitam = apanI-
tam, paScAd Bfzwam = pakvam BfzwaluYcitam . yaTA— ‘yadBfzwaluYcitaSaSeva
SaSANkapAtrI .” ityuktamihAvaDeyam .
A. ‘… praBfzwapalalAn kzipan arimatiM kfzan mADavaH .’ DA. kA. 2. 72.
A. ‘ASvAsyAkzaH kzaRAllokAn biBrakzuriva tejasA .
ruzA biBrajjizupraKyaM kapiM bAREravAkirat ..’ Ba. kA. 9. 34.
1. yaNantAt pacAdyaci, ‘yaNo'ci ca’ (2-4-74) iti yaNo luki, lukA lupte sTale
sTAnivattvapratizeDena yaNnimittakaNittvAnASrayaRAt samprasAraRAdikaM na Bavati .
ArGaDAtukaparatvABAvAt ramAgamarePopaDAnivfttyAdikamapi na Bavati . tenAtra
yaTASAstram, aByAse ‘dIrGo'kitaH’ (7-4-83) iti dIrGaH . uttaraKaRqe sakArasya
ScutvajaStve ca Bavata iti jYeyam .
2. DAtorasya nizWAyAmaniwtvena, Ryati, ropaDanivfttiramAgamapakze, ‘cajoH ku GiR-
RyatoH’ (7-3-52) iti jakArasya kutve Bargyam (H) iti rUpam . ramA-
gamAdyaBAvapakze tu, ‘pUrvatrAsidDam’ (8-2-1) iti SAstrAt jaStvAt pUrvaM ‘cajoH—’
(7-3-52) iti kutve, paScAt sakArasya jaStvena dakAre ca Bradgyam (H) iti
rUpamiti jYeyam . evameva GaYyapi rUpadvayasya nizpattO nidAnaM jYeyam .
3. lyapaH sTAnivattvena kittvAt samprasAraRe, sakArasya Scutve ca rUpamevam .
1. ‘praTimradiBrasjAM samprasAraRaM salopaSca’ (da. u. 1. 113) ityanena kupratyaye
samprasAraRe sakAralope, nyaNkvAditvAt (7-3-53) kutve ca rUpamevam . Bfjjati =
paripakvavijYAno BavatIti BfguH = maharziviSezaH .
2. ‘BUsUDUBrasjiByaSCandasi’ (da. u. 5. 25) iti kyunpratyaye samprasAraRe ca rUpam .
bAhulakAt loke'pi prayogaH .
3. Brasjigami—’ [da. u. 8-80] ityAdinA zwranpratyayaH vfdDiSca, bAhulakAt
ramAgamo na . upaDAsakArasya lopastu Bavatyeva . DAtujakArasya zatve zwutve ca
rUpamevam . BrAzwram = BarjanasADanIBUtaH pAtraviSezaH .

(1187) “wu BrAjf dIptO” (I-BvAdiH-181. 823 aka. sew. Atma.) [a]
BrAjakaH-jikA, BrAjakaH-jikA, biBrAjizakaH-zikA, bABrAjakaH-jikA; [Page0984+ 30]
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi prAtisvikarUpARi vinA, BOvAdikakASativat
(186) jYeyAni . kvipi-- 1 viBrAk A -viBrAg-viBrAjO-viBrAjaH, 2 BrAjizRuH B, 3 viBrAw-viBrAq-viBrAjO-viBrAjaH, 4 BrAjaTuH, 5 baBrAjivAn, baBrAjivAn-
BrejivAn, 6 BrAtA, 7 naBrAw, BrAzwiH, iti rUpARyasya samBavantIti viSezaH . [Page0985+ 27]
[a] BvAdO praTamataH, ‘BrAjf dIptO’ iti paWitvA, punarGawAdO ‘wu BrAjf
dIptO’ iti paWyate . imO uBAvapi dIptyarTakO fditO ceti jYAyate .
nyAsakArastu ‘BrAja dIptO’ ityeva ‘BrAjaBAsaDurvi—’ (3-2-177)
ityatra papAWa . padamaYjaryAmapi (7-4-3) ‘BrAja dIptO’ ityeva pAWo lakzyate .
‘BrAjaDAtoH fditkaraRamapARinIyam .’ iti kASikA (7-4-3) atra jYeyA .
‘… fdittvamanudAttettvamAtraPalam .’ iti mA. DA. vfttiH . fdittvasya
tiNanta evopayogAdasmABiruBAvapi DAtU samuccityopAttO . GawAdizveva PaRAdayaH
sapta DAtavo'nte paWitAH . tatra ‘wu BrAjf—’ ityeva pAWaH ttyAsakAra-mEtrEya-
rakzita-puruzakAra-sAyaRa-sidDAntakOmudyAdisammataH . kzIrasvAmI tu
‘BrAjf, wu BrASf—’ ityAdi paWitvA, ‘wuruBayasya—ityeke . ‘wvito'-
Tuc’ (3-3-89) BrAjaTuH .” ityAha . cAndrARAM kASakftsnIyAnAM
ca DAtupAWe BrAja ityeva GawAdO paWitaH na tu ‘wu BrAjf’ iti kzI. wIkAyAM
pratipAditam . etat sarvamatrAnusanDeyam . ‘avaSyapaWitavyena Pa[PA?]RAdikena
BrAjate ityAdInAM sidDeH iha (= GawAdiBinnasTale BvAdizu) pAWo'nArza iva .’
iti nyAsakAravacanaM mA. DA. vfttO upAttamapyatrAvaDeyam .
1. ‘BrAjaBAsaDurvi—’ (3-2-177) ityAdinA tacCIlAdizu kartfzu kvippratyayaH .
‘coH kuH’ (8-2-30) iti padAnte kutvam . etacca GawAdizvarpAMWatasya ‘BrAjf
dIptO, iti BOvAdikasya BrAjateH kvipi rUpamiti jYeyam .
A. ‘aBreji viBrAgBiranIjitESca yat kadA'pyaSocadBiraSezajantuBiH .’ DA. kA. 1. 25.
2. ‘BuvaSca’ (3-2-138) ityatra cakAreRAsmAdapi DAtoH iRRucpratyaya iti kASikA-
dizUcyate . atrapi BrAjizRuriti dviviDasyApi BrAjateH sampadyate iti bahavaH .
‘BrAjizRunA lohitacandanena—’ iti kASikAmupAdAya padamaYjaryAm--
‘nEtad BAzye samASritam .’ ityuktam . idAnIM BAzyakoSezu ‘BuvaSca’
(3-2-138) iti sUtrasya BAzyameva nopalaBAmahe . DAtukAvyavyAKyAne tu
(2-20) GAwAdikasya ‘wu BrAjf—’ iti DAtoH izRucpratyaya iti pratipAditam .
B. ‘kfzRo'pi reje paTi gopabAlEH BrAjizRuBiH BrASitapArSvadeSaH .’ DA. kA. 2. 20.
3. ‘wu BrAjf—’ ityasya tAcCIlike kvipi, ‘vraScaBrasjasfjamfjayajarAjaBrAja—’
(8-2-36) ityanena zatve, jaStvacartvayoSca rUpamevam . kvibviDAyake sUtre
kASikAyAm (3-2-177) viBrAw ityudAhftatve'pi, sUtre GawAdipaWitayoH
taditarayoruBayorapi BrAjaDAtvorgrahaRameva; zatvaM tu ‘vraScaBrasja—’ (8-2-36)
ityatra rAjaDAtusAhacaryAt PaRAdi (GawAdi) BrAjatereva ityAdikaM prakftasTale
mA. DA. vfttO sPuwam .
4. ‘wvito'Tuc’ (3-3-89) iti BAve'Tucpratyaye rUpamevam .
5. kartari liwaH kvasO GawAderanyatra paWitasya BrAjate rUpamevam . GAwAdikasya
kvasO tu, ‘PaRAM ca saptAnAm’ (6-4-125) ityetvAByAsalopavikalpaH . tena
rUpadvayamiti jYeyam .
6. ‘BrAjate iti BrAtA’ iti rUpaM kzIrataraNgiRyAM, daSapAdyuRAdivfttO ca
(da. u. 2. 3) BrAjatestfni, tfci vA, pfzodarAditvAt (6-3-109) jakAralope
ca sADitam . BAzye (1-2-68) tu ‘yadi tAvad biBartIti BrAtA’
ityuktatvAt biBarterDAtoreva BrAtfSabdanizpAdanaM nyAyyamiti pratiBAti .
7. ‘na BrAjate iti naBrAw . naYsamAse, ‘na BrARnapAt—’ (6-3-75) ityAdinA naYaH
prakftiBAvaH .

(1194) “Blakza adane” (I-BvAdiH-893. aka. sew. uBa.)
‘Bakza’ iti kzIrasvAmI iti mA. DAtuvfttAvuktam . puruzakAre'pyevameva .

BakzaH .’ ityuktatvAt adanArTakasya BakzaterBvAdizu kutrApyapAWAt, enameva [Page0987+ 28]

plakzaSAKA—” (mEtrAyaRIyasaMhitA-6-3-10-2) iti SrutyanusAreRa
prapUrvakAt kzarateH pacAdyaci kapilakAderAkftigaRatvAt (vA. 8-2-18)

pAWo'yaM nirasta iti jYeyam . SatapaTabrAhmaRe (3-8-3-12) ‘praKyo havE
nAmEtat yat plakzaH .’ ityuktamapIha Dyeyam .

(1207) “maqi viBAjane” (I-BvAdiH-272. saka. sew. Atma.) [a]
‘BUzArTe maRqatIti syAt tatra maRqayatIti RO .
maRqate vezwane… ..’ (Slo. 84) iti devaH .
maRqakaH-RqikA, maRqakaH-RqikA, mimaRqizakaH-zikA, mAmaRqakaH-RqikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakaRWativat (149) jYeyAni . 1 maRqitA, 2 maRqUkaH, 3 maRqalam, ityAdInyasmAd BavantIti viSezaH . A maRqitaH .
[a] DAtupAWe ‘vaqi viBAjane; maqi ca’ iti pAWyate . tatra ‘vaqi maqi viBA-
jane’ ityekadEva paWitavye pfTak sUtrakaraRAt arTAntare'pi maqiDAturvartate iti
kzIrasvAmyAdayaH pratipAdayanti . tad yaTA maRqaH = rasAgram . atra taRqulA-
dInAM pacanAvasare kvaTanAnantaraM ya UrDvaM rasasyAvaraRarUpeRAvirBAvaH sa rasAgrami-
tyucyate; atrApi DAtorasya vfttirityarTaH . evam, maRqUram (= lohamalam)
maRqalam, maRqapaH ityAdizvapyasya DAtorarTAntaravfttirjYeyA . kASakftsna-
DAtupAWIyavyAKyAyAM (kannaqaBAzAmayyAM) ‘vaqi maqi vezwane’ iti pawyate
iti kzI wIkA (pf. 41) . “nandI tu ‘maqi vezwane’ iti paWati .” iti
DAtuvfttiH . paraM tu kzIrataraNgiRyAM— “nandI tu ‘vawi viBAjane, vaqi
vezwane’ iti BaNgyA paWati .” ityeva dfSyate . IdfSasTalezu SudDapAWaH kIdfSa
iti granTErnirDArayituM na Sakyate . sarvaTA maqiDAturanekArTaka iti sAraH .
1. tAcCIlike tfni rUpamevam . ‘kruDamaRqArTeByaSca’ (3-2-151) ityatra yujviDO

maRqUkaH = BekaH .

maRqalam = parivAraH .

(1210) “maRa SabdArTaH” (I-BvAdiH-448. aka. sew. para.)
mARakaH-RikA, mARakaH-RikA, mimaRizakaH-zikA, mammaRakaH-maMmaRakaH-

lokaprayogato'rTAntare vfttirityUhyamiti pradarSanAyAsmABiretadatropAttam .

mandakaH-ndikA, mandakaH-ndikA, mimandizakaH-zikA, mAmandakaH-ndikA;

mandAkinI iti sidDyati . mandAkinI = nadIviSezaH .

A. ‘kapitoyaniDIn plavaNgamendurmadayitvA maDureRa darSanena .’ Ba. kA. 10. 28.

iti Go vA . cakArAt GaY ca . yadvA malate DArayatItyarTe aci rUpamevam .
‘vimardotTe parimalo ganDe janamanohare .’ ityamaraH (1. 10) .
5. ‘malyate DAryate iti mAlA, GaY . saMjYAyAM puMstvaM prAyikam’ iti pra. sarvasve .
vrIhyAditvAt (5-2-116) inipratyaye mAlI iti .
1. ‘izwakezIkAmAlAnAM citatUlaBArizu’ (6-3-65) tati BArinSabde uttarapade
mAlASabdasya hrasve rUpamevam = mAlaBAriRI = kanyA . ‘tadantasyApi
grahaRam’ iti vacanAt utpalamAlaBAriRI = kanyA ityapi Bavati .
2. ‘fhalorRyat’ (3-1-124) iti Ryati rUpamevam .

matvarTe saMjYAyAM vizaye ete SabdAH nipAtyante . inacpratyaye—malinaH,
Imasapratyaye-malImasaH iti jYeyam .
4. ‘kvun SilpisaMjYayoH—’ (da. u. 3. 5) iti kvunpratyaye, striyAm, ‘zidgO-
rAdiByaSca’ (4-1-41) iti NIzi ca rUpamevam .
5. ‘valimalitaniByaH kayan’ (da. u. 8. 10) iti kayanpratyaye rUpamevam .
malayaH = BUDaraviSezaH .
A. ‘mAmalyamAnaM smitamallikAvalImABAlyadEtyADipaBallanodDuram .’ DA. kA. 1. 64.

mAsakaH-sikA, mAsakaH-sikA, mimasizakaH-zikA, mAmasakaH-sikA;

prakftyantaram, nAsmAdDAtoH sidDamiti jYeyam .

9. mAne = parimARe'BiDeye ‘pAyyasAnnAyyanikAyyaDAyyA mAnahavirnivAsasAmiDe-
nIzu’ (3-1-129) ityanena RyadAyAdeSO AdeH pakAraSca nipAtyante .
1. yagantAcCAnaSi IkAre mIyamAnaH iti sidDyati . kzIrasvAmI tu ‘GumAsTA-
—’ (6-4-66) iti sUtre nAsya DAtorgrahaRamiti ‘sarvatra hi pAmAgrahaRaM lugvikaraRasya
Ratvavarjam’ iti vacanaM kiYcidupAdAya mAyate iti yaki rUpaM sADitavAn
BAzyAdizu nEtAdfSaM vacanamupalaByate . prakriyAkOmudIkAraM varjayitvA
sarve'pi ‘gAmAdAgrahaRezvaviSezaH’ (pari. 116) iti pariBAzAmavalambya
‘GumAsTA—’ (6-4-66) ityAdizu sarvatra mAgrahaRezvasyApi grahaRamicCanti .
spazwamidaM mADavaDAtuvfttyAdizu .
2. A = samantAt mIyate'treti AmaH = apakvapadArTaH . aDikaraRe ‘GaYarTe
kaviDAnam—’ (vA. 3-3-58) iti kapratyaye, AkAralope rUpamevam .
3. striyAM BAvAdO, ‘AtaScopasarge’ (3-3-106) iti ktinnapavAdo'NpratyayaH .
‘Ato lopa iwi ca’ (6-4-64) ityAkAralope adantatvena wApi pramA, upamA
ityAdikaM sidDyati . pramitiH, upamitiH, anumitiH ityAdayastu bAhulakAt
ktini sidDyantIti jYeyam .
4. samAse ktvApratyayasya lyabAdeSe, ‘na lyapi’ (6-4-69) itIkAranizeDaH .
5. ‘mApo rurI ca’ (da. u. 1-157) iti rupratyaye IkAre cAntAdeSe guRe rUpamevam .
mAti sUryenduByAmiti meruH = suragiriH .
6. ‘huyAmA—’ (da. u. 8. 84) iti tranpratyaye rUpamevam . mIyate'neneti mAtrA =
alpaparimARam .
7. mAtItyarTe ‘mAsaSca’ (da. u. 9. 27) iti sapratyayo nipAtyate . mAsaH =
triMSaddinaparicCinnaH kAlaviSezaH .

1. Rvuli vfdDO satyAM ejantatvena ‘mInAtiminotidINAm—’ (6-1-50) ityanena
Atve, ‘Ato yuk ciRkftoH’ (7-3-33) iti yugAgamaH . evaM GaYAdizvapi boDyam .
2. RicpratyayotvatteranantaraM vfdDO kftAyAm ejantatvAt Atve, AdantalakzaRe pugAgame ca
rUpamevam . Ryante sarvatra evameva prakriyA jYeyA .
3. ‘iko Jal’ (1-2-9) iti sanaH kittve, ‘ajJanagamAM sani’ (6-4-16) iti
dIrGe ‘sani mImA—’ (7-4-54) iti isBAve ‘saH syArDaDAtuke’ (7-4-49)
iti sakArasya tatve, ‘atra lopo'ByAsasya’ (7-4-58) ityaByAsalope ca rUpam .
evaM sannante sarvatra boDyam . mADavaDAtuvfttO sannantarUpapradarSanAvasare'tra,
“—mitsati, mitsate, ‘iko Jal’ (1-2-9) iti sanaH kittvAt, ‘ajJa-
nagamAM sani’ (6-4-16) iti dIrGe—” ityAdyuktam . asyAyaM BAvaH . anEmittika
AkAraH praTamato na pravartate . DAtoH igantatvena ‘iko Jal’ (1-2-9) ityAdisUtre
sanaH kittvAt, ejvizaya evAkAraviDAnAt iti .
4. yaNante ‘akftsArvaDAtukayoH—’ (7-4-25) iti dIrGe dvirvacanAdikezu ca kftezu,
‘guRo yaNlukoH’ (7-4-82) iti guRaH .
5. Satari, ‘svAdiByaH—’ (3-1-73) iti Snupratyaye, ‘huSnuvoH sArvaDAtuke’
(6-4-87) iti yaRi ca rUpamevam . SAnajante'pyevameva .
6. nizWAyAmAkAro na pravartate; AkAraviDAyake sUtre (6-1-50) ‘Adeca upadeSe
'Siti’ (6-1-45) ityataH ‘ecaH’ ityanuvartanAt, tasya ca guRayogyapratyayezveva
parezu Atvamiti jYApanAt . ataSca nizWApratyayasya kittvAt na guRaH, tena
rUpamevam . spazwamidaM prakftasUtre (6-1-50) BAzye . evameva ktvAktinpraBftizvapi
jYeyam .
A. ‘sunvatpriyaM tamaTa rAgasitASitAgram
AronmitAstranicayAstftamAnasAntA .’ DA. kA. 2. 68.
1. pacAdyaci, ‘nimimIliyAM KalacoH pratizeDaH’ (vA. 6-1-50) iti AkAra-
pratizeDaH . guRe'yAdeSe ca rUpamevam . atra vArtike ‘ac’ padena pacAdyacaH
(3-1-134), eraca (3-3-56) Sca grahaRamiti kEyawAdO pratipAditam . atra
vArtike nipUrvakasyEva minoteH grahaRAd, upasargAntare, upapadeSudDe ca AkAra eva
Bavediti jYAyate . tadAnIm, ‘AtaScopasarge’ (3-1-136) iti kapratyaye, ‘Ato
lopa iwi ca’ (6-4-64) ityAkAralope ca pramaH iti rUpamapi sADviti
pratiBAti .
2. nandyAditvAt kartari Rinipratyaye yugAgame ca rUpamevam .
3. yaNantAt pacAdyaci yaNo luki ‘eranekAcaH—’ (6-4-82) iti yaRi ca rUpamevam .
4. ‘nergadanadapatapadaGumA—’ (8-4-17) iti nerRatve rUpamevam .
5. yatpratyaye, anEmittika AkAre, ‘Id yati’ (6-4-65) itIkAre guRe ca rUpam .
6. DAtorasya sakarmakatvAt karmaRi Kalpratyaye, ‘nimimIliyAM KalacoH pratizeDaH’
(vA. 6-1-50) iti AkArapratizeDe guRAyAdeSayo rUpamevam .
7. DAtorasyevarRAntAtvat, GaYapavAdatayA ‘erac’ (3-3-56) iti BAve'cpratyaye
AkArapratizeDe ca rUpamevam .
8. lyapi, ‘mInAtiminotidINAM lyapi ca’ (6-1-50) iti AkAre rUpamevam .
anyaTA ktvApratyayAdeSaBUtasya lyapa ejvizayatvABAvena AkAro na syAt,
tadarTameva ‘—lyapi ca’ (6-1-50) ityuktamiti jYeyam .
1. ‘vAtapramIH’ (u. u-1-85) iti sUtreRa prapUrvakAt vAtaSabde upapade vAtaM
pramiRotItyarTe Ipratyaye nizpanno'yaM SabdaH . vAtapramIH = SamIvfkzaH, pakzI ca .
2. ‘kfvApAjimi—’ (da. u. 1-86) ityuRpratyaye yugAgamaH . mIyate'neneti mAyuH
mAnam . gAM minoti = hinastIti gomAyuH = SfgAlaH .
3. ‘BfmfSItFcaritsaritanimi—’ (da. u. 1-92) ityupratyaye bAhulakAdAkArABAve
guRAyAdeSayoSca rUpamevam .
4. ‘naptfnezwf—’ (da. u. 2-3) iti tfnpratyaye tfcpratyaye vA jAyAM minotItyarTe
jAyASabdasya jAdeSe ca nipAtito'yaM SabdaH . jAmAtA = duhituH patiH .
5. ‘SuzicimiByo dIrGaSca’ (da. u. 8. 43) iti kranpratyaye prakftedIrGe ca rUpamevam .
minoti iti mIraH = deSasImA .

(1254) “miTf meDAhiMsanayoH”

(1255) “Yi midA snehane” (I-BvAdiH-743. saka. sew. Atma.)
‘medate medyatItyete snehane, mindayeRRici .
fdito medate medenmeDAhiMsanayordvayoH ..’ (Slo. 104) iti devaH .
haradattastu DAtorasya BvAdizu pAWaM nAnumene iti ‘nizWA SIN—’ (1-2-19)

medakaH-dikA, medakaH-dikA, mimedizakaH-mimidizakaH-zikA, memidakaH-
dikA; meditA-trI, medayitA-trI, mimedizitA-mimidizitA-trI; memiditA-trI;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakzvedativat (326) jYeyAni . [Page1024+ 31]
nizWAyAm-- 1 minnaH, A 2 prameditam-praminnam-[anena], praminnaH, B prameditaH, 3 meduraH, C 4 medaH, 5 medinI, 6 mitram-mitrA, 7 medaH, itImAni
GAtorasmAd viSezeRa Bavanti . asyAtmanepaditvAt SAnaci medamAnaH,
medizyamARaH, ityAdIni rUpARi BavantIti jYeyam .
1. ‘YItaH ktaH’ (3-2-187) iti vartamAne kartari ktapratyaye, ‘AditaSca’ (7-216)
iti iRnizeDe ca, ‘radAByAM nizWAto naH, pUrvasya ca daH’ (8-2-42) iti nizWA-
takAraDAtudakArayornatve ca rUpamevam .
A. ‘udvfttanayano minnAn mantriRaH svAn vyasarjayat ..’ Ba. kA. 9. 16.
2. asyEva DAtornizWAyAm BAve AdikarmaRi ca, ‘viBAzA BAvAdikarmaRoH’ (7-2-17)
itIqvikalpe, iwpakze, ‘nizWA SINsvidimidikzvidiDfzaH’ (1-2-19) iti
sewo nizWAyAH kittvanizeDAd guRe prameditam, prameditaH iti BavataH .
iqaBAvapakze tu kartrarTakaktapratyayAntavat prakriyA jYeyA .
B. ‘prameditAH saputrAste susvAntA bAQavikramAH .’ Ba. kA. 9. 17.
3. ‘BaYjaBAsamido Gurac’ (3-2-161) iti tacCIlAdizu kartfzu Guracpratyaye guRe ca
rUpamevam . meduraH = vasAviSezavAn paSvAdiH .
C. ‘pradyotanasyodayamApya gopAH SvetAMSukonmeduracAruvezAH .’ DA. kA. 2. 1.
4. kartari pacAdyaci guRe ca rUpamevam . medaH = asuraviSezaH .
5. grahyAditvAt (3-1-134) kartari Rinipratyaye striyAm, ‘fnneByaH—’ (4-1-5)
iti NIpi ca rUpamevam . medinI = BUmiH .
6. ‘amicimidiSasiByaH ktraH’ (da. u. 8. 86) iti ktrapratyaye rUpamevam .
medatIti mitram = suhft . suhfdi aBiDeye napuMsakaliNgatvam, sUrye tu pu~lliNgatA,
ganDadravye tu strIliNgatvamasyEva padasyeti jYeyam .
7. ‘asun’ (da. u. 9-49) ityasmAdasunpratyaye guRe ca rUpamevam . medaH = vasA .

mehakaH-hikA, mehakaH-hikA, mimikzakaH-kzikA, memihakaH-hikA; meQA- [Page1029+ 28]

rogaviSezaH .

mandicanditimimihi—’ (da. u. 8-26) ityAdinA kiracpratyaye rUpamevam .

iti numi ca muYcan iti rUpam . evameva SAnajante'pi muYcAna ityatra
prakriyohyA .

jYeyam . muktA = mOktikotpattisTAnam .

na . tataH mocyam ityapi sADuH . “—‘amocyamaSvaM yadi manyase… .’
(raGuvaMSe 3-65) ityatrAvaSyake RyaH . ‘Rya AvaSyake’ (7-3-65) iti kutva-
nizeDaH .” iti mA. DA. vfttivacanamihAnusanDeyam .

8. 26] ityAdinA kiracpratyaye rUpamevam .
3. ‘zivimucyozwerU ca’ [da. u. 8. 83] iti zwranpratyaye werUkAre ca rUpamevam .
mucyate taditi mUtram . manoramAyAM tu mUtraDAtoreva prakftarUpe sidDe'trEvaM
sADanaM svarArTamityuktam .

rasyAnuktasamuccayArTatvAt vartamAne ktaH . tato naYsamAsaH .

martaSabdAt, ‘navasUramartayavizWeByo yat’ (vA. 5-4-36) iti svArTe yatpratyaye
martyaH iti sidDyati . martyaH = manuzyaH .

(1336) “yata nikAropaskArayoH”
(X-curAdiH-1736. saka. sew. uBa.) [a]

bAlamanoramA . ‘pariBavasaMskArO tO’ iti DA. kA. vyAKyA (3-40) .
yAtakaH-tikA-yiyAtayizakaH-zikA; yAtayitA-trI, yiyAtayizitA-trI;

yAtanA = tIvravedanA . ‘RyAsaSranTaH—’ (3-3-107) iti yuci rUpam .

pariBavaH .’ iti ca kzIrasvAmI . upaskAropasaMskArayoH punaH pAWakftaH
(= grAnTikAH) vipravadante . taTA ca AKyAtaniGaRwuH— ‘yatne prEze nirAkAre
yAtayedapyupaskftO .’ iti . SlokaDAtupAWaSca— ‘yata upasaMskAranikArArTaH
sa niraSca DAnyaDanavAcI .’ iti .” iti . atredamavaDeyam—mADavaDAtu-
vftti-prOQamanoramApraBftizvapyevameva kzIrasvAmipAWa udDriyate . paraM tu
kzIrataraNgiRyAmaDunA pAWo'nyAdfSa evopalaByata ityuparyeva pradarSitam . prAyaH
sarve'pyADunikAH vEyAkaraRAH DAtuvizaye kzIrasvAmimataM puruzakAropAttasTalezu
puruzakAravAkyAnusAreREvodDaranti; na tu svayaM dfzwatvenetya pi jYAyate .
