7. ‘pUrvavat sanaH’ (1-3-62) iti sanaH prakfternidAna eva sannantAdatrApi SAnajiti
jYeyam .
1. ripUn yacCati = uparataM karoti ityarTe karmaRyupapade, ‘kvip ca’ (3-2-76) iti
kvip . ‘gamAdInAm—’ (vA. 6-4-40) iti vacanAdanunAsikalope tuki rUpamevam .
2. ‘anyeByo'pi dfSyante’ (3-2-75) iti kvipi rUpamevam . viyat = vizRupadam .
3. nizWAyAm, ‘anudAttopadeSavanatitanotyAdInAmanunAsikalopo Jali kNiti’
(6-4-37) ityanunAsikalope rUpam . evameva ktvAktinpraBftizvapi rUpanizpattirjYeyA .
4. yacCatIti yamaH . kartari pacAdyac .
5. ‘vAci yamo vrate’ (3-2-40) iti vAgrUpe karmaRyupapade KacpratyayaH . ‘vAcaMyama-
purandarO ca’ (6-3-69) ityanenAmantatvaM nipAtyate . nipAtanAd dvitIyAyAH
aluk . vAcaMyamaH = mOnavratI .
A. ‘vAcamyamAn sTaRqilaSAyinaSca yuyukzamARAnaniSaM mumukzUn .’ Ba. kA. 3-41.
6. ‘kticktO ca saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-174) iti kartari saMjYAyAM kticpratyayaH, bAhulakAt
‘na ktici dIrGaSca’ (6-4-39) iti na pravartate . nitarAM mana AdikaM yacCatIti
yatiH . anunAsikalopo'pi bAhulakAdeveti jYeyam . kecit tu ‘striyAM ktin’
(3-3-94) iti ktin, bAhulakAt pu~lliNgatvamiti vadanti .
7. tacCIlAdizu kartfzu, ‘sampfcAnuruDANyama—’ (3-2-142) ityAdinA,
ANpUrvakAdasmAd GinuRpratyaye rUpamevam .
8. vrataBinnArTe vivakzite, vAcaM yacCatItyarTe ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) ityaRpratyaye rUpamevam .
9. RyantAt, nandyAditvAt (3-1-134) kartari-lyupratyaye anAdeSe ca rUpam .
10. ‘gadamadacarayamaScAnupasarge’ (3-1-100) iti halantalakzaRaRyadapavAdatayA
yatpratyayaH . yadyapi, ‘poradupaDAt’ (3-1-98) ityevAtra yat sidDaH, taTApi
sa yat anupasfzwAdeva DAtoriti samarTanAya pfTak yamaDAtorupAdAnamiti jYeyam .
evaM nirUQatvAt, upasfzwe tu niyAmyam ityAdikAni RyadantAnyeva sADUni .
11. ‘—anupasarge’ (3-1-100) ityuktatvAt, kaTamatra sopasargasTale yatpratyayasyopa-
pattiriti SaNkitvA, ‘tena na tatra Baved viniyamyam .’ iti
vyAGraBUtikArikAyAM ‘viniyamyam’ ityuktatvAt, vipUrvakAt,
nipUrvakAcca yadeveti vyAKyAtAraH samarTayanti . tena, ‘aniyamyasya
nAyuktiH—’ (nyAyakusumAYjaliH 3-19) ‘tvayA niyamyA nanu divyacakzuzA—’
ityAdiprayogA upapannA iti jYeyam .
1. utpUrvakAdasmAd GaYi, yadyapi vfdDO satyAm—udyAmaH iti nyAyyam; taTApi
‘aqa udyame’ (BvAdiH-aka. sew.) ityAdinirdeSabalAdatra BAve'beveti vyAKyAnezu
samarTitam
2. ‘yamaH samupanivizu ca’ (3-3-63) iti vEkalpiko'ppratyayaH . pakze GaY .
tena rUpadvayamatra sarvatreti jYeyam . bAhulakAt, saMjYAyAM puMsi Gapratyaye vA yamaH
ityapi sADuH . yamo'syAstIti yamI .
A. ‘saMyAmavanto yativat, ninAdAnapare'mucan ..’ Ba. kA. 7. 57.
3. striyAM BAvAdO ktinpratyaye'nunAsikalope ca rUpamevam . yatiH = vfttezu vicCitti-
viSezadyotako'vasAnaviSezaH .
4. ‘sampadAdiByaH—’ (vA. 3-3-108) iti BAve striyAM kvipi, ‘gamAdInAmiti
vaktavyam’ (vA. 6-4-40) ityanunAsikalope tuki ca rUpamevam . bAhulakAdatra kvibiti
jYeyam . saMyat = yudDam . surUpiRI kanyA ca .
B. ‘niSamyayA maYjugirA kadA naH sa yAmayedvA yamanAdikArye ..’ DA. kA. 2. 18.
5. ktvAyAmanunAsikalope rUpamevam . “udiditi SrIBojaH . yatvA, yami-
tvA .” iti kzIrasvAmI . tanmate DAtorasya valAdyArDaDAtukezu sarvatra
yamitA-yantA ityAdikAni rUpARi jYeyAni . paraM tu BAzye (7-2-10)
aniwkArikAprakarane yamaDAtorasyopasaMgrahaRAt pakzo'yamaprAmARika iti, yami-
tvA ityAdayaH prayogA apARinIyA iti, yadi tezAM prAmARikatvaM, tadA vyAkara-
RAntararItyA, bAhulakAdvA nirvAhaH karaRIya iti ca jYeyam .
6. ‘vA lyapi’ (6-4-38) ityatra vyavasTitaviBAzASrayaRAt, makArAntAnAmaniwAM
vikalpenAnunAsikalopaH . tenAnunAsikalopapakze tuki, tadaBAvapakze ca rUpadvaya-
matreti jYeyam .
7. RyantAllyapi, mittvapakze upaDAhrasve, ‘lyapi laGupUrvAt’ (6-4-56) iti
RerayAdeSaH .
1. RyantAt mittvapakze, ‘ciRRamuloH—’ (6-4-93) iti dIrGavikalpanAdrUpadvayamiti
boDyam .
2. ‘ajiyamiSINByaSca’ [da. u. 5-61] ityunanpratyayaH . yamunA = nadIviSezaH .
3. ‘gfDfvIpacivaciyami—’ [da. u. 8. 89] iti trapratyayaH . yacCatIti yantram =
SarIrasADanam, pIqanaYca .
4. ‘kvun SilpisaMjYayoH—’ [da. u. 3. 5] iti saMjYAyAM kvuni rUpamevam .
yamakam = SabdAlaNkAraviSezaH .

(1341) “yama ca parivezaRe” (X-curAdiH-1626. saka. sew. uBa.) [a]
‘yameruparame yacCet yamayet parivezaRe .’ (Slo. 148) iti devaH .
yamakaH-yamikA, yiyamayizakaH-zikA, yamayitA-trI, yiyamayizitA-trI;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi cOrAdikacahayativat (515) jYeyAni . Satari A suyamayan .
[a] curAdizu jYapAdipaYcakaDAtuprakaraRe ‘yama ca parivezaRe’ (ga. sU. curAdO)
iti paWyate . tasyAyamarTaH—parivezaRe = parivezwane'rTe yamaDAtuScurAdizu
boDyaH; tasya ca kramaprApto mittvAdistu BavatIti . parivezaRaBinnArTe tu Otsa-
rgike BvAdipAWe, tasmAdDetumaRRici niyAmayati, niyAmakaH ityAdikAni
rUpARi tiNantAdizu BavantIti jYeyam . ‘yama ca—’ iti durgAdisammataH
pAWaH . cakArarahitapAWastu kzIrataraNgiRIdfzwaH . ‘aparivezaRe’ ityapi
kezAYcitpAWa iti kzIrataraNgiRyAdito jYAyate; sa ca pAWaH puruzakAra-
mADavaDAtuvfttipraBftizu KaRqita ityalam . parivezaRam = vezwanam . BvAdizu
paWitasya ‘yamo'parivezaRe’ ityasya tu ‘parivezaRam = Bojanam’ ityarTa
iti boDyam .
A. ‘caRqAtakaM suyamayan cahako baBAze .’ DA. kA. 3-25.

(1342) “yasu prayatne” (IV-divAdiH-1210. aka. sew. para.)
yAsakaH-sikA, yAsakaH-sikA, yiyasizakaH-zikA, yAyasakaH-sikA;
yastA-yastrI, yAsayitA-trI, yiyasizitA-trI, yAyasitA-trI; [Page1075+ 28]
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikagrasativat (440) jYeyAni . Satari-- 1 yasyan-ntI, yasan-ntI, prayasyan- A Ayasyan-ntI, 2 saMyasyan-saMyasan-ntI, 3 AyAsI, B 4 AyAsayan-ntI, AyAsayamAnaH, 5 yastvA-yasitvA, 6 prayAsI,
yastaH-yastavAn itImAni rUpARyasya viSezeRa BavantIti jYeyam .
1. Satari divAditvAt nityaM Syanpratyaye prApte, ‘yaso'nupasargAt’ (3-1-71) iti
vikalpena Syan . pakze Otsargike Sapi yasan-ntI iti rUpamiti boDyam .
A. ‘aTAyasyan kazAyAkzaH svinnaHsvedakaRolbaRaH .’ Ba. kA. 5. 83.
2. ‘saMyasaSca’ (3-1-72) iti saMpUrvakAdapi SyanvikalpaH . ‘— anupasargAt’
(3-1-71) ityuktatvAt aprApte'nena sUtreRa sampUrvakasyApi vEkalpikaH Syan iti
jYeyam .
3. tacCIlAdizu kartfzu ‘sampfcAnuruDANyamANyasa—’ (3-2-142) ityAdinA Dinu-
Rpratyaye rUpamevam .
B. ‘saMjvAriReva manasA DvAntamAyAsinA mayA .’ Ba. kA. 7. 6.
4. prayatnasya cittavatkartfkatvAdasmAt RyantAt ‘aRAvakarmakAt—’ (1-3-88) ityAdinA
parasmEpade prApte, ‘na pAdamyANyamANyasa—’ (1-3-89) ityAdinA ANpUrvakAt
parasmEpadanizeDaH . tena paragAmini kriyAPale parasmEpadam, AtmagAmini kriyA-
Pale tu ‘RicaSca’ (1-3-74) iti AtmanepadaM BavatIti jYeyam . etacca mADavA-
dyanuroDenoktam . kzIrasvAmI tu— “— ‘na pAdami—’ (1-3-89) iti taN--
AyAsayate .” ityuktavAn . tenAsya mate parasmEpadanizeDAdAtmanepadameva
nyAyyamiti jYAyate . vastutastu mADavoktameva nyAyyamityalam .
5. ‘udito vA’ (7-2-56) iti ktvAyAmiqvikalpaH . tena rUpadvayam . etena
nizWAyAmiRnizeDe yastaH, yastavAn iti rUpanizpattiriti jYeyam .
6. bAhulakAt, grahyAderAkftigaRatvena ‘AvaSyakADamarRyayorRiniH’ (3-3-170) ityane-
nAvaSyakArTe vA prapUrvakAdasmAt Rinipratyaye prayAsI iti rUpam . vastutaH
prapUrvakAdasmAdGaYi, GaYantAt matvarTIya inipratyaye'pi rUpanizpAdanaM nyAyyamiti
boDyam .

(1343) “yA prApaRe” (II-adAdiH-1049. saka. ani. para.)
prApaRam = gatiH .
yAyakaH-yikA, yApakaH-pikA, yiyAsakaH-sikA, yAyAyakaH-yikA; yAtA-trI,
yApayitA-trI, yiyAsitA-trI; yAyAyitA-trI, ityAdikAni sarvARyapi rUpARi [Page1076+ 29]
AdAdikaBAtivat (1153) jYeyAni . 1 praRiyAn-tI-ntI, 2 yAnIyaH, 3 yeyaH, 4 aDvanyaturaNgayAyI, A anuyAyI, 5 prayAyI-pratiyAyI, 6 saNgrAmayAyI, B 7 SuBaMyAH aBiyAH C, 8 yAyAvaraH, D prayARam, 9 prayApaRam-prayApanam, [Page1077+ 29] 1 ayayaH, A prayiyAsayantaH, B 2 aprayARiH, 3 yayAtiH, 4 yAtA, 5 yayuH, 6 mfgayuH-devayuH-kevalayuH-grahayuH-mitrayuH-mantrayuH-aDvaryuH, 7 yAtuH, 8 yAmaH, 9 yAtrA .
1. Satari, adAditvAcCapo luki, ‘nergadanadapatapadaGumAsyatihantiyAti—’
(8-4-17) ityAdinA upasargasTAnnimittAt parasya nerRatve rUpamevam . striyAm,
‘AcCInadyoH—’ (7-1-80) iti numvikalpaH .
2. ‘kftyalyuwo bahulam’ (3-3-113) iti bAhulakatvAByanujYAnAdatra karaRe'nIyar-
pratyayaH . yAntyaneneti yAnIyaH = aSvaH .
3. karmaRi yatpratyaye, ‘Id yati’ (6-4-65) itIkAre guRe ca rUpamevam .
4. aDvanyaturaNgena yAtIti aDvanyaturaNgayAyI . ‘supyajAtO—’ (3-2-78)
iti tAcCIlye RinipratyayaH . ‘Ato yuk—’ (7-3-33) iti yugAgamaH .
evam anuyAyI ityatrApi rUpanizpattirjYeyA . upasargopapade'pyanena Riniriti
BAzyAdO spazwam .
A. ‘kzipraM tato'DvanyaturaNgayAyI yavizWavad vfdDatamo'pi rAjA .’ Ba. kA. 2. 44.
5. ‘Bavizyati gamyAdayaH’ (3-3-3) ityatra gamyAdigaRe pAWAt ORAdike Rini-
pratyaye yugAgame ca rUpamevam . BavizyatkAle'yaM pratyaya iti jYeyam . AyAyI
iti kASikA (3-3-3) pAWaH .
6. ‘AvaSyakADamarRyayorRiniH’ (3-3-170) ityAvaSyakArTe Rinipratyaye rUpamevam .
B. ‘smarantaH paScimAmAjYAM BartuH saNgrAmayAyinaH .’ raGuvaMSe--17. 8.
7. SuBaM yAtIti SuBaMyAH = SuBAnvitaH . ‘kvip ca’ (3-2-76) iti kvip .
C. ‘aBiyA'ata''AvaraM tuNgaM BUBftaM ruciraM puraH .’ Ba. kA. 10-21.
8. yaNantAt, ‘yaSca yaNaH’ (3-2-176) iti tAcCIlike varaci dvirvacanAdi-
kezu rUpamevam . atra DAtorasya gatyarTakatvAt ‘nityaM kOwilye gatO’ (3-1-23)
iti kOwilyArTe = kuwilaM gacCatItyarTa eva yaN—iti prAYcaH . anye tu
yAyAvaraH ityasya ekatrAniyatasTAnArTakatayA vivaraRAt, muniviSeze pada-
syAsya rUQatvAdatra kOwilyArTakayaNo'saMmBavAt, ‘DAtorekAco halAdeH—’
(3-1-22) ityAdinA kriyAsamaBihAre (= pOnaHpunye, BfSArTo vA) yaNeva
iti vadanti .
D. ‘yAyAvarA lAkzaRikAH kaWASca kOSikyanubrAhmaRipEppalAdAH .’ vA. vi. 3. 18.
9. ‘RerviBAzA’ (8-4-30) iti RatvavikalpaH . prayARam ityatra tu ‘kftyacaH’
(8-4-29) iti nityaM Ratvamiti boDyam .
1. ayaH = SuBAvaho viDiH, ayaM yAtIti ayayaH . ‘Ato'nupasarge kaH’ (3-2-3)
iti kartari kapratyayaH .
A. ‘sa sAsiH sAsasUH sAso yeyAyeyAyayAyayaH .’ kirAtArjunIye 15-5.
B. ‘aSiSravan AtyayikaM tametya dUtA yadArTaM prayiyAsayantaH .’ Ba. kA. 3. 25.
2. ‘AkroSe naYyaniH’ (3-3-112) iti naYupapadAdasmAd anipratyayaH .
AkroSaH = SApaH .
3. “ktini bAhulakAd dvirvacanam” ityAtreyaH—iti mA. DA. vfttiH . striyA-
meva ktino viDAnAt kticastu pu~lliNge'pi sadBAvAt ktici, bAhulakAdeva dvirvacana-
miti jYeyam .
4. tAcCIlike, ORAdike vA tfni, rUpamevam . striyAm, ‘na zawsvasrAdiByaH’
(4-1-10) iti NIbnizeDaH . yAtA = devarapatnI .
5. ‘yo dve ca’ [da. u. 1-106] ityupratyaye dvirvacane, NidvadBAvenAkAralope ca rUpam .
yayuH = aSvameTIyaH, svargamArgaSca .
6. ‘mfgayvAdayaSca’ [da. u. 1-121] iti kupratyaye, AkAralope ca rUpARyetAni .
atrEva gaRe aDvaraSabdasyAntalopaSca nipAtanAdeveti jYeyam . mfgayuH = vyADaH,
devayuH = DArmikaH . kevalayuH = mAnI . grahayuH = grahapatiH, mitrayuH = mitra-
batsalaH, fziviSezaSca . mantrayuH = mantrI, aDvaryuH = ftvigviSezaH . mfgam
Atmana icCatItyarTe ‘supa AtmanaH kyac’ (3-1-8) iti kyacpratyaye, ‘sanA-
dyantA DAtavaH’ (3-1-32) iti DAtusaMjYAyAm, ‘kyAcCandasi’ (3-2-170)
iti upratyaye rUpanizpattirapIdfSasTalezu nAnupapanneti jYeyam . taTAhi— ‘mitrayuH,
saMsvedayuH, sumnayuH’ itImAni kASikAyAm evameva (3-1-170) sADitAni .
7. ‘kamimanijanigABApAyA—’ [da. u. 1-125] iti tupratyaye rUpamevam .
yAtuH = pAvakaH, manaSca . rAkzasa iti kzIrasvAmI .
8. ORAdike [da. u. 7-26] manpratyaye rUpam . yAmaH = kAlaviSezaH .
9. ‘huyAmA—’ [da. u. 8-84] iti tranpratyayaH . yAtrA = gamanam, AcAraSca .
aByavahAra iti kecit .

(1344) “wu yAcf yAcYAyAm” (I-BvAdiH-863. dvika. sew. uBa.)
yAcakaH-cikA, yAcakaH-cikA, yiyAcizakaH-zikA, yAyAcakaH-cikA;
yAcitA-trI, yAcayitA-trI, yiyAcizitA-trI, yAyAcitA-trI; [baliM vasuDAM] [Page1078+ 32] 1 yAcan-ntI, A yAcamAnaH, ityAdikAni sarvARyapi rUpARi
BOvAdikakAsativat (188) jYeyAni . 2 yAcaTuH, yAcitrimam, 3 yAcYA, 4 ayAcI, 5 yAcyam, 6 yAcitam-yAcitakam, yAcA, itImAni rUpARi
DAtorasmAdBavantIti viSezaH .
1. ‘akaTitaM ca’ (1-4-51) ityatra BAzye ‘duhiyAciruDi—’ (vyAGnaBUtikA-
rikA. 1-4-51) parigaRanAt dvikarmakatvam . DAtorasya uBayapaditvAt SatA, SAna-
cceti jYeyam .
A. ‘so'pfcCat lakzmaRaM sItAM yAcamAnaH SivaM surAn .’ Ba. kA. 6-8.
2. ‘wvito'Tuc’ (3-3-89) iti BAve'TucpratyayaH . kzIrasvAmyAdayaH DAtumamuM
qvitaM paWitvA ‘qvitaH ktriH’ (3-3-88) iti ktripratyaye, ‘ktrermamnityam’
(4-4-20) iti mappratyaye yAcitrimam iti rUpaM sADayanti . “kecit qvitaM
paWanti—tadapi pramARam .” iti DAtuvfttirihAnusanDeyA .
3. ‘yajayAca—’ (3-3-90) ityAdinA BAve naNpratyayaH . ‘neq vaSi’ (7-2-8)
itIRnizeDaH . ‘stoH ScunA—’ (8-4-40) iti Scutvam . strIliNgatvaM svaBAvAt .
4. ‘yAcfvyAhfsaMvyAhfvrajavadavasAM pratizidDAnAm’ (ga. sU. 3-1-134) iti Rini-
pratyayaH . pratizidDAnAm = naYpUrvARAmityarTaH . ayAcI = yaH sarvAtmanA yAcanaM
vinEva dehayAtrAM karoti sa evamucyate .
5. Ryati, ‘yajayAcarucapravacarcaSca’ (7-3-66) iti kutvanizeDaH . ‘nizWAyAmaniwaH
kutvavacanAt’ (vA. 7-3-52) iti vArtikAnusaraRe tu nizWAyAmasya DAtoH sew-
tvAt kutvameva na pravartate . yaTottaraM munInAM prAmARyAt vArtikAnusaraRameva yuktam .
6. nizWAyAmevaM rUpam . nizWAntAt ‘apamityayAcitAByAM kakkanO’ (4-4-21) iti
nirvfttArTe tftIyAntAt yaTAsamBavaM kanpratyaye yAcitakam = yAcitena nirvfttam iti .

(1345) “yu miSraRe” (II-adAdiH-1033. saka. sew. para.)
‘— amiSraRe ca’ ityapi kvacit pAWaH .
‘yAvayeta jugupsAyAm, miSraRe yOti, banDane .
yunAti ca yunIte ca— … ..’ (Slo. 24) iti devaH .
yAvakaH-vikA, yAvakaH-vikA, 7 yiyavizakaH-yuyUzakaH-zikA, 8 yoyUyakaH-yikA; [Page1079+ 26]
yavitA-trI, yAvayitA-trI, yiyavizitA-yuyUzitA-trI, yoyUyitA-trI; A yuvan-tI, yAvayan-ntI, yiyavizan-yuyUzan-ntI; --
yavizyan-ntI-tI, yAvayizyan-ntI-tI, yiyavizizyan-yuyUzizyan-ntI-tI; --
— yAvayamAnaH, — yoyUyamAnaH;
— yAvayizyamARaH, — yoyUyizyamARaH;
niyut-niyutO-niyutaH; — — -- 1 yutam-yutaH-yutavAn, yAvitaH, yiyavizitaH-yuyUzitaH, yoyUyitaH-tavAn; 2 yavaH-yavAnI, 3 yavanaH-yavanAnI, yavanI, 4 yavakaH, yAvaH, yAvakaH, 5 yAvakam, yAvaH, yiyavizuH B -yuyUzuH- 6 yiyAvayizuH, yoyuvaH;
yavitavyam, yAvayitavyam, yiyavizitavyam-yuyUzitavyam, yoyUyitavyam; 7 prayavaRIyam, praRiyavanIyam-praniyavanIyam, 8 prayAvanIyam-prayAvaRIyam, yiyavizaRIyam-yuyUzaRIyam, yoyUyanIyam; [Page1080+ 26] 1 yAvyam, yAvyam, yiyavizyam-yuyUzyam, yoyUyyam;
IzadyavaH-duryavaH-suyavaH; — — -- 2 yUyamAnaH, yAvyamAnaH, yiyavizyamARaH-yuyUzyamARaH, yoyUyyamAnaH; 3 prayavaH, 4 saMyAvaH, 5 udyAvaH, 6 udyAvaH, 7 yavaH, 8 yotram, 9 yOtram, yAvaH, yiyavizaH, yuyUzaH, yoyUyaH;
yavitum, yAvayitum, yiyavizitum-yuyUzitum, yoyUyitum; 10 yUtiH, yAvanA, yiyavizA-yuyUzA, yoyUyA;
yavanam, yAvanam, yiyavizaRam-yuyUzaRam, yoyUyanam;
yutvA, yAvayitvA, yiyavizitvA-yuyUzitvA, yoyUyitvA;
prayutya, 11 prayUya, prayAvya, prayiyavizya-prayuyUzya, prayoyUyya; [Page1081+ 27]
yAvam 2, yutvA 2, yAvam 2, yAvayitvA, yiyavizam 2, yiyavizitvA 2, yoyUyam 2; yoyUyitvA 2; 1 yoniH, 2 yUkaH-yUkA, 3 yUTaH, 4 yuvA-yuvatiH, 5 yUpaH, 6 yUzaH, 7 yozA, 8 yavAgUH .
7. ‘imAMstu sewaH pravadanti tadvidaH .… taTorRotimaTo yuRukzRavaH .’ (BAzye-
7-2-10) iti vyAGraBUtikArikAyAmupAttatvAdasya sewtvam . sannante tu,
‘sanIvantarDaBrasjadamBuSrisvfyUrRuBara—’ (7-2-49) iti iqvikalpaH . iwpakze, ‘oH
puyaRjyapare’ (7-4-80) ityaByAsasyekAraH . iqaBAvapakze JalAditvAt sanaH kittve,

nakAralopaH . taduktaM BAzye—’ ‘GinuRi nipAtanAt sidDam’ (BAzyam 6-4-24)
iti . RittvAdupaDAvfdDO, ‘cajoH ku GiRRyatoH’ (7-3-52) iti kutve ca rUpa-
mevam . anurAgI ityAdayastu GaYantAt matvarTIya inipratyaye sADava iti boDyam .
3. rajati, rajate vA iti raYjanaH . bAhulakAt ‘kftyalyuwo bahulam’ (3-3-113)
iti kartari lyuw . yadvA, ‘Silpini zvun’ (3-1-145) iti sUtraBAzye
‘nftiKaniraYjiByaH—’ iti vacanAt kartari zvun . na cAtra nalopaH SaNkyaH,
‘kita evEte ORAdikAH’ iti zAzWaBAzyAt (6-4-24) ORAdikakyunpratya-
yAnta eva nalopa ityetaduttaratra spazwIkarizyamARatvAt ityalamatra .
4. manAMsyanuraYjayatIti mano'nuraYjanaH . nandyAditvAt (3-1-134) karmaRyupapade
kartari lyuH . gOrAdi (4-1-41) pAWAt striyAM NIz . evameva rasikaraYjanI-
praBftayaH SabdAH sADavaH . rasikaraYjinI iti prayogasattve tu ‘supyajAtO—’
(3-2-78) iti Rinipratyaye, ‘fnneByo NIp’ (4-1-5) iti NIpi tasya sADutvaM
boDyam .
5. ‘Silpini zvun’ (3-1-145) ityatra, ‘nftiKaniraYjiBya iti vaktavyam’ iti
BAzyAt kartari zvun . vastutastu zazWe (6-4-24) “kita evEte ORAdikAH .”
iti BAzyeRa ‘rajakarajanarajassUpasaMKyAnaM kartavyam’ (vA. 6-4-24) iti
vArtikapratyAKyAnapareRa, “rajakaH ityatra ‘kvun SilpisaMjYayoH—’ [da. u. 3-5]
iti kvunpratyayaH . rajakI iti ‘puMyogAdAKyAyAm’ (4-1-48) iti NIz .
apuMyoge tu NIzA na BAvyam iti BAzyakArABiprAyaH .” iti kEyawena ca
nirRItatvAt atra prayoge zvun na, kyunevetyataH nyAsa-padamaYjaryAdaya upekzyAH .
taduktam SabdakOstume— “evaYca, BAzyamate nftiKaniByAmeva zvun . na tu
raYjeH iti sTitam .” (3-1-145) iti . vistarastvanyatra .
6. ‘kuzirajoH prAcAM Syan parasmEpadaM ca’ (3-1-90) iti karmakartari vikalpena
SyanpratyayaH parasmEpadaM ca . yagAtmanepadayorapavAdO . etacca vyavasTitaviBAzeti
kASikAdizu spazwam . SyanaH apitsArvaDAtukatvena NidvadBAvaH . tena,
‘aniditAm—’ (6-4-24) iti upaDAnakAralopaH . striyAm, ‘AcCI-
nadyornum’ (7-1-80) iti numvikalpaH .
1. nizWAyAmaniwtvAt Ryati, ‘cajoH ku GiRRyatoH’ (7-3-52) iti kutve rUpamevam .
2. yagAtmanepadayorapavAdatvena SyanparasmEpadayoviMhitayorapi, ‘kuzirajoH prAcAm
—’ (3-1-90) ityatra ‘prAcAM’ grahaRAt pakze yagAtmanepade Bavata iti rUpa-
syAsyApi sADutvaM boDyam .
3. vipUrvakAdasmAd BAve GaYi, ‘GaYi ca BAvakaraRayoH’ (6-4-27) iti upaDAna-
kAralope, ‘ata upaDAyAH’ (7-2-116) ityupaDABUtAkArasya vfdDO, ‘cajoH—’
(7-3-52) iti kutve ca virAgaH iti sampadyate . tasmAt ‘virAgamarhati’ ityarTe,
‘CedAdiByo nityam’ (5-1-64) iti Wakpratyaye, ‘virAgo viraNgaM ca’
(ga. sU. 5-1-64) iti gaRapAWAt prakfterviraNgAdeSe, AdivfdDO ca vEraNgikaH
iti rUpamiti boDyam .
4. rajyate'neneti rAgaH . karaRe GaYi, ‘GaYi ca BAvakaraRayoH’ (6-4-27)
ityupADAnakAralope, upaDABUtAkArasya vfdDO kutve ca rUpamevam . anyadrAgaH
ityatra, ‘azazWyatftIyAsTasya anyasya dug ASIrASAsTAsTitotsukoti kAraka-
rAgacCezu’ (6-3-99) iti rAgaSabde parata anyaSabdasya dugAgamaH .
5. raYjayati prekzakARAM manAMsyatretyarTe'ntarBAvitaRyarTAdDAtoraDikaraRe GaYi kutve rUpa-
mevam . raNgaH = nAwakAdInAM prekzaRasTAnam .
6. ‘halaSca’ (3-3-121) ityanena saMjYAyAM GaYi, ‘puMsi saMjYAyAM GaH prAyeRa’
(3-3-118) iti Gapratyaye vA sati kutve rUpamevam . raNgaH = deSaviSezaH, devaSca .
1. RyantAt ktvo lyapi mfgaramaRArTe nakAralope, mitsaMjYakatvAt upaDAhrasve ca
‘lyapi laGupUrvAt’ (6-4-56) iti RerayAdeSe rUpamevam .
2. ‘janIjFzknasuraYjo'mantASca’ (ga. sU. BvAdizu) ityatrArTaviSezAnirdeSapurassaraM
mittvAnuSAsanAt, anupaDAtve'pi raYjam 2-rAYjam 2 iti dIrGavikalpaH,
‘ciRRamulordIrGo'nyatarasyAm’ (6-4-93) iti sUtreRa BavatIti mADavaH .
mfgaramaRArTe nalopapakze tu rajam 2-rAjam 2 iti dvirUpavizaye na viprati-
pattiriti jYeyam .
3. ‘kvun SilpisaMjYayorapUrvasyApi’ [da. u. 3-5] iti kvunpratyayaH . pratyayasya
kittvAdupaDAnakAralopaH .
4. ‘rajaH kyun’ [da. u. 5-24] iti kyunpratyayaH . rajati rajyate vA'neneti
rajanaH = rajakaH, rAgaSca . ‘sa ca bAhulakAt widdrazwavyaH .’ iti kEyawokteH
(6-4-24) striyAM NIpi raYjanI rAtriH, haridrA ca .
5. ‘pfziraYjiByAM kit’ [da. u. 6-15] iti atacpratyaye, kittvenAnunAsilope ca
rUpam . rajante'smin janA iti rajatam = lohaviSezaH . “rajatasya vikAro
rAjatam— ‘prARirajatAdiByo'Y’ (4-3-154) iti zazWyantAt vikAre'Y-
pratyayaH . atra, ‘anudAttAdeH—’ (4-2-44) ityevAYi sidDe punaraYviDAnam,
‘mayaqvEtayoH—’ (4-3-143) iti DikAramayawo bADanArTam .” iti mA. DA.
vfttiH . etena ‘rajatamayam pAtram’ iti cCAndasAnAM prayogo'pARinIya
iti jYeyam .
6. ‘BUraYjiByAM kit’ [da. u. 9. 76] ityasunpratyayaH, sa ca kicca Bavati . rajaH =
aSuBam, reRuSca .

dasmAcCatA .

kaTaM ‘devadattamuparaman’ iti sakarmakaprayogopapattiriti vAcyam . ‘anta’
rBAvitaRyarTo'tra sakarmakaH .’ iti kzIrataraNgiRyAdyukteH ‘devadattamuparamayan
ityarTakatvAditi jYeyam . “antarBAvitaH = buDyA'nupraveSito RyarTaH = prayojyaprayoja-
kaBAvo yasya sa taToktaH . evaMviDasya tasya prayojyena karmaRA sakarmakatvamupapadyata
eva .” iti nyAsoktirihAvaDAryA .
8. ‘viBAzA'karmakAt’ (1-3-85) iti parasmEpadaM, SatA . BojanAd BojanAnnivartate
ityarTaH . pakze yaTAprAptamAtmanepadamapi sADu .
9. ‘pUrvavat sanaH’ (1-3-62) iti sannantAcCaturupapattirjYeyA .
1. ‘gamAdInAmiti vaktavyam’ (vA. 6-4-40) iti vacanAt kvipi anunAsikalopaH .
tuk ca Bavati .
3. ‘jvalitikasanteByo RaH’ (3-1-140) iti kartari Rapratyayo vikalpena . Rapratya-
yapakze rAmaH iti Bavati . pakze pacAditvAdOtsargike'cpratyaye ramaH iti Bavati .
striyAM wApi ramA, rAmA iti BavataH .
4. ‘halaSca’ (3-3-121) iti saMjYAyAM GaYi rUpamiti kecit . anye tu ‘ramante
yogino yasmin cidAnande parAtmani .’ ityAdinirvacanAnusAreRADikaraRe,
‘akartari ca kArake saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-19) iti GaY iti sADayanti .
5. ‘poradupaDAt’ (3-1-98) iti RyadapavAdo yatpratyayaH . ayaM ca bAhulakAt kartari
Bavati . evameva ramaRIyaH ityatrApi bAhulakAdevAnIyariti prakriyAsarvasvam .
6. ‘utsargaSCandasi sadAdiByo darSanAt’ (vA. 3-2-171) iti vacanAt kipratyayo'TavA
kinpratyayaH . Candasi vizaye ‘sediH, meniH, remiH—’ ityAdInAM kikinnantAnAM
bahUnAM SabdAnAM darSanAt ‘AdfgamahanajanaH kikinO liw ca’ (3-2-171)
ityatra parigaRanaM mAstu . kiM tu OtsargikatvaM kikinoH—iti prakftavArtikArTaH .
kikinoH pratyayayorliqvadBAvAtideSAt dvirvacanam . etvAByAsalopO ca BavataH .
7. ‘kticktO ca saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-174) iti ktic . ‘na ktici dIrGaSca’ (6-4-39)
iti dIrGAnunAsikalopanizeDaH .
8. ratiriti manmaTapatnyucyate . atra bAhulakAt, ‘striyAM ktin’ (3-3-94)
iti saMjYAyAM ktin . anunAsikalopaH . ‘akartari ca kArake saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-19)
ityato'tra (3-3-94) ‘saMjYAyAm’ ityanuvartate . ‘saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-109) iti
prAptasya Rvulo'pavAdaH .
A. ‘nandanAni munIndrARAM ramaRAni vanOkasAm .’ Ba. kA. 6-73.
9. nandyAditvAt (3-1-134) RyantAt kartari lyuH . ramaRI iti tu gOrAdi-
(4-1-41) pAWAt NIzi sADuH .
B. ‘balinAvamumadrIndraM yuvAM stamberamAviva .’ Ba. kA. 6-93.
1. manAMsi ramayatIti manoramA . RyantAt karmaRyaRi, bAhulakatvena ajAdizu
(4-1-4) pAWAt NIpaM bADitvA wAp . prOQamanOramA, bAlamanoramA
ityAdyaBiDAnameva wAbantatve, tatrApi bAhulakASrayaRe bIjamiti jYeyam .
‘aBiDAnalakzaRAH kfttadDitasamAsAntAH’ iti BAzye'sakfduktamihAvaDeyam .
A. ‘aTa riraMsumamuM yugapadgirO kftayaTa svataruprasavaSriyA .’ Si. va. 6-1.
2. ‘yama uparame’ iti DAtukoSezu nirdeSAt bAhulakAt BAve'ppratyayo'tra GaYa-
pavAda iti jYeyam .
3. Aramantyasmin ityArAmaH = upavanam . ‘akartari ca kArake—’ (3-3-19)
iti saMjYAyAM GaY .
4. ye tu ‘ramu—’ iti DAtumamuM paWanti, tezAm ‘udito vA’ (7-2-56) iti
ktvAyAmiqvikalpe ramitvA-ratvA iti rUpadvayaM prApnoti . paraM tu, ‘tat
(= udittvam) mahAnto na sahante .’ iti mADavAdyukteH udittvamasyApARi-
nIyamiti jYeyam .
5. ‘vA lyapi (6-4-38) iti anunAsikalopavikalpaH . tatra ‘vA'maH’ (vA. 6-4-37)
iti vacanAt amantAnAmanudAttopadeSAnAM DAtUnAM vikalpenAnunAsikalopa iti
vijYAyate . etadeva vyavasTitaviBAzAtvena tatra tatrocyate .
1. ‘ramernit’ (da. u. 1-32) ityatipratyaye rUpam . ramantyasyAm iti ramatiH =
krIqA . yadyapi ‘ikStipO DAtunirdeSe’ (vA. 3-3-108) iti Sitapi, SittvA-
cCapi ramatiH iti sidDyati; taTApi tatra BAvArTakatvAt, aDikaraRArTatvalA-
BAya daSapAdyuRAdizu pAWa iti boDyam .
2. ‘YamantANqaH’ [da. u. 5-7] iti qapratyayaH . bAhulakAt ‘cuw’ (1-3-7)
iti qakArasyetsaMjYA na . ‘Yam’ iti ‘YamaNaRanam’ ityasya pratyAhAraH uRAdizu
dfSyate .
3. ‘ramesta ca’ [da. u. 5-46] iti napratyayaH, takAraScAntAdeSaH . ramante'smin
iti ratnam = vEqUryAdiH .
4. ‘sO rame kto dame pUrvapadasya ca dIrGaH’ [da. u. 6-23] iti ktapratyaye
pAkzike pUrvapadadIrGe ca surataH-sUrataH iti siDyataH . sUrataH = buDaH .
5. ‘hanikuzinIrami—’ [da. u. 6-27] ityAdinA kTanpratyayaH . upaDAnakAralopaSca .
6. ‘SrFramyoSca’ [da. u. 8-8] iti anyapratyayaH . ramaRyam = SoBanam .
7. ‘ramerdeSe haSca’ [da. u. 9-74] iti asunpratyayo deSe gamyamAne hakAraScAntA-
deSaH . ramante'smin iti rahaH = vibiktadeSaH .

raRvakaH-raRvikA, raRvakaH-RvikA, riraRvizakaH-zikA, rAraRvakaH-RvikA;

“raSirasmA aviSezeRopadizwaH, saH rASiH, raSmiH, raSanA ityevaM- [Page1108+ 27]
vizayaH . …” iti ‘tfjvat krozwuH’ (7-1-95) ityatra BAzyAt

iRpratyayaH . upaDAvfdDiH . raSmirityatra tu bAhulakAdORAdiko mipratyaya
iti boDyam . raSanA iti tu lyuqantam . bAhulakAt ajAdizu (4-1-4)

nena aSaDAtoH raSmiSabdanirvacanaM kftam . etanniruktaBAzyavirudDam .

(1395) “rADa saMsidDO” (IV-divAdiH-1180. aka. ani. para.) [a]
‘rADnoti saMsidDyarTe SnO, rADyed vfdDAvakarmakAt .’ (Slo. 122) iti devaH .
“asya tu sidDidrohadEvaparyAlocanAdayo'rTAH .” iti DA. kA. vyAKyA (2-63) .
rADakaH-DikA, rADakaH-DikA, rirAtsakaH-tsikA, rArADakaH-DikA;
rAdDA-rAdDrI, rADayitA-trI, rirAtsitA-trI, rArADitA-trI;
itImAni sarvARyapi rUpARi dEvAdikakzuDyativat (315) boDyAni .
devadattAya 1 rADyan-ntI-tI, 2 rADyan odanaH svayameva, 3 rAdDiH, itImAnya-
smAd Bavanti . [Page1115+ 26]
[a] ‘rADo'karmakAd vfdDAveva’ (ga. sU.) iti divAdizu paWyate . asyAyamarTaH-
evakAro BinnakamaH . asmAdakarmakAdeva Syan . vfdDigrahaRaM tu udAharaRapradarSanArTam
yaTA vfdDAvakarmakaH, evamakarmakezu sarvatrApyarTezu SyanaM laBate'yamiti . tataSca,
‘vfdDikzaya-Baya-jIvita-maraRaM lajjA-sattA-sTiti-jAgaraRam .
Sayana-krIqA-ruci-dIptyarTaM DAtugaRaM tamakarmakamAhuH ..’ ityupAttAnAmarTAnAm vfdDiSabda
upalakzaka iti BAvaH . evaYca, ‘rADyed vfdDAvakarmakAt .’ iti devavacane
(Slo 1. 22) vfdDigrahaRaM tu akarmakakriyodAharaRamAtramiti puruzakAre vyaktam .
DAtukAvyavyAKyAyAM tu (2-63) evakArasya ivArTakatvamASritya, ‘vfdDAveva =
vfdDyarTa iva .’ iti vivftam . kASyapastu evakArasya yaTASrutAnvayamicCan
vfdDyarTa eva Syan ityaByupagatavAniti mADavaDAtuvfttito jYAyate . sidDyarTe
‘rADyatyodanaH svayameva’ iti BAzya (3-1-87) prayogAt, ‘devadattAya
rADyati’ iti dEvaparyAlocanArTe kASikAyAM (1-4-37) prayuktatvAt,
‘— yanmahyamaparADyati .’ (SiSupAlavaDe 2-11) iti drohArTe mAGaprayogAcca
kASyapoktirna samIcInA; upAttasTalezu sarvatrAkarmakatve mati vfdDyarTatvABAvAt .
vistarastu anyatra .

sanDeyAH .

(1413) “ruN gatirezaRayoH” (I-BvAdiH-959. saka. ani. Atma.) [a]
‘— ravate rOti 8 Sabdane ..’ (Slo. 23) iti devaH .
rAvakaH-vikA, rAvakaH-vikA, rurUzakaH-rirAvayizakaH-zikA, rorUyakaH-yikA; [Page1125+ 27]

rUpARi BOvAdikakavativat (198) jYeyAni . 1 rutam A .

kArikA, kASikAyAM 7-2-10) ityatra ‘ru’ ityanena niranubanDakapariBAzayA

kArAdayaH . tattvaboDinyAdizu tu “— ‘ru Sabde, ruN gatirezaRayoH’

tattvaboDinIkArAdInAM matetfjAdizu iqAgame ravitA-trI, ravitavyam ityA-

rezaRaSabdasya vfkaSabdArTatvAt kaTaYcidevaM neyamiti puruzakAre vivecitam .

tvam . tasya ca NidvadBAvAd guRo na . kUlAni udrujatIti kUlamudrujaH raTaH . ukzA

(II-adAdiH-1067. aka. sew. para.) [Page1130+ 28]
rodakaH-dikA, rodakaH-dikA, 1 rurudizakaH-zikA, rorudakaH-dikA;

roDakaH-DikA, roDakaH-DikA, rurutsakaH-tsikA, roruDakaH-DikA;

reBaterBavet .’ iti prakriyAsarvasvam . atredaM boDyam . kASikAyAm
(7-2-18) “… anye tu ‘viriBitam anyat’ iti paWanti . (ye?)
raBiM (riBiM?) sOtraM DAtuM paWanti, te viriBitamiti pratyudAharanti .” iti
viribDapadavyAKyAnAvasare pratipAditam . tena riBaDAtuH sOtraH kaScidastIti
pratIyate . sUtrezu tu kutrApi nopAtto'yam . kiYca, ‘ye riBiM…’ ityAdikena
vAkyeneha BAvyamiti, tacca vAkyaM vyAKyAntargataM pramAdena mUla eva nikziptaM
syAditi ca BAti .
2. ‘calanaSabdArTAdakarmakAt—’ (3-2-148) iti tAcCIliko yucpratyayaH .
A. ‘pracIByareBEH paSavo'mBasAMniDipraramBaRastamBiBirAgatA vrajam .’ DA. kA. 1-50.

KaS . KittvAt num . SittvAt Sapi tasya ‘ato guRe’(6-1-97) iti
pararUpam .

iti Ratvam, iti kecit . vastutastu ‘RerviBAzA’ (8-4-30) iti prAptaM

Ratvamiti boDyam .

pratyayaH . dvitvAdikaM boDyam .
12. ‘nergadanadapatapadaGumAsyatihantiyAtivAtidrAtipsAtivapativahati—’ (8-4-17)
ityAdinA upasargasTAt nimittAduttarasya neH RatvaM boDyam .
1. vahatyaneneti karaRArTe SakawAdike vivakzite ‘vahyaM karaRam’ (3-1-102) iti
nipAtanAt yatpratyayAntatA . Ryato'pavAdaH . karaRaBinnayoH BAvakarmaRorarTayoH
vivakzitayostu vAhyam iti Ryadantatvameva .
A. ‘tena vahyena hantAsi tvamaryaM puruzASinam .’ Ba. kA. 6-52
2. vahantyanena balIvardAdayaH BAramiti vahaH = skanDaH . karaRe ‘gocarasaYcaravaha—’
(3-3-119) iti GapratyayAnto nipAtitaH . halantalakzaRaGaYo'pavAdaH . vAhaH
aSvaH . atra tu vahatIti vAhaH iti vA, uhyate'neneti vA vfttirboDyA .
B. ‘vfdDO rasAM rAjyaDurAM pravoQuM kaTaM kanIyAnahamutsaheya .’ Ba. kA. 3. 54.
3. prOQirityatra ‘prAdUhoQoQyezEzyezu’ (vA. 6-1-89) iti vfdDiH . iyaM ca
ktintanta eva; ktijante netyAhuH .
4. atra ‘vAhanam AhitAt’ (8-4-8) iti Ratvam . vAhane yat AropitaM tat
Ahitam; upari nipatitekzukaM vAhanamityarTaH . dAkzivAhanam indravAhanam
ityAdizu tu AhitArTakatvABAvAt na Ratvam .
C. ‘dUrAdapAvartitaBAravAhaRAH paTo'pasasrustvaritaM camUcarAH ..’ Si. va. 12. 34.
5. ‘kartrorjIvapuruzayornaSivahoH’ (3-4-43) iti kartfvAcini puruzaSabde upapade
vaheH Ramul . puruzaprezyo BUtvA vahatItyarTaH .
6. ‘vahiSri—’ (da. u. 1-21) iti nipratyayaH . vahati, uhyate vA vahniH = agniH .
7. ‘vaherDaSca’ (da. u. 1-166) iti UpratyayaH, DAtvantasya DakArAdeSaSca . vahati
gfhakAryamiti vaDUH = snuzA .

varaRam = AvaraRam .
‘vftu varaRe’ iti DAtuvftti-DAtukAvya-si. kOmudI-kASakftsnAdayaH .
si. kOmudyAM ‘vftu—’ iti paWitvA pakzAntare-vAvftyate iti . ‘vftu—’

pakzadvaye'pi prayogA dfSyante . kzIrasvAmI svatantreRa ‘vAvftu’ iti paWitvA
“anye BvAdereva varaRe divAditvaM vA manyante . tena varaRe dyutAdikAryaM na
Bavati . vartizyate, vivartizate” iti uktam . kiM ca BvAdO ‘vftu varaRe’
(divAdO) ityeke’ iti tatra dfSyate .
kAtantrIyAH ‘tapa ESvarye, vAvftu vartane’ iti paWanti . ye vA-SabdaM
‘tapa ESvarye vA’ ityevaM saMbaDnanti, kASakftsnapAWAnuroDena tezAM ‘vA’ padaM
samuccAyakaM Bavitumarhati, na vikalpArTakam’ iti kASakftsne wippaRyA-
muktam . [Page1225+ 30]
‘tato vAvftyamAnA'sO rAmaSAlAM nyavikzata .’ iti Bawwi (4-28)
prayogaScAtra anukUlaH . ‘— vartane ca’ iti hemacandraH . ‘— saMBaktO varaRe’
iti vopadevaH .
vAvartakaH-rtikA, vAvartakaH-rtikA, vivAvartizakaH-zikA, varIvAvartakaH-rtikA;

ADfzIyaH . tena RijvikalpaH .

(1629) “vftu vartane” (I-BvAdiH-758. aka. sew. Atma.) vftAdiH .
‘vartayed BAzaRArTe RO vartane Sapi vartate ..’ (Slo. 96) iti devaH .
vartanaM = sTitiH iti kzIrasvAmI .
1 vartakaH-rtikA, 2 vartakaH-rtikA, vivftsakaH- 3 vivartizakaH-zikA, 4 varIvftakaH- [Page1256+ 31]
tikA; vartitA-trI, vartayitA-trI, vivartizitA-trI, vivftsitA-trI, varIvftitA-trI;
ityAdikAni rUpARi sarvARyapi dEvAdikatfpyativat (770) UhyAni . 1 vfttam- A ttaH,
vartitam-taH, 2 nIvft-upAvft, 3 nivartsyan B C vartizyamARaH, 4 vartizRuH, D 5 vanavartI, 6 vyAvavartI, 7 vftyam, vArttaH 8 samAvartanIyaH, vfttvA, 9 AryAvartaH vartitvA, [Page1257+ 31]
vfttvA 1, lyapi-nirvaMrtya, A 2 hastavartaM vartayan, 3 vartiH, 4 vartaniH vartanI, 5 vartikA, 6 vartma, 7 vftraH; ityAdIni rUpARi asya DAtoH viSezeRa Bavanti .
1. ‘sarvaDAtukArDaDAtukayoH’ (7. 3. 84) iti guRaH . sa ca ‘uraR raparaH’
(1-1-51) iti rePaparo Bavati . evamuttaratrApi Uhyam .
2. ‘vartakA SakunO prAcAm’ (vA. 7. 3. 45) iti nipAtanAt SakfnO vAcye
‘pratyayasTAt—’ (7-3-44) iti itvaM na Bavati; vartakA lawvAKyaH SakuniH .
udIcAM tu vartikA ityeva . varttikA-dIpasya daSA .
3. ‘vfdByaH syasanoH’ (1-3-92) iti vA parasmEpadam . ‘na vfdBayaScaturByaH’
(7-2-59) iti vftAdiByaH sakArAderArDaDAtukasya parasmEpadezu iqaBAve, JalAdeH
sanaH ‘halantAcca’ (1-2-10) iti kittvAt na guRaH . “‘na vfdByaH caturByaH’
(7-2-59) ityatra BAzyavArtikayoH— ‘sidDaM tu vftAdInAmAtmanepadena samAna-
padasTasyeqvacanAt’ ityuktatvAt kftpare'pi sAdO parasmEpadaluki ca iwaH pratizeDo
Bavati .” iti DAtuvfttiH . yadA tu vivftsati iti nizpAdya tadantAt kfto
vivakzyante tadA vivftsakaH ityAdInIti boDyam . yadA tu vivartizate iti
nizpAdya, tadantAt kftovivakzyante, tadA vivartizakaH ityAdi Bavati . evaM sannante
sarvatra rUpadvayaM boDyam .
4. ‘rIgftvataH’ (vA. 7-4-90) iti rIgAgama iti mA. DA. vfttO . vastutaH
‘rIgfdupaDasya ca’ (7-4-90) iti sUtreRa aByAsasya rIgAgame rUpamevam iti
jYeyam .
1. ‘ReraDyayane vfttam’ (7-2-26) iti Ryantasya nizWAyAm aDyayanArTa iqaBAvo
Riluk ca nipAtyate . tena vftto guRo devadattena, vfttaM pArAyaRaM devadattena . anyatra
vartitamiti . “vftirayamakarmakaH, sa RyarTe vartamAnaH sakarmako Bavati . ‘tena
nirvfttaM’ (4-2-68; 5-1-79) iti hi prakftereva karmaRi ktapratyayo dfSyate .
tadvadihApi RyarTavfttereva ca vfteH ‘vftto guRo devadattena’ iti Bavizyati;
nipAtanamanarTakam? tatkriyate—yadApi RicEva RyarTo'BiDIyate, tadA-vartita-
mityaDyayane mA BUditi kecit . apare tu-varttito guRo devadattena ityapi
icCanti .” iti kASikAvfttiH (7-2-6) . SudDe tu DAtoH udittvAdasya
ktvAyAM vewkatvAt ‘yasya viBAzA’ (7-2-15) itIwpratizeDaH .
A. ‘udvfttanayano minnAn mantriRaH svAn vyasarjayat ..’ Ba. kA. 9-16.
2. kvipi, saMhitAyAM vizaye ‘nahivfti—’ (6-3-116) iti pUrvapadasya dIrGo Bavati .
nIvft = janapadaH, upAvft = upAvfttiH .
3. ‘vfdBayaH syasanoH’ (1-3-92) iti syapratyaye vivakzite vA parasmEpadam . tena
rUpadvayam .
B. ‘rAmo'pi hatamArIco nivartsyan KaranAdinaH .’ Ba. kA. 6-5.
C. ‘varttizyamARamAtmAnaM sItApatyurivAntike .’ Ba. kA. 8-68.
4. ‘alaMkfYnirAkfYprajanotpacotpatonmadarucyapatrapavftu—’ (3-2-136) iti tacCI-
lAdizu kartfzu izRucpratyayaH .
D. ‘nirAkarizRavo BAnuM divaM vartizRavo'BitaH .’ Ba. kA. 7-3.
5. vane vartante iti, ‘vrate’ (3-2-80) iti RinipratyayaH .
6. ‘karmavyatIhAre Rac striyAm’ (3-3-43) iti RacpratyayaH . tadantAt ‘RacaH
striyAmaY’ (5-4-14) ityaY . tadantAt ‘wiqQARaY—’ (4-1-15) iti NIp .
‘vArttA pravfttirvfttAntaH’ ityamaraH .
7. ‘fdupaDAt—’ (3-1-110) iti kyappratyayaH . vfttirastyasyAm ityarTe
‘vftteSca’ (vA. 5-2-101) iti RapratyayaH .
8. samAvfttyate'smAditi samAvartanIyaH = guruH . ‘bAhulakAt apAdAne anIyar
iti prakriyAsarvasve .’
9. AryAH vartante yatreti aDikaraRe GaYpratyayaH . AryAvartaH puRyaBUmiH .
1. ‘udito vA’ (7-2-56) iti ktvAyAmiqvikalpaH . tena rUpadvayaM boDyam .
A. ‘tasya nirvartya kartavyaM sugrIvo rAGavAjYayA .’ Ba. kA. 6-145.
2. RyantAdasmAt ‘haste varttigrahoH’ (3-4-39) iti hastavAcini karaRe upapade
Ramul . hastavartaM varttayan, hastena varttayan . evaM karavarttam, ityAdi ca .
3. ‘hfpiSiruhivfti—’ (da. u. 1-47) iti inpratyayaH . vartate vfttyate vA varttiH-
dravyam, celavezwanaM dIpANgaM ca .
4. ‘vfteH’ (da. u. 1-6) iti anipratyaye rUpamevam . vartante'neneti varttaniH =
mArgaH . ‘stotre varttaniH, uYCAditvAt (6-1-160) antodAttaH’ iti
SvetavanavAsI . vartanI iti tu lyuqantAt striyAM wittvena NIpi boDyam .
vartanI ekapadI .
5. ‘vftestikan’ (da. u. 3-28) iti tikanpratyayaH . varttikA = pakzijAtiH .
‘varttikA = vyAKyAgranTaviSezaH, SakuniviSezaSca’ iti SvetavanavAsI .
varttikEva vArttikam .
6. ORAdike (da. u. 6-73) maninpratyaye rUpamevam . ‘BUte'pi dfSyante’ (3-3-2)
iti BUte'yaM pratyayaH . vfttaM tat iti vartma panTAH, itivfttaM ca .

(1656) “vyaya vittasamutsarge” (X-curAdiH-1932. saka. sew. uBa.)
adantaH .
‘vittatyAge vyayayati vyayati vyayate gatO .’ (Slo. 150) iti devaH .

hiMsAyAm’ (curAdO) ityatra “iha ‘vyaya kzaye’ iti nandI paWati .
vyapetyapare . mEtreyadevAdayastu uBayamapi na paWanti” iti DAtuvfttO
dfSyate . kASakftsnenApi ‘vyaya kzaye’ ‘vyaya vittasamutsarge’ iti pfTaktvena
paWitam .
vyayakaH-yikA, vivyayayizakaH-zikA, vyayayitA-trI, vivyayayizitA-trI;

Ryantaprakftikasannante ca sarvatra allopasya sTAnivattvAt upaDAvfdDiH neti jYeyam .
bAhulakAt RijaBAvapakze SAnaci- A apavyayamAnaH iti .

puzAdiH . ayaM dAhArTe paWitaH, arTaBedena aNarTaM divAdAveva punaH paWyate .

vyozakaH-zikA, vyozakaH-zikA, vuvyozizakaH-vuvyuzizakaH-zikA, vovyuzakaH-

vrAjakaH-jikA, vrAjakaH-jikA, vivrajizakaH-zikA, vAvrajakaH-jikA;

si’ (8-2-41) iti kakAre, sanaH sakArasya zatve ca vivrakzakaH ityAdIni rUpARi

ca vrazwA iti rUpam .

nityamiw . ‘na ktvA sew’ (1-2-18) iti kittvanizeDAt na samprasAraRam .
5. nizWAyAm ‘yasya viBAzA’ (7-2-15) itIRnizeDaH . samprasAraRapUrvarUpAdikam .
‘skoH—’ (8-2-29) iti sakAralopaH . odittvAt nizWAtakArasya nakAraH .
‘coH kuH’ (8-2-30) iti kutvam . ‘nizWAdeSaH zatvasvarapratyayeqviDizu sidDo
vAcyaH’ (vA. 8-2-3) iti vacanena ‘vraSca—’ (8-2-36) iti zatvaM prati
nizWAnatvasya sidDatvAt, JalparakatvABAvAt na zatvam . Ratvam . iyamatra gahanA
prakriyA .

iti na sakAralopaH . ‘nimittApAye nEmittikasyApyapAyaH’ (pari. 57) iti
vacanena cakAramASritya SrutaH SakAraH, SakAravigame svayameva sakAratAM pratyApadyate .

8. mUlaM vfScatIti mUlavfw . ‘kvip ca’ (3-2-76) iti kvipi, samprasAraRapUrvarUpayoH
sakAralope, vraScAdizatve tasya jaStvena qakAre cartve ca rUpamevam . mUlavft iti
kzIrataraNgiRyAM dfSyate . sa ca apapAWa iti BAti, tuko'prasidDeH .

10. ‘snuvraSci—’ (da. u. 9-25) iti ksapratyayaH . samprasAraRAdikam .

(1665) “vrI varaRe” (IX-kryAdiH-1504. saka. ani. para.)

ca kASakftsnaH . ‘—gatO ca drume’ iti DA. kA. vyA (3. 9.) .
‘vrIRAti varaRe tatra vrINo vrIyeta tu Syani .’ (Slo. 19) iti devaH .
vrAyakaH-yikA, vrAyakaH-yikA, vivrIzakaH-zikA, vevrIyakaH-yikA;
vretA-trI, vrAyayitA-trI, vivrIzitA-trI, vevrIyitA-trI; 1 vriRan-ntI, vrAyayan-ntI, vivrIzan-ntI; --

stayorAtaH’ (6-4-112) ityAkAralope ‘pvAdInAM hrasvaH’ (7-3-80) iti hrasve
ca rUpamevam . ye tu pvAditvamasya nAByupagacCanti, tezAM mate vrIRan iti dIrGaGawi-
tameva rUpam .

pratipannAH” iti DAtuvfttiH . kzIrataraNgiRyAM tu atra nEtAdfSaH pAWaH
upalaByate . itaH pUrvaM ‘vlI varaRe’ ityatra (DAtO) vlepayatIti pugviSizwatvena
udAhriyate .

1. DAtoruBayapaditve'pi ‘Sapa upalamBane’ (vA. 1-3-21) ityakartraMBiprAye'pi taNeva .
‘SlAGahnuNsTASapAM—’ (1-4-34) iti jYIpsyamAnasya sampradAnatA . tena
‘kfzRAya’ ityatra caturTI . vArtike ‘vAcA SarIrasya sparSanam = upalamBanam’
iti kASikA . atra haradattaH “— ‘tvatpAdO spfSAmi—nEtat mayA kftam’
ityetadrUpaH SapaTaviSeza upalamBaH” iti . kEyawastu ‘upalamBanam = prakASanam’
ityAha . SAkawAyanastu prakASanArTamaNgIkftya, ‘svABiprAyasya paratra AvizkaraRaM
tat’ — ityapyAha . “candraBojakOmArAstu ‘prozitasya devadattasya BAvABAvayo-
rupalabDavyayoH kiYcidAsevanamupalamBanam . ‘devadattAya Sapate—’ prozitasya
devadattasya BAvABAvayorupalabDavyayoH kiYcidAsevate ityarTaH—” iti DAtu-
vfttiH . vistarastu mADavIye drazwavyaH .
2. ‘poradupaDAt’ (3-1-98) iti RyadapavAdo yatpratyayaH .

iti nipAtanAt pakArasya dakAraH .
5. ‘SaperbaSca’ (da. u. 8-108) iti kalapratyayaH, pakArasya bakAraSca .
6. ‘Sapervan’ (da. u. 8-131) iti vanpratyayaH . Sapyate iti SapvaH = AkroSaH .

aByAsakAryARi, halAdiSezAByAsetvAdIni Bavanti . asya sanaH ‘DAtoH’
(3-1-91) iti aDikftya vihitatvABAvAt neqAgama iti viSezaH . vistarastu
dAnaDAtO (832) drazwavyaH .

(1703) “[ANaH] SAsu icCAyAm”
(II-adAdiH-1022. saka. sew. Atma.)
“Atreya-mEtreya-svAmi-kASyapAH amumuditaM paWanti . varDamAna-sammatA-
kAraharadattagargAdayaH anuditaM paWanti” iti mADavaH .
‘— icCAyAmASAste, SAsti SAsane .’ (Slo. 184) iti devaH . ‘namovAkaM
praSAsmahe .’ iti BavaBUti (uttararAmacarite 1-1) prayogAt prAyeRAyam
ANpUrvaH . 1 ASIH, 2 ASizA, 3 anyadASIH-anyASIH, 4 ASAsA-
ASAstiH, 5 ASAsyam, 6 ASAsitaH, A [Page1295+ 30] 1 ASAsanaH, 2 ASAsitvA-ASAstvA, iti viSezarUpARi . itararUpARi
sarvARyapi AdAdikAsaDAtuvat (61) boDyAni .
1. ‘ANaH SAsaH kvO’ (vA. 6-4-34) iti ANpUrvakAdasmAt kvipi, upaDAyA
itvam . ‘ASizi liNlowO’ (3-3-137), ‘kziyASIH—’ (8-2-104)
ityAdinirdeSAdvA upaDAyA ikAraH . DAtusakArasya ‘rvorupaDAyA dIrGa ikaH’
(8-2-76) iti dIrGaH . mitraSIH AryaSIH ityAdi tu nAsmAdDAtoH, kintu
‘SAsu anuSizwO’ ityasmAditi nyAsapadamaYjaryAdizu spazwam .
2. ‘ApaM cEva halantAnAm—’ iti vacanAt kvibantAt wAp . kvibantAt, DAtoH
itve, ‘SAsivasi—’ (8-3-60) ityAdinA zatve ca evaM sampadyate .
3. anyA ASIH anyadASIH . ‘azazWyatftIyAsTasyAnyasya dug ASIrASA—’
(6-3-99) ityAdinA dugAgamaH . zazWItftIyAntatve tu anyASIH ityeva .
4. ‘guroSca halaH’ (3-3-103) iti striyAmakArapratyaye rUpamevam . etacca mADava-
matenoktam . kzIrasvAmI tu “ASAstiH . ‘guroSca halaH’ (3-3-103) iti
nAsti; nizWAyAM sewo'kAravacanAt (drazwavyam vA. 3-3-94) .” ityAha . atra
prayogaH pramARam .
5. ‘etistuSAsvf—’ (3-1-109) ityatra udito nirdeSAt na asmAt kyapaH
prasaNga iti ASAsyam iti Ryadeva—iti mADavaH . ayamASayaH— ‘niranuba-
nDakagrahaRe na sAnubanDakasya’ (pari-82) iti vacanAt prakftasUtre ‘SAsu anuSizwO’
ityasyEva grahaRam, nAsyeti . tenAtra Ryadeveti . ‘SAsa id aNhaloH’ (6-4-34)
ityanenAtra Ryatpratyaye itvaM nASaNkyam; saMyogasya ‘saMyogo viprayogaSca sAhacaryaM…
viSezasmftihetavaH ..’ (vAkyapadIyam 2-315) iti viSezasmftihetutvAt aNsamba-
nDina eva SAseH ikAraviDO grahaRAt, asya ca aNaBAvAt .
6. ‘ANaH SAsa’ iti durgasammatapAWe nizWAyAmiwi evaM rUpam . uditpakzapAtinO
AtreyamEtreyO tu ASAstaH ASAstavAn iti nizWAyAM rUpamAhaturiti
mADavIye spazwam . ayaM BAvaH—uditpakze ktvAyAmiqvikalpanAt nizWAyAm
‘yasya viBAzA’ (7-2-15) itIRnizeDaH, iti tezAM matam .
A. ‘Iqyo'yamISaH samupAstiSIlErASAsitaH— .’ DA. kA. 2-45.
1. tacCIlAdizu kartfzu ‘anudAttetaSca halAdeH’ (3-2-149) iti yucpratyayaH .
2. “‘ktvA'pi cCandasi’ (7-1-38) iti lyapo'pavAde ktvAdeSe ASAstvA
ASAsitvA itIqvikalpaH” iti AtreyamEtreyAvAhaturiti mADavaH . Candasi
evaM samBave'pi loke ‘samAse'naYpUrve—’ (7-1-37) iti ktvApratyayasya lyabAdeSe
ASAsya ityeva nyAyyamiti boDyam .

(1704) “SAsu anuSizwO”
(II.adAdiH-1075. dvikarma. sew. para.) jakzityAdiH .
‘anuSizwiH = niyogaH’ iti kzIrasvAmI . vivicya jYApane prasidDaH .
‘— icCAyAmASAste, SAsti SAsane .’ (Slo. 184) iti devaH . 3 SizyaH, 4 SAsyam, 5 duSSAsanaH-duSSAsaH, 6 ASIH, 7 SizwvA—SAsitvA, 8 SizwaH, 9 SizwiH-SAstiH, 10 SAstA praSAstA, mARavakaM DarmaM [Page1296+ 25] 1 SAsat, 2 mitraSIH-AryaSIH, iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi tu
AdAdikacakAstivat (485) boDyAni .
3. ‘etistuSAs—’ (3-1-109) iti kyap . ‘SAsa idaNhaloH’ (6-4-34)
ityupaDAyA ikAraH . ‘SAsivasi—’ (8-3-60) ityAdinA zatvam .
4. SAsyam iti tu ‘Sasu hiMsAyAm’ iti BOvAdikaDAtoH ‘hantyarTASca’ (ga. sU.
curAdiH) iti vacanARRici, RijantAd yati jYeyam .
5. ‘BAzAyAM SAsi—’ (vA. 3-3-130) ityAdinA KalapavAdo yucpratyayaH . tasya
vEkalpikatvaM prakriyAkOmudyAmuktam; tena duSSAsa iti KalapIti kecit .
6. BAve sampadAditvAt (vA. 3-3-94) kvipi ‘ASAsaH kvAvupaDAyAH—’ (vA.
6-4-34) iti upaDAyA ikAraH .
7. ‘udito vA’ (7-2-56) iti ktvAyAmiqvikalpaH . iqaBAvapakze itvamupaDAyAH,
iwpakze DAtvAkArasya upaDAtvABAvAd nekAra iti viSezaH . ata eva zatvamapI-
kArASrayaM na Bavati .
8. ‘yasya viBAzA’ (7-2-15) iti iRnizeDAt ekameva rUpaM nizWAyAm .
9. SizwiH ityatra ‘titutra—’ (7-2-9) itIRnizeDaH . SAstiH iti tu
asmAdeva DAtoH kticpratyaye, yadvA, DAtunirdeSe Stippratyaye vA jYeyam . RijantAt
SAsanA iti Bavati . RijantAdeva SAstiH ityapi mADavaH . tasyA-
yamASayaH—bAhulakAt yucA na bADaH, iti .
10. ‘tfn’ (3-2-135) iti tAcCIlikaH tfnpratyayaH . praSAstA ityapyevameva .
praSAstA = ftvigviSezaH . ‘tfntfcO SaMsikzadAdiByaH saMjYAyAM ca aniwO’
(vA. 3-2-135) ityaniwtvam . saMjYABinnasTalezu ‘praSAsitAraM sarvezAm—’
(manuH 12-1-22) ityAdizu iq Bavatyeveti viSezaH .
1. Satari rUpamevam . ‘jakzityAdayaH zaw’ (6-1-6) ityaByastasaMjYAyAm, ‘nABya-
stAcCatuH (7-1-78) iti numrizeDaH .
2. mitrARi SAstIti mitraSIH . AryAn SAstIti AryaSIH . kartari ‘kvip ca’
(3-2-76) iti kvip . atrApyupaDAyA ikAra iti viSezaH .

(1705) “Sikza vidyopAdAne” (I-BvAdiH-605. saka. sew. Atma.)
3 SikzA . ‘SikzerjijYAsAyAm’ (vA. 1-3-21) iti vArttikaM niyamArTam
ityaBiprayantaH, ayaM DAtuH SikzABinnArTe parasmEpadI iti kzIrasvAmipraBftaya
AhuH . 4 SakxDAtoH sannantasya viDyarTatvasamBavAt nEtanniyamArTamiti
kEyawanyAsapadamaYjarIDAtuvfttyAdizu spazwam . ataH sarvatrAtmanepadameveti
sidDAntaH . sarvARyapi rUpARi yaTAsamBavamUhyAni .
3. ‘guroSca halaH’ (3-3-103) ityakArapratyayaH .
4. SakxDAtoH sannante ‘SiSikza’ iti sTite ‘atra lopo'ByAsasya’ (7-4-58)
ityaByAsalopaH . tena ‘Sikza’ iti sannantA prakftiH sampanneti jYeyam .

(1706) “SiKi gatyarTaH” (I-BvAdiH (pA.) saka. sew. para.)
BvAdizu ‘uKa uKi—’ iti daRqake kEScit paWito DAturayam . BOvAdika-

SiYjAnaH-SAnac . ‘tAlEH SiYjadvalaya—’ (meGadUtam 2-19) iti tu ‘anudA-

Sabde’ ityuktAvapi BUzaRaDvanAvevAyaM kaviBiH prayujyate—yaTAhAmarasiMhaH--

(1712) “Siza hiMsArTaH” (I-BvAdiH-687. saka. ani. para.)
‘Sizo'sarvopayoge yO Sezayet SezatItyuBe ..
luNyaBAvAdaNo'SezIt SinazwIti viSezaRe .’ (Slo. 178-9) iti devaH .
‘SiziM piziM SlizyatipuzyatI tvizim’ iti vyAGraBUtivacanAt (kASikA
7-2-10) aniwtvaM DAtorasya boDyam .
SezakaH-zikA, SezakaH-zikA, SiSikzakaH-kzikA, SeSizakaH-zikA, 1 SizpaH, 2 SezaH, ityAdIni samastAnyapi rUpARi rODAdikapinazwivat (1002) boDyAni .
‘Sizyati’ ‘tallokaM SiMzati’ (gopaTabrAhmaRam 3-82-2) ityAdayaH prayogAH
yaTAsamBavaM divAdizu tudAdigaRe'vasAne mucAdyantargaRe ca CAndasatvena paWitvA
sADutvasamBAvanArhAH . ato na tadarTaM tudAdipAWAvaSyakateti boDyam .

iti mADavaH .
(da. u. vfttO 7-7) upaDAyA atve Sazpam = GAsaH iti dfSyate .
2. Sezati = hinastIti SezaH = nAgaH . kartari bAhulakAt GaY .

(1713) “Siza asarvopayoge” (X-curAdiH-1818. aka. sew. uBa.)
‘Sizo'sarvopayoge yO Sezayet SezatItyuBe . [ADfzIyaH . [Page1298+ 25]
luNyaBAvAdaNo'SezIt SinazwIti viSezaRe ..’ (Slo. 178-9) iti devaH .
vipUrvo'yamatiSaye vartate—yaTA—viSezaH . ADfzIyatvena RijaBAvapakze
aniwtvamasyApi DAtoriti mADavIye spazwam . 1 Sazpam . sarvARyapi rUpARi
yaTAsamBavaM cetayativat (522), pUrvaliKitaDAtuvacca svayamevohyAni . ADfzIya-
tvAt RijvikalpaH .
1. ORAdike (da. u. 7-7) papratyaye upaDAyA akAre ca rUpamevam . Sazpam = bAlatfRam .

(1714) “Sizx viSezaRe” (VII-ruDAdiH-1451. aka. ani. para.)
‘viSezaRam = uparaYjanam’ iti durgAdAsaH . 2 viSezaH-vESezikaH, SezaH, 3 mahAviSizwaH . yaTAsamBavaM sarvARyapi rUpARi rODA-
dikapinazwivat (1002) boDyAni .

vinayAditvAt (5-4-34) svArTe Wak . Wasya ikAdeSaH .
3. vipUrvakAt nizWAyAM viSizwaH iti sidDam . mahatyA viSizwaH mahAviSizwaH .
saMjYAviSezaH . ‘mahadAtve GAsakaraviSizwezUpasaMKyAnam’ (vA. 6-3-46) ityAtvam;
puMvadBAvaSca .

(1715) “SIka AmarzaRe” (X-curAdiH-1827. saka. sew. uBa.)
ADfzIyaH .
‘SIkaraH’ ityAdizu jalasecanArTakalABArTaM vopadevapraBftiBiH DAturayaM ‘seke
Amarze ca’ iti paWitaH . tattu ‘SIkf secane’ iti BvAdiDAtoH sampadyata
iti vyarTameva . taTA coktam— ‘marzaRe SIkayet SIket; secane Sapi

yaTAsamBavaM cOrAdikacIkayativat (529) boDyAni .
curAdizveva ‘SIka BAzArTaH’ iti DAtvantaraM anADfzIyaM svAmi-
kASyapAdayaH paWanti . tasya prAyapAWaviralatvAt nAsmABirulleKaH kftaH .

gatyarTako'pi kaScit SIkfDAtuH kzIrasvAminA BvAdizu paWitaH . “‘sIkf’ [Page1299+ 28]
iti AryAH” iti DanapAlaH . 1 SIkAyamAnaH . ayam anfdit iti kecit .

acpratyayaH . ‘digDasaha’ ityatra, mayUravyaMsakAditvAt (2-1-72), asmAdeva
nirdeSAdvA tatpuruzasamAsaH . tata upapadasamAsaH .

qittvena werlopaH . girirasyAstItyarTe lomAditvAt (5-2-100) Sapratyayena prasADya
BAzye vArttikamidaM pratyAKyAtam . nimittAvaDisaMkarata uBayamapi pramARamadyatve
iti sidDAntaH .

SayAluH .

vartamAne ktapratyayaH .
9. ‘gatyarTAkarmakaSlizaSIN—’ (3-4-72) ityAdinA'tra kartfkarmaRoryaTAsamBavaM
ktapratyayo jYeyaH . upasargavaSAdatra DAtussakarmaka ityavaDeyam .
1. atra ‘aDiSINsTA''sAM karma’ (1-4-46) ityADArasya karmatvam .

(3-3-39) iti GaY pratyayaH, ivarRAntatvalakzaRAcpratyayasyApavAdaH . tava viSAyaH .
mama rAjopaSAyaH, rAjAnamupaSayituM paryAya ityarTaH . paryAyaBinnArTe tu
upaSayaH, viSayaH ityajeva .
D. ‘niSopaSAyaH kartavyaH PaloccAyaSca saMhatEH ..’ Ba. kA. 7-41
9. saMSayyate iti saMSayaH = sandehaH . saMSayaM Apanno'rTaH sAMSayikaH . ‘saMSayamApa-
nnaH’ (5-1-73) iti WaY . sAMSayikaH sTARuH . sTARuH saMSayaM = puruza iti
sandehamApanna ityarTaH . amarasiMhastu ‘sAMSayikaH saMSayApannamAnasaH’ (3-1-5)
iti saMSayakartaryapi prayogamanumene; dvitIyAntaprakaraRe punaH ‘saMSayaM—’ (5-1-73)
iti dvitIyAntatvenEva pAWAt karBaRyeva pratyayo na tu kartari iti nyAsapada-
maYjaryAdizu spazwam .
1. atiSete ityatiSayaH . upasargavaSAdDAtorarTAntare vfttiH . atiSaye BavaH
AtiSAyikaH, aDyAtmAditvAt (5-4-44) WaY . anuSatikAditvAt (7-3-20)
uBayapadavfdDiH . ‘vyAptamAtiSayikena rasena’ (mAGaH 10-23) ityatra tu vina-
yAditvAt (5-4-34) Wak .
2. BAve ktin . saMSItiH = saMSayaH . ‘titutra—’ (7-2-9) itIRnizeDaH .
3. ‘saMjYAyAM samajanizadanipatamanavidazuYSINBfYiRaH’ (3-3-99) iti saMjYAyAM
gamyamAnAyAM striyAM BAvAdO kyappratyayaH . Serate'syAmiti SayyA . kittvAdayaN .
A. ‘SayyotTAyaM mfgAn viGyannAtiTeyo vicakrame ..’ Ba. kA. 4-8
4. suKaSayanam suKaSAyikA . DAtvarTanirdeSe striyAM Rvul .
5. SoBanaH Sayo'syAH suSayikA . ‘pratyayasTAt kAt—’ (7-3-44) itIkAraH .
6. suKena Sayanam—suKaSayanam . suKaSayanaM pfcCatIti sOKaSAyanikaH .
‘pfcCatO susnAtAdiByaH’ (vA. 4-4-1) iti Wak . ‘BfgvAdIn anugfhRantaM
sOKaSAyanikAn fzIn ..’ (raGuvaMSaH 10-14)
7. SavAnAM Sayanam = SmaSAnam . pfzodarAditvAt (6-3-109) SavaSabdasya
SmAdeSaH, SayanaSabdasya ‘SAna’ ityAdeSaH . kASikA (6-3-9) drazwavyA .
8. atiSayanam eva atiSAyanam . ‘atiSAyane tamabizWanO’ (5-3-55)
‘nityayoge'tiSAyane .’ (vA. 5-2-94) iti sUtravArttikAdinirdeSAt
lyuqante dIrGaH pAkzikaH; tena atiSayanam atiSAyanam ityuBayamapi sADu . na
ca vAcyam— ‘bADakAnyeva nipAtanAni’ (pariBAzA. 119) iti vacanAt atiSa-
yanam ityasAvveveti; yataH ‘abADakAnyapi nipAtanAni’ (pari 120) iti vacanAt
uBayamapi sAcveveti mADavaH . vastutaH ‘ajviDO BayAdInAmupasaMKyAnam--
napuMsake ktAdinivfttyarTam’ (vA. 3-3-56) iti vacanAt asya DAtoH atipUrvasya
lyuwi rUpasyAnaBiDAnameva; ata eva ca nirdeSAt atiSAyanam ityekameva rUpaM
sADu iti pratImaH .
9. ‘na ktvA sew’ (1-2-18) iti sewaH ktvAyAH kittvanizeDAt guRo'tra .
B. ‘… SayitvA rajanIM sapOraH .’ Ba. kA. 3-16.
1. atyarTaM Serate iti SayuH = ajagaraH . ORAdikaH [da. u. 1-92] upratyayaH .
2. ORAdike (da. u. 26) Akapratyaye SayAnakaH iti Bavati .
3. ‘SINo DuklagvalanvAlanaH’ (da. u. 10-9) iti krameRa DugAdipratyayezu
rUpARImAni sidDAni . SIDuH = madirA . kecit SITuH iti paWanti .
SIlam = svaBAvaH . Sevala-SEvAlO jalalatAviSezavAcakO .
4. ORAdike (da. u. 8-126) vanpratyaye rUpam . SevaH sarpaH . SevA iti
kecit . ORAdike (da. u. 6-69) iti kvanippratyaye tu SIvA iti Bavati .
5. ORAdike (da. u. 3-55) Kapratyaye SiKA keSabanDaH .
6. ORAdike nipratyaye DAtorhrasve ca rUpam . SiniH kzatriyaviSeza iti mADavaH .
7. nitarAM Serate'smin prARina iti niSITaH = arDarAtram . ORAdikasTakpratyayo'tra .

(1722) “Suka gatO” (I-BvAdiH…saka. sew. para.)
mEtreyakzIrasvAmipraBftiBiH paWito'yaM DAtuH . mADavastu amuM nAnumene . 1 SukaH, 2 SukraH . itarARi rUpARi BOvAdikakukativat (197) boDyAni .
1. igupaDalakzaRe kapratyaye rUpam . SukaH = muniH, pakziviSezaSca .
2. ORAdike rakpratyaye Sukra iti sidDyati . SukraH = grahaviSezaH, agniH, SudDo vA .
uBAvapi SabdO mEtreyAdyanusAreRa asmAd vyutpAditO . mADavastu na
sahate'mum . yadAha— “asmin (DAtO) hi sati ‘SukravalkolkAH’
(da. u. 3-20) iti SuBeH kani Balope SukaSabdanipAtanam anarTakaM syAt;
igupaDalakzaRakapratyayenEva sidDatvAt . taTA SukeH ragviDAnenApi SukraSabdasidDeH
‘fjrendra—’ (da. u. 8-46) ityAdO SucernipAtanam anarTakaM syAt; iti asya
pAWo'nArza eva pratIyate .” iti . prAcInEH vEyAkaraREH mEtreyapraBftiBiH paWitatvAt
uRAdirUpARAM bahuDAtuprakftikatvasya bahutra dfzwatvAt, tadanusAreREtannirAkaraRasyA-
nyAyyatvAdetanna sAram iti yuDizWiramImAMsakapraBftaya aBiprayanti (drazwavyA
kzIrataraNgiRIwIkA pf. 32) .

ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi ‘janI prAdurBAve’ (583) itivat boDyAni . 3 sAtaH-sAtavAn, 4 sAtiH, santiH-satiH, 5 senivAn-saniMsasanivAMsam,
sAyamAnaH-sanyamAnaH, 6 sAnuH, iti viSezarUpARi .
1. ‘sanIvantarDaBrasjadamBuSrisvfyurRuBarajYapisanAm’ (7-2-49) ityanena sannante iqvi-
kalpaH . iwpakze evaM rUpam . iqaBAvapakze ‘janasanaKanAM san(Ya)JaloH’ (6-4-42)
ityAtvam . ‘AdeSapratyayayoH’ (8-3-59) iti uttaraKaRqe zatvam .
2. yaNante ‘ye viBAzA’ (6-4-43) iti AkAravikalpaH . idaM ca AtvaM yakArAdO
kNiti pratyaya evetyataH Ryati na Bavati . tenAsmARRyati sAnyam ityeva rUpam .
3. yataH sannante iqvikalpaH; tena nizWAyAmiRna . ‘janasanaKanAM—’ (6-4-42)
ityAkAraH . evaM ktinpraBftizvapi prakriyA jYeyA .
4. striyAM ktini rUpamevam . ‘sanaH ktici lopaScAsyAnyatarasyAm’ (6-4-45) iti
AkArAdeSa-nakAralopO tu tAnAdikasanotereveti kASikA . kzIrasvAmI tu
asyApi BOvAdikaDAtostadaBiprEti . kecittu ‘UtiyUtijUtisAti—’ (3-3-97)
iti nipAtanAt sAtirityekameva ktini rUpamaByupagacCanti . pare tu sanotestAnA-
dikasya sAtiriti nipAtanamiti vadanti . atra nizkarze vidvAMsaH pramARam .
5. Candasi DAtorasmAt liwaH kvasO saniNpUrvAt iqAgamaH, etvAByAsalopABAvaSca
nipAtyate . loke tu senivAMsam ityeva; atra etvAByAsalopAdayaH .
kvasvantasya dvitIyAntamidam . ‘aYjitvA'gne! saniMsasanivAMsam’ iti SrutiH .
6. ORAdike (da. u. 1-88) YuRpratyaye rUpamevam . sAnuH = SiKarakUwaH .

(1813) “zaRu dAne” (VIII-tanAdiH-1464. saka. sew. uBa.)
‘dAne sanoti sanute, samBaktO tu sanediti ..’ (Slo. 128) iti devaH . [Page1335+ 29] 1 paSuzAH-paSuzO-paSuzaH, gozAH-nfzAH, 2 sAtiH, santiH, satiH, saniMsasanivAMsam,
senivAn, sanyam-sAyam, 3 prasatya, 4 saniH, 5 sAnasiH iti viSezarUpARi .
itarARi samastAnyapi rUpARi tAnAdikakzaRotivat (296) boDyAni .
1. paSuM sanoti iti vfttO ‘janasanaKana—’ (3-2-67) iti viw . ‘viqvanoranunA-
sikasya—’ (6-4-41) ityAkAraH . ‘sanoteranaH’ (8-3-108) iti zatvam .
evaM gozAH, nfzAH ityAdizvapi boDyam .
2. ‘UtiyUtijUtisAti—’ (3-3-97) iti nipAtanAt sADuH . sAtiH = dAnam .
‘sAntiH, satiH’ iti tu ktici, ‘sanaH ktici—’ (6-4-45) iti AkAra-
vikalpa-nalopavikalpayo rUpam . ‘na ktici dIrGaSca’ (6-4-39) iti dIrGavikalpaH .
3. ‘vA lyapi’ (6-4-38) ityasya vyavasTitaviBAzAtvAt nAntAnAM nityamanunAsi-
kalopaH . tenEvaM rUpam .
4. ORAdike (da. u. 1-68) ipratyaye rUpam . saniH = BaktiH, dAnaM ca .
5. ORAdike (da. u. 10-17) asipratyaye, upaDAdIrGe ca rUpam . sAnasiH = snehaH .

(1814) “zadx viSaraRagatyavasAdanezu”
(I-BvAdiH-854-saka. aniw. para.) jvalAdiH .
‘jvalAdeSca tudAdeSca sIded viSaraRAdike .
padyaterarTa AsIded AsAdayati cANi yO ..’ (Slo. 108) devaH .
“— ‘viSamfSaRudapraveSAmarSakzepezu zadx viSaraRArTaH .’ iti ca SlokaDAtu-
pAWaH .” iti puruzakAraH .
sAdakaH-dikA, sAdakaH-dikA, sizatsakaH-tsikA, 6 sAsadakaH-dikA; 7 sattA-sattrI, sAdayitA-trI, sizatsitA-trI, sAsaditA-trI;
ityAdIni samastAnyapi rUpARi BOvAdikaKadativat (338) jYeyAni . 8 nizIdan-pratisIdan-ntI, [Page1336+ 33] 1 nizAdaH, sAdaH-sadaH, 2 prAsAdaH, 3 upanizat-parizat-Sucizat-dyusat-divizat, 4 bfsI, 5 vizaRRaH-vizaRRavAn, 6 nizizatsuH, 7 sedivAn, 8 sadruH, 9 nizadyA, 10 sAdI, 11 sediH; 12 sadaH, 13 nizadvaraH, 14 sAdiH, [Page1337+ 29] 1 sattram itImAni viSezarUpARi .
6. ‘lupasada—’ (3-1-24) iti BAvagarhAyAM yaN . BAvagarhA = DAtvarTe kutsAviSizwa-
tvam . garhitaM sIdati sAsadyate . ayaM yaN ‘DAtorekAcaH—’ (3-1-22) iti
OtsargikayaNo'pavAdaH iti prAYcaH . neti navyAH .
7. DAtoraniwtvam . dakArasya cartvena takAraH . evaM tavyadAdizvapi .
8. Satari, ‘pAGrADmAsTAmnAdARdfSyartisartiSadasadAM pibajiGraDamatizWamanayacCapaSyarcCa-
DOSIyasIdAH’ (7-3-78) iti sIda iti sarvAdeSaH . ‘sadiraprateH’ (8-3-66)
iti iRantAdupasargAt parasya sadisakArasya zatve rUpamevam . ‘aprateH’ ityuktatvAt
pratisIdan ityatra na zatvam . upasargaprakaraRAt ‘ni’ iti karmapravacanIyasya
na zatvam .
1. ‘jvalitikasanteByaH—’ (3-1-140) iti kartari RaH . nizAdaH vanyajAtiviSezaH .
pakze pacAdyaci sadaH ityapi sADuH . mADavastu “nizIdatyasmin pApamiti
nizAdaH . ‘halaSca’ (3-3-121) iti aDikaraRe GaY” ityAha . saMjYA'treti
viSezaH .
2. ‘akartari ca kArake saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-19) ityaDikaraRe GaY . prasIdanti Danino-
smin iti prAsAdaH DaninAM vAsaH . ‘upasargasya GaYi—’ (6-3-122) iti ‘pra’
ityasya dIrGaH . saMjYAyAmeva manuzyaBinne'pi sTale dIrGaH; anyatra na; tataSca
‘prasAdaH’ ityatra na .
3. upa nizIdanti, upa nizAdayanti vA iti upanizat . striyAM sampadAditvAt
(vA. 3-3-108) kvipi zatve ca rUpamevam . evaM parizat ityAdayo'pi .
dyusat, divizat, Sucizat ityAdayastu ‘satsUdviza—’ (3-2-61) ityAdinA
kvipi sampadyante . parzat iti tu pfzodarAditvAt (6-3-109) parerikAralope
sADuH . divizat ityatra ‘tatpuruze kfti—’ (6-3-14) iti saptamyA aluk .
suzAmAditvAt (8-3-98) zatvam . ye strIliNgaSabdAH saMsat ityAdayaH, te
sampadAdikvibantAH; ye tu pu~lliNgaSabdAH, te ‘satsU—’ (3-2-61) iti nizpannAH
iti vEyAkaraRasampradAyaH .
4. bruvantaH sIdantyasyAmiti bfsI = munInAmAsanam . pfzodarAditvAt bruvacCabdasya
‘bf’ ityAdeSaH . saderaDikaraRe qawpratyayaH . wittvAt striyAM qIp .
5. ‘radAByAM—’ (8-2-42) iti nizWAtakArasya DAtudakArasya ca nakAraH . zatvam,
RatvaM ca .
6. sannantAdupratyayaH . ‘sTAdizvaByAsena cAByAsasya’ (8-3-64) iti pUrvottaraKaRqayoH
zatvam .
7. liwaH ‘BAzAyAM sadavasa—’ (3-2-108) iti kvasupratyayaH; etvAByAsalopaH .
‘vasvekAc—’ (7-2-67) itIqAgamaH .
8. ‘dADewsiSadasado ruH’ (3-2-159) iti tacCIlAdizu kartfzu rupratyayaH .
9. striyAM ‘saMjYAyAM samajaniMzada—’ (3-3-99) ityAdinA akartari kyappratyayaH .
nizadyA = vAsasTAnam .
10. sADukAriRi RinipratyayaH . sAdI = aSvasyopari sTitvA yuGyamAnaH .
11. ‘sadAdiByo darSanAt’ (vA. 3-2-171) iti vacanAt BAzAyAM kipratyayaH .
CandasyevAyam . pratyayasya liqvadBAvAt etvAByAsalopO .
12. ORAdike'sunpratyaye rUpam . sadaH saBA .
13. ‘nO sadeH’ (da. u. 8-48) iti varacpratyayaH . nizadvaraH = kAmaH, kardamaSca .
14. ‘iR ajAdiByaH’ (vA. 3-3-108) iti iR . sAdiH aSvasTo yodDA .
1. ORAdike (da. u. 8-89) trapratyaye rUpam . DAtudakArasya cartvena takAraH . sattram =
yAgaviSezaH, annaSAlA ca .

ADfzIyaH .

kacCAdayativat (562) rUpARyUhyAni . ADfzIyatvAt Rijvikalpa iti viSezaH .

(1816) “zadx viSaraRagatyavasAdanezu”
(VI-tudAdiH-1427. saka. ani. para.)
Satari numvikalpe sIdantI-sIdatI iti dve rUpe . tadarTameva BOvAdikezu paWi-
tasyAsyAtra tudAdO punaH pAWaH . ‘svarArTaM punaH pAWaH’ iti kecit . kecinnE-
vAmumatra paWanti . sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikasIdativat (1815) boDyAni .

(1817) “zanja saNge” (I-BvAdiH-987. saka. ani. para.)
2 sajan-aBizajan-ntI, 3 aNgulizaNgA yavAgUH, 4 prAsaNgaH-utsaNgaH-nizaNgaH, 5 aBizizaNkzuH, 6 saktaH-saktavAn, 7 saktvA-saNktvA, 8 sakTi, iti viSeza- [Page1338+ 26]
rUpARi . itarARi sarvARyapi rUpARi katTativat (160) boDyAni .

tURIram . utsaNgaH = aNkaH .

bADitvA ‘sTAdizvaByAsena cAByAsasya’ (8-3-64) iti zatvam . ‘sTAdizu’

(1818) “zapa samavAye” (I-BvAdiH-400. aka. sew. para.)
samavAyaH = sambanDaH, samyagavaboDo vA . saptiH—‘kticktO ca saMjYAyAm’

nti . 1 sasyam, 2 sAsnA .

jvalAdiH .

Syani sahyati SakyArTe—..’ (Slo. 197) iti devaH .
sAhakaH-hikA, sAhakaH-hikA, 4 sisahizakaH-zikA, sAsahakaH-hikA; [Page1340+ 32]
soQA- 1 soQrI-sahitA-trI, sAhayitA-trI, sisahizitA-trI, sAsahitA-trI;

1. tAderArDaDAtukasya ‘tIzasaha—’ (7-2-48) itIqvikalpaH . iwpakze sahitA .
iqaBAvapakze ‘sahivahorod avarRasya’ (6-3-112) ityokAraH . ‘ho QaH’
(8-2-31) iti Qatvam . takArasya Datvam, tasya zwutvena QakAraH . ‘Qo Qe lopaH’
(8-3-13) iti pUrvaQakArasya lopaH . ‘parjanyavallakzaRaM pravartate’ (pari. 120) iti

viByaH—’ (8-3-70) iti zatvaM na . vipUrvakAt sahateH lyuwi sAkzAtpraBftizu

sahateH kvasO parasmEpadam, upaDAdIrGatvam, advirvacanatvam, aniwtvaM ca .
‘sAhvAn = valAhakaH’ iti kASikA (6-1-12) .
5. ‘SakisahoSca’ (3-1-99) iti yat . Ryato'pavAdaH .

sarvalopI . ‘anyezAmapi dfSyate’ (6-3-137) iti pUrvapadasya dIrGaH . ‘saheH
sAQaH saH’ (8-3-56) iti mUrDanyAdeSaH . dvitIyAdizu tu ‘saheH pftanartAByAM
ca’ (8-3-109) iti zatvam . evaM jalAzAw ityAdizu ceti boDyam .
7. ‘anudAttetaSca halAdeH’ (3-2-149) iti tAcCIliko yuc .
8. soQuM SakrotItyarTe ‘tAcCIlyavayovacanaSaktizu—’ (3-2-129) iti cAnaS .
9. tacCIlAdizu kartfzu ‘alaMkfYa… sahacara izRuc’ (3-2-136) itIzRucpratyayaH .
10. RyantAt kartari, ‘anupasargAt… sAhiByaSca’ (3-1-138) iti SapratyayaH .
pratyayasya SittvAt ‘kartari Sap’ (3-1-68) iti Sap . sAhayatIti sAhayaH .

KacpratyayaH . ‘arurdvizat—’ (6-3-67) iti pUrvapadasya mumAgamaH . sarvasahaH =
atIva sUkzmabudDiH . evaM SatruMsaha ityAdyapi .
12. ‘pUHsarvayordArisahoH’ (3-2-41) iti Kac . pUrvavat num . sarvasahA =
vasumatI . saMjYA'tra .
13. ‘SakaDfzajYAglAGawaraBalaBakramasaha—’ (3-4-65) iti sahaDAtO upapade DAto-
stumun .
1. ‘sahivahicalipativadiByo yaNanteByaH—’ (vA. 3-2-171) iti kiH kin vA
pratyayaH . pratyayasya liqvadBAvAt dvirvacanAdikam iti kecit . vastuto yaNantAdeva
viDAnAt ‘sanyaNoH’ (6-1-9) iti dvirvacanamiti nyAyyam .
2. jvalAditvAt (3-1-140) kartari RapratyayaH . tasya vEkalpikatvAt pakze pacAdyac .
3. utpUrvakAdasmAd grahyAdi (3-1-134) pAWAt kartari RiniH .
4. ‘artilUDUsUKanasaha—’ (3-2-184) iti karaRe itrapratyayaH .
5. RyantAt sani upratyaye rUpamevam . uttaraKaRqe ‘saH svidisvadisahInAM ca’
(8-3-62) iti satvam; ‘stOti—’ (8-3-61) iti niyamasya bADako'yam .
6. ‘saheH zaz luk ca’ (da. u. 9-7) iti DAtoH zazAdeSaH, kaninpratyayasya luk
ca . zaw = saMKyAviSezaH .
7. ORAdike (da. u. 5-30) asAnacpratyaye rUpam . sahasAnaH = kzamAvAn .

asmAdeva DAtoH sAhvAn iti (RijaBAvapakze) SudDAt nipAtyate iti kEyawaH

Rvan-niziRvan-viziRvan-tI, 9 seruH, 10 puruzaH-pUruzaH, 11 setram, 12 setuH, [Page1343+ 29] 1 sIram, iti viSezarUpARi .

netare .’ (vyAGraBUtikArikA 7-2-10) iti vfttiviroDAt tAvupekzyO--

iti uditpakzamevANgIkftavAn . 2 siDitvA-seDitvA, siseDizakaH-sisiDizakaH-zikA, 3 aBizeDan-parizeDan-ntI, 4 aBiseDayan gAH, 5 suzeDaH-duHzeDaH-niHzeDaH, 6 siDraH, 7 siDrakaH-siDrakAvaRam; [Page1344+ 28]
itImAni viSezarUpARi . itarARi samastAnyapi rUpARi BOvAdikaSarDativat
(1748) boDyAni .

iti, duHzeDaH, niHzeDaH ityatra ‘numvisarjanIyaSarvyavAye'pi’ (8-3-58)

tatrApi zatvaprAptyarTam, gatyarTe ‘seDatergatO’ (8-3-113) iti nizeDabADanArTa
ca suzAmAdizu pAWa ityavaDeyam .

siDrakAvaRam ityatra ‘vanagiryoH—’ (6-3-117) ityatra kowarAditvAt dIrGaH .
‘vanaM puragAmiSrakAsiDrakA—’ (8-4-4) iti Ratvam . siDrakavfkzapracuro vana-
viSezaH—siDrakAvaRam .

(1836) “ziDu saMrAdDO” (IV-divAdiH-1192. saka. ani. para.)
‘siDeH siDyati saMrAdDO—’ (Slo. 116) iti devaH .
saMrAdDiH = nizpattiH . “kecidUditaM paWanti; tadasat . anudAttopadeSavE-
yarTyAt” iti mADavaH . 1 sidDyaH, 2 siDitvA-seDitvA-sidDvA, 3 sidDaH, 4 sANkASyasidDaH, 5 annaM sADayan,
tapaH seDayan, iti viSezarUpARi . itarARi sarvARyapi pUrvaDAtuvat jYeyAni .
1. ‘puzyasiMdDyO nakzatre’ (3-1-116) iti nipAtanAt nakzatraviSeze vAcye sati
DAtoH kyap . Ryato'pavAdaH . sidDyati asminnupakrAntaM kAryamiti sidDyaH =
puzyanakzatraH . anyatra seDyam iti Ryadeva .
2. udittvAdiqvikalpaH, ‘ralo vyupaDAt—’ (1-2-26) iti kittvavikalpaH . tena
rUpatrayam .
3. udittvena ktvAyAmiqvikalpanAt, nizWAyAmiRnizeDaH . saMjYAyAM ktapratyayo'yam .
sidDA iti devayoniviSezAH .
4. sAMkASye sidDaH sAMkASyasidDaH . ‘sidDaSuzkapakvabanDESca’ (2-1-41) iti
saptamIsamAsaH . ‘nensidDabaDnAtizu ca’ (6-3-19) iti saptamyA aluko nizeDaH;
anyaTA, ‘sANkASye—’ iti saptamyAH ‘tatpuruze kfti—’ (6-3-14) iti
aluk SrUyeta . tatra sUtre bahulagrahaRAdeva kvacidaluko'pravfttO tu nAtra sidDagrahaRaM
karaRamityAstAM tAvat .
5. ‘sidDyaterapAralOkike'rTe’ (6-1-149) iti RAvAtvam . paralokasADanaBUte tu
‘tapaH seDayan’ ityatra na Atvam .

iqaBAvapakze ‘halantAcca’ (1-2-10) iti sanaH kittvAt ‘cCvoH SW—’

iti rUpam . ‘na ktvA sew’ (1-2-18) iti kittvanizeDAt guRaH .

micCanti zWivusivuDAtvoH’ iti mADavaH . tena sIvanam ityapi yaTAlakzyaM sADu .

(1844) “zuY aBizave” (V-svAdiH-1247. saka. ani. uBa.)
dEvaSlokaH, savatO (1843) drazwavyaH . aBizavaH = snapanapIqanasnAnasurAsanDAnAdiH . 3 sunvan-tI, 4 sutvA-sutvarI, 5 aBizutya, 6 savanam, 7 rAjasUyaH, 8 sutyA, [Page1347+ 26] 1 AsAvyam-savyam, 2 somasut, 3 aBisozyan-ntI-tI, aBisusUzuH, aBizavaH, 4 AsutIvalaH, 5 surA, 6 surakaH, 7 somaH iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnya-
rUpARi tu BOvAdikadavativat (847) boDyAni .
3. ‘suYo yajYasaMyoge’ (3-2-132) iti SatA . laqAdeSAt SaturayaM BinnaH, yajamAna
ucyate sunvan iti . DAtoruBayapaditvena Satari SAnaci ca ‘aBizuRvan-
aBizuRvAnaH somam’ ityazi krameRa Bavati .
4. BUte ‘suyajoH—’ (3-2-103) iti Nvanip . pratyayasya NittvAt guRanizeDaH .
pittvAt tuk . sutvA-izwavAn yaH, sa evamucyate . striyAm ‘vano ra ca’ (4-1-7)
iti NIp, rePaSca .
5. lyapi tuk . ‘upasargAt sunoti—’ (8-3-65) iti zatvam .
6. savanam = yajYaH, prAtarmaDyasAyaNkAlarUpakAlatrayaM ca . lyuwi rUpamevam .
7. rAjYA sUyate'sO iti, rAjA vA'sO sUyate ityarTe ‘rAjasUya—’ (3-1-114)
ityanena rAjaSabde upapade sunoteH kyap, dIrGaSca . rAjasUyaH = rAjYEva sADanIyaH
kratuviSezaH . arDarcAditvAt rAjasUyam-rAjasUyaH ityuBayamapi sADveva .
8. ‘saMjYAyAM samajanizadanipatamanavidazuY—’ (3-3-99) iti striyAM kyapi, tuki ca
rUpamevam . sutyA kratuviSezaH .
1. ‘Asuyu—’ (3-1-126) iti RyatpratyayaH . ajantatvalakzaRayato'pavAdaH .
AsAvyam = yajYiyaM savanakarma . anyatra savyamityeva .
2. BUte ‘some suYaH’ (3-2-90) iti kvip . somaM = somayAgaM sutavAn izwavAn
somasut .
3. atra ‘upasargAt sunoti—’ (8-3-65) iti prAptasya zatvasya ‘sunoteH syasanoH’
(8-3-117) iti nizeDaH . evaM sannantezu sarvatra zatvaM na .
4. ANpUrvakAdasmAt ktinnantAt ‘rajaH kfzyAsuti—’ (5-2-112) iti matvarTIye
valapratyaye ‘vale’ (6-3-118) iti dIrGaH .
5. ORAdike (da. u. 8-42) kranpratyaye rUpam . surA = madyaviSezaH .
6. surakaH = ahiviSezaH, yena dazwA mAdyanti . surASabdAt surA iva surakaH;
ivArTe kani, ‘ke'RaH’ (7-4-13) iti hrasvaH .
7. ORAdike (da. u. 6-79) maninpratyaye rUpam . somaH = latAviSezaH .

pekzyam . taTA ca BAzyam—(6-1-64) “ajdantyaparAH sAdayaH zopadeSAH,
smiNsvadisvidisvaYjisvapayaSca; sfpisfjistfstyAsekfsfvarjam” iti .
6. ‘guroSca halaH’ (3-3-103) iti striyAmakArapratyayaH .
7. kvipi UWi ayAdeSe ca rUpamevam .
8. ‘karmaRi ca; yena saMsparSAt kartuH SarIrasuKam’ (3-3-116) iti karmaRyupapade
lyuw . ‘upapadamatiN’ (2-2-19) iti samAsaH .
‘yena saMsparSane kartuH SarIrasuKasamBavaH .
tatkarmopapade lyuw syAt janEranilasevanam ..’ iti prakriyAsarvasvam .
1. ‘BuvaSca’ (3-2-138) ityatra cakArasyAnuktasamuccayArTakatvAt tacCIlAdizu kartfzu
DAtorasmAdapi izRucpratyayaH .
2. ‘pariniviByaH seva—’ (8-3-70) iti zatvam .
3. kzipakAditvAt (ga. sU. 7-3-45) saMjYAyAM itvanizeDaH . anyatra sevikA .

(1856) “zE kzaye” (I-BvAdiH-915. aka. ani. para.)
‘zE kzaye sAyatItIzwaM antakarmaRi tu syati .’ (Slo. 7) iti devaH .
‘sE’ iti kecit . sa tu pAWo BAzyAdi (6-1-64) viroDAdupekzyaH .
azwADyAyIsUtrezu zADAtugrahaRAni sarvARyapi dEvAdikasyeti nizkarzaH . sAtam .
sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakAyativat (263) boDyAni .

(1857) “zo antakarmaRi” (IV-divAdiH-1147. saka. ani. para.)
dEvaSlokaH pUrvaDAtO drazwavyaH . sAmAnyarUpARi Cyativat (577) UhyAni . 4 sAyakaH, 5 avasitam-avasitaH-avasitavAn, sitvA, 6 avasAyaH, 7 sAyayitA, 8 sAtiH, 9 avasAya, 10 aBisizAsuH, [Page1351+ 29] 1 praRizyan-ntI-tI, 2 pratisitam, 3 sAyaH-sAyam, 4 sAma, sAtma-sAtmyam iti
viSezarUpARi .
4. ‘kftyalyuwo bahulam’ (3-3-113) ityatra bahulagrahaRat, yogaviBAgAdvA saMjYAyAM
Rvul . ‘Ato yuk—’ (7-3-33) iti yugAgamaH . syati = antaM karoti
iti sAyakaH = SaraH .
5. ‘dyatisyati—’ (7-4-40) iti nizWAdizu kitpratyayezu ikAraH . evam sitvA,
avasitiH ityAdizvapi boDyam .
6. ‘SyA''dvyaDASrusaMsravatIRavasAvahf—’ (3-1-141) iti kartari RapratyayaH .
yugAgamaH . avasyatIti avasAyaH niScayaH . sUtre AdantatvenEva Rapratyaye sidDe
punaH ‘avasA’ iti grahaRaM AdantalakzaRaM kartari kapratyayaM bADitum .
7. RijantAt tfci rUpamevam . ‘SAcCAsA—’ (7-3-37) iti yuk . AdantalakzaRa-
puko'pavAdaH .
8. ‘UtiyUtijUtisAti—’ (3-3-97) iti ktinnanto nipAtaH . nipAtanAdeva
‘dyatisyati—’ (7-4-40) itItvaM na .
9. ‘na lyapi’ (6-4-69) iti ikAranizeDaH .
10. ‘sTAdizvaByAsena—’ (8-3-64) iti niyamAt aByAse na zatvam . uttaraKaRqe tu
‘iRkoH’ (8-3-57) iti zatvam .
1. Satari ‘divAdiByaH—’ (3-1-69) iti Syan . ‘otaH Syani’ (7-3-71)
ityokAralopaH . ‘upasargAt sunotisuvatisyati—’ (8-3-65) iti zatvam .
‘nergadanadapatapadaGumAsyati—’ (8-4-17) iti Ratvam .
2. ‘pariniviByaH sevasita—’ (8-3-70) ityatra nizWAntasyAsyApi grahaRamiti
kecit . tezAM mate parizitam, nizitam, vizitam iti zatvam .
pratisitam ityatra tu na zatvamiti boDyam .
3. GaYi yugAgamaH . avasIyate iti sAyaH = kAlaviSezaH . asyEva ‘sAyam’ iti
svarAdizu (1-1-37) nipAtanAt makArAntatvam, avyayatvaM ca iti kecit .
anye tu ‘avyutpannaM prAtipadikam ‘sAyam’ iti’ iti vadanti .
4. ‘sAtiByAM—’ (da. u. 6-81) iti maniRpratyaye sAma . tenEva sUtrena tmanpratyaye
sAtma = sAntvanam .

(1858) “zwaka pratiGAte” (I-BvAdiH-782. saka. sew. para.) GawAdiH .
GawAditvAt mittvam; tena RijantAd hrasvaH . Ramuli dIrGavikalpaH . sarvARyapi
rUpARi cakati (482) vat boDyAni .

(1859) “zwage saMvaraRe” (I-BvAdiH-790. saka. sew. para.) GawAdiH .
‘zWage’ iti kzIrasvAmI . ‘saMvaraRam = tiroDAnam’ iti DAtukAvyavyA-
KyA (2-8) . ‘kake nocyate’ (143) iti DAtuvadrUpARi UhyAni .

(1860) “zwana Sabde” (I-BvAdiH-461. aka. sew. para.)
‘Sabde ca devaSabde ca stanati stanayet kramAt .’ (Slo. 127) iti devaH .
‘stana—’ iti nyAsakAraH (8-3-86) . tat BAzyaviroDAdupekzyam . 5 aBinizwAnaH aBinistAnaH = visarjanIyaH . 6 stanaH, stAnyam, iti
viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi kagativat (143) boDyAni . [Page1352+ 29]
5. ‘akartari ca kArake—’ (3-3-19) iti saMjYAyAM GaY . ‘aBinisaH stanaH
SabdasaMjYAyAm’ (8-3-86) iti zatvavikalpaH . SAbdikasaMjYAyAM aBinizwAnaH
iti visarjanIyasya nAma . taTA ca ApastambaH—’ ‘dvyakzaraM caturakzaraM vA nAma
pUrvamAKyAtottaraM dIrGABinizwAnAntaM GozavadAdyantarAntaHsTam’ iti . visarga-
sTAnikajihvAmUlIyopaGmAnIyayoH aBinizwAnaH iti saMketa iti kecit . tattu
nyAsapadamaYjaryAdiviroDAdupekzyam .
6. pacAdyaci stanaH . stAnyam iti tu Ryati bodDyam .

(1861) “zwaBi pratibanDe” (I-BvAdiH-386. saka. sew. Atma.)
‘staBnAti staBnuyAt stuBnAtyapi stuBnoti sOtrayoH .
stamBate pratibanDArTe stamBe'rTe stoBate Sapi ..’ (Slo. 142) iti devaH .
BOvAdikakandativat (163) sarvARi rUpARi jYeyAni . 1 uttamBanam, 2 zwamBamARaH stamBamAnaH .
1. ‘udaH sTAstamBvoH pUrvasya’ (8-4-61) iti sakArasya pUrvasavarRasTakAraH . upasarga-
dakArasya tasya ca cartvena takAraH . tataSca upasargatakAra-pUrvasavarRaprAptatakAra-takArarUpAH
trayastakArAH . prayoge paramuccAraRakleSAt dvitakAraSravaRam, ‘Jaro Jari—’ (8-4-65)
iti kasyacit takArasya lopaH . ‘udaH sTAstamBvoH—’ (8-4-61) ityatra
‘stamBu—’ (3-1-82) iti sOtrastamBuDAtoH, asya ca grahaRam-aviSezeRa .
2. “‘OpadeSiko'yaM wakAraH, na tu zwutvanibanDanaH ityeke’ iti kzIrasvAmi-
mEtreyarakzitO—” iti puruzakAraH . tadAnIM ‘DAtvAdeH zaH saH’ (6-1-64)
iti zakArasya satvABAvAt zwamBamARaH iti SAnaci rUpam . nidarSanArTamidamekaM
pradarSitam . ‘sAdeSe subDAtuzWivuzvazkatInAM pratizeDaH’ (vA. 6-1-64) iti
BAzyaparAmarSe tu OpadeSikawakArapakzo na BAzyasammatta iti jYAyate .

(1862) “zwama avEklavye” (I-BvAdiH-830. aka. sew. para.)
GawAdiH .
sidDAntakOmudyAdizu kezucidevAyaM paWitaH . rUpARi samastAnyapi kaKativat
(142) boDyAni . amantatvena mittvAt RijantAt hrasvaH, Ramuli dIrGavikalpaSca .

(1863) “zwiGa Askandane” (V-svAdiH-1265. saka. sew. Atma.)
sOvAdikatiknotivat (716) sarvARi rUpARi boDyAni .

(1864) “zwipf kzaraRe” (I-BvAdiH-364. saka. sew. Atma.)
‘zwipa—’ iti kecit . rUpARi samastAnyapi dEvAdikakzipyativat (306)
boDyAni .

(1865) “zwima ArdrIBAve” (IV-divAdiH-1124. saka. sew. para.)
‘stima—’ iti mADavAdayaH . ‘niScalIBAve’ iti ca kecit .
‘klede’ iti pare . stimitam . BOvAdikakewativat (190) rUpARi jYeyAni .

(1866) “zwIma ArdrIBAve” (IV-divAdiH-1125. saka. sew. para.)
‘tIma—’ iti kecit paWanti iti DAtuvfttiH . IdfSezu DAtuzu
na ko'pi viSezaH . sarvARi rUpARi krIqativat (275) boDyAni .

(1867) “zwuca prasAde” (I-BvAdiH-175. aka. sew. Atma.)
1 stokaH-stokakaH, 2 udaSvitsokam, 3 stokAnmuktaH, stokena muktaH, 4 saMstojaH;
iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi BOvAdikacayativat (502) boDyAni .
1. GaYi rUpamevam . DAtoH prasAdArTatve'pi stoka ityAdizu alpArTatvam .
nizwAyAM sewtvAt GaYi kutvasyAprasaktO ‘karaRe ca stoka—’ (2-3-33) ityAdizu
nirdeSAt kutvamiti mADavaH . stoka eva stokakaH .
2. ‘powAyuvatistoka—’ (2-1-65) iti tatpuruzaH . stokam = alpaM udaSvit,
udaSivatstokam .
3. ‘karaRe ca stokAlpa—’ (2-3-33) iti tftIyApaYcamyO . paYcamIpakze ‘paYcamyAH
stokAdiByaH’ (6-3-2) ityaluk .
4. “varRabikArAByupagamAt saMpUrvakAt GaYi cakArasya jakAre saMstojaH iti mEtreyaH”
iti mADavAcAryAH .

(1868) “zwuY stutO” (II-adAdiH-1043. saka. ani. uBa.)
stuvan- 5 aBizwuvan, 6 tuzwUzan-tuzwUzamARaH, 7 agnizwut-puruzwut, 8 stutyaH-avaSya-
stutyaH, 9 grAvastut, 10 AyatastUH, 11 stotram, 12 prastAvaH, stavaH, 13 saMstAvaH-saMstavaH, [Page1354+ 29] 1 stutiH, 2 prastotA, 3 parizwuvan-nizwuvan-vizwuvan, 4 stomaH, 5 agnizwomaH 6 jyotizwomaH-AyuHzwomaH, parizwomaH, 7 stoBaH, ‘mfqA jaritre rudra 8 stavAnaH’
(tE. saM 4-5-24), 9 triBiHzwutaH-triBiHstutaH, iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi
AdAdikakzROtivat (323) boDyAni .
5. Satari uvaN . aBizwuvan ityatra ‘upasargAt sunotisuvatisyatistOti—’
(8-3-65) ityAdinA zatvam .
6. sannantAdupratyaye rUpam . aByAse ‘SarpUrvAH KayaH’ (7-4-61) iti KayaH SezaH .
halAdiSezApavAdaH . ‘stOtiRyoreva—’ (8-3-61) iti zatvam .
7. agniM stOtIti agnizwut . ‘kvip ca’ (3-2-76) iti karmaRyupapade kvip .
tuk . ‘agneH stut—’ (8-3-82) iti zatvam . puru stOtIti puruzwut =
ftvigviSezaH . atra suzAmAditvAt (8-3-98), CAndasatvAdvA zatvam .
8. ‘etistu—’ (3-1-109) iti kyap . prakftasUtre ‘kyap’ ityanuvartamAne'pi punaH
kyabgrahaRaM ‘orAvaSyake’ (3-1-125) iti prAptasya Ryato'pyapavAdArTam .
avaSyastutyaH ityatra mayUravyaMsakAditvAt samAsaH .
9. ‘BrAjaBAsa… grAvastuvaH kvip’ (3-2-177) iti grAvaSabda upapade
stOteH kvip tAcCIlikaH . tuk . grAvastut = ftvigviSezaH .
10. AyataM stOti iti AyastUH . ‘kvib vacipracCyAyatastu—’ (vA. 3-2-76)
iti kvip . dIrGaSca . hrasvABAvAt tuk na .
11. ‘dAmnISasayuyujastu—’ (3-2-182) iti karaRe zwranpratyayaH .
12. prapUrvakAdasmAt ‘pre studruSruvaH’ (3-3-27) iti GaY . uvarRAntatvalakzaRApo-
'pavAdaH . anyatra stavaH ityeva .
13. ‘yajYe sami stuvaH’ (3-3-31) iti saMpUrvakAdasmAt GaY . yajYakarmaRi yatra deSe
CandogAH sametya stuvanti sa deSaH saMstAva ityucyate . anyatra saMstavaH paricayaH .
1. ‘SruyajIzistuByaH—’ (vA. 3-3-94) iti karaRe ktinpratyayaH . stUyate'nayeti
stutiH stotram .
2. prapUrvakAdasmAt tAcCIlike ‘tfn’ (3-2-135) iti tfnpratyaye rUpamevam .
prastotA = ftvigviSezaH .
3. atra sarvatra ‘pariniviByaH sevasitasayasivusahasuwstu—’ (8-3-70) iti zatvam .
4. ORAdike (da. u. 7-26) manpratyaye rUpamevam . stomaH stutivyUhaH . upacArAt
stomaH samUhArTakaH .
5. ‘agneH stutstoma—’ (8-3-82) iti zatvam .
6. ‘jyotirAyuzaH stomaH’ (8-3-83) iti zatvam . parizwoma ityatra tu
‘upasargAt sunotisuvatisyatistOti—’ (8-3-65) ityAdinA zatvam .
7. ORAdike Bapratyaye rUpam . stoBaH = kevalastutiprayojanako varRasamUhaH .
8. ORAdike (da. u. 5-32) Anacpratyaye rUpam . loke'pi prayogArho'yaM SabdaH .
9. ‘stutastomayoSCandasi’ (8-3-105) iti ekezAM matena zatvam . anyezAM
mate na . tena rUpadvayam .

(1869) “zwupa samucCrAye” (X-curAdiH-1673. aka. sew. uBa.)
‘stupa’ iti durgaH . cOrAdikakopayativat (225) rUpARi UhyAni .
‘zwUpa—’ iti kecit . aci-stUpaH .

(1870) “zwuBu stamBe” (I-BvAdiH-394. saka. sew. Atma.)
‘—stamBe'rTe stoBate Sapi .’ (Slo. 143) iti devaH . 10 stubDaH, 11 nitustoBizakaH-nitustuBizakaH-zikA, 12 anuzwup-trizwup, [Page1355+ 30] 1 stuBiMtvA-stoBitvA-stubDvA, 2 nizwoBitA-trI; iti viSozarUpARi . sAmAnya-
rUpARi jfmBativat (617) boDyAni .
10. udittvena ktvAyAmiqvikalpanAt nizWAyAmiRnizeDaH . ‘JazastaTorDo'DaH’
(8-2-40) iti Datvam, BakArasya jaStvena bakAraH .
11. atra aByAsena vyavaDAnAt, asTAditvAt ca ‘stOtiRyoreva—’ (8-3-61)
iti niyamAt na zatvam . SarpUrvakatvAt KayaH SezaH .
12. anu stoBate iti anuzwup . kvipi ‘upasargAt sunotisuvatisyatistOtistoBati—’
(8-3-65) iti zatvam . trizwup ityatra suzAmAditvat (8-3-98) zatvam . uBe
CandoviSezavAcike, BakArAnte ca . padAntatvanimittakaH pakAraH praTamEkavacane .
pakze anuzwub, Yizwub iti bakArAntatvamapi .
1. udittvAdiqvikalpaH . ‘ralo vyupaDAt—’ (1-2-26) iti kittvavikalpaH . tena
rUpatrayam .
2. tfci ‘upasargAt—’ (8-3-65) iti zatve rUpamevam . mADavaDAtuvfttO
atra prakaraRe nizwobDA iti aniwkaM tfjantarUpaM paWitaM dfSyate . DAtAvasmin
valAderArDaDAtukasyeqvikalpapratipAdakaSAstrABAvAt cintyamidam . kiYca “‘prAk
sitAdaqvyavAye'pi’ (8-3-63) iti zatvam” ityuktaM tatra; tadapi na saNgacCate .

(1871) “zwepf kzaraRArTaH” (I-BvAdiH-365. saka. sew. Atma.)
BOvAdikakepativat (261) sarvARyapi rUpARyUhyAni .

(1872) “zwE vezwane” (I-BvAdiH-922. saka. ani. para.)
‘zRE’ iti svAmyAdayaH . ‘aprAkASye’ iti kecit . ‘ 3 stAyUnAM pataye
namaH (tE. saM. 4-5-7)’ . itarARi rUpARi BOvAdikakAyativat (263) boDyAni .
3. bAhulakAt ORAdike uRpratyaye ‘Ato yuk—’ (7-3-33) iti yugAgame ca
rUpam . “CadmanA ye vastrAdInapaharanti te stAyavaH” iti BawwaBAskaraH .

(1873) “zwyE SabdasaMGAtayoH” (I-BvAdiH-911. aka. ani. para.)
‘SabdasaMGAtayorDAtvoH styAyatyekasya so na zaH .’ (Slo. 7) iti devaH . 4 prastImaH-prastItaH, prastImavAn-prastItavAn, 5 prasaMstItaH, 6 styAtaH-saMstyAnaH, 7 strI,
iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi BOvAdikakAyativat (263) boDyAni . [Page1356+ 28]
4. prapUrvakasyAsya nizWAyAm, ‘styaH prapUrvasya’ (6-1-23) iti yakArasya samprasAraRe,
pUrvarUpe, dIrGe ca, ‘prastyo'nyatarasyAm’ (8-2-54) iti nizWAtakArasya makArAdeSa-
vikalpaH . makArAdeSABAvapakze ‘saMyogAderAto DAtIryaRvataH’ (8-2-43) iti nizWAnatvaM
na Bavati; samprasAraRasya nityatvAt, samprasAraRe kartavye nizWAnatvasyAsidDatvAt .
5. ‘prastyaH’ ityeva vaktavye ‘styaH prapUrvasya’ (6-1-23) iti vacanam—praSabdo
yasmAt DAtUpasargasamudAyAt pUrvaH, tasmAdapi prasAraRaM BavatIti jYApanArTam . tena
prasaMstItaH ityatrApi samprasAraRAdikam .
6. praBinnopasargopapadasya SudDasya ca DAtoH na samprasAraRAdikam . atra ‘saMyogAderAto
DAtoryaRvataH’ (8-2-43) iti nizWAnatvam . atra sarvatrApi styADAtugrahaRezu
‘zwyE’ ityasya ‘styE’ ityasya ca grahaRaM sarvasammatam . yadAha vAmanaH
‘samprasAraRaviDO zopadeSo'pyayaM styArUpo gfhyate’ (6-1-23) iti .
7. ‘styAyaterqraw’ (paYca. u. 4-165) iti qrawpratyaye qittvAwwilope vali lope,
wittvAt NIpi ca strI iti sampadyate .

(1874) “zwrakza gatO” (I-BvAdiH-661. (pA.) saka. sew. para.)
BOvAdikatakzativat (691) sarvARi rUpARi UhyAni .

(1875) “zWala sTAne” (I-BvAdiH-836. aka. sew. para.)
jvalAdiH . ‘sTala—’ iti mADavaH . 1 sTAlaH-sTalaH, 2 sTalam, 3 kapizWalaH,
kapisTalam, 4 sTalI-sTalA, 5 sTAlI, 6 vizWalam-kuzWalam-SamizWalam-parizWalam,
iti viSezarUpARi . itarARi sAmAnyarUpARi BOvAdikacalativat (510)
boDyAni .
1. ‘jvalitikasanteByaH—’ (3-1-140) iti kartari RapratyayavikalpaH . pakze
pacAdyaci sTalaH iti sADuH .
2. aDikaraRe Gapratyayo bAhulakAt . bAhulakAdeva GAntasya klIbatvam .
3. ‘kapizWalo gotre’ (8-3-91) iti nipAtanAt zatvam . kapizWalaH = gotrapravartako
fziH . anyatra kapInAM sTalam kapisTalam ityeva .
4. ‘jAnapadakuRqagoRasTala—’ (4-1-42) ityAdinA akftrimArTe (svABAvike
sTale vivakzite) NIz . sTalI = akftrimA BUmiH . sTalA = kftrimA
sODAdizu BUH .
5. saMjYAyAM ‘halaSca’ (3-3-121) iti GaY . GaYantAt sTAlaSabdAt gOrAdizu
(4-1-41) pAWAt NIz . sTAlI = pAtraviSezaH .
6. ‘vikuSamipariByaH sTalam’ (8-3-96) iti zatvamatra .
