sAsnAsakaH-sikA;
snAtA-trI, snApayitA-snapayitA-trI, sizRAsitA-trI, sAsnAyitA-trI;
ityAdIni rUpARi BAtivat (1153) boDyAni . 5 pratizRAtam, 6 nizRAtaH, 7 nadIzRaH-nadIzRAtaH, nadIsnAtaH, 8 susnAtam, sOsnAtikaH, [Page1365+ 28] 1 prasnaH, 2 snAnIyam, 3 snAtvAkAlakaH, 4 brAhmaRasnApakaH, 5 snAvA, 6 snAtvI, 7 snAyuH itImAni viSezarUpARi .
2. Rvuli ‘Ato yuk—’ (7-3-33) iti yugAgamaH . DAtvAdizakArasya sakAraH .
3. Ryante sarvatra AdantalakzaRaH pugAgamo boDyaH . puganantaram, ‘glAsnAvanuvamAM
ca’ (ga. sU. BvAdiH) iti Rijante mittvavikalpaH . mittvapakze snapaka ityAdIni
hrasvaGawitAni rUpARi . mittvABAvapakze snApakaH ityAdIni . ‘… anupasargAdvA’
(ga. sU. BvAdiH) ityanuvftteH sopasargasTalezu mittvaM neti boDyam . kzIrataraNgiRyAM
‘prasnapayati’ iti dfSyate; nUnamaSudDaH pAWo'yam .
4. sannante ‘AdeSapratyayayoH’ (8-3-59) ityuttaraKaRqe zatvam . zwutvena nakArasya
RakAraH .
5. ‘sUtraM pratizRAtam’ (8-3-90) iti mUrDanyaviSizwo nipAtaH . pratizRAtam =
SudDaM sUtramityarTaH . anyatra pratisnAtamityeva .
6. nitarAM snAtaH nizRAtaH kuSalaH . ‘ninadIByAM snAteH kOSale’ (8-3-89) iti
zatvam . nizRAtaH kawakaraRe, nizRAto rajjuvartane . atra DAtvarTasya na vivakzA .
7. nadyAM snAtIti nadIzRaH . ‘supi sTaH’ (3-2-4) ityatra yogaviBAgAt
kapratyayaH, ‘ninadIByAM snAteH kOSale’ (8-3-89) iti zatvam . “nadIzRa
iti . nadIsnAne kuSala ityarTaH . kavayastu kuSalamAtre prayuYjate .” iti haradattaH .
kOSalaBinnArTe tu nadIsnAta ityeva .
8. atra ‘su’ ityasya karmapravacanIyatvena na zatvam iti kecit . vastutaH zatbasya
prAptyaBAvAt ‘sAt padAdyoH’ (8-3-111) iti nizeDAcca zatvameva na . susnAtaM
pfcCati sOsnAtikaH . ‘pfcCatO susnAtAdiByaH’ (vA. 4-4-1) iti Wak .
1. ‘GaYarTe kaviDAnaM glAsnApA—’ (vA. 3-3-58) iti kapratyayaH . prasnAntyasmin
iti prasnaH = SElezu vidyamAno jalASayaH . ‘Ato lopa iwi ca’ (6-4-64)
ityAkAralopaH .
2. bAhulakAt karaRe'nIyarpratyayaH . snAntyaneneti snAnIyam = snAnasADanaBUtaScUrRa-
viSezaH .
3. atra mayUravyaMsakAditvAt (2-1-72) samAsaH . mayUravyaMsakAdirAkftigaRaH . atra
yadyapi ‘snAtvAkAlakaH’ iti ‘samAse'naYpUrve ktvo lyap’ (7-1-37) iti
lyap nyAyyaH . taTApi gaRapAWAdeva na samAsa iti sidDAntaH . ‘—anaY’
ityasya paryudAsatvAt naYsadfSenAvyayena ktvAntasya samAsa eva lyabviDiH’ iti
kecit .
4. zyantAt Rvul . brAhmaRAnAM snApakaH iti yAjakAditvAt (2-2-19) zazWIsamAsaH .
5. ‘Ato maninkvanip—’ (3-2-74) iti kvanip .
6. ‘snAtvyAdayaSca’ (7-1-41) ityatra nipAtanAt ktvAyA IkAraSCandasi .
7. ORAdike uRpratyaye rUpam . snAyuH = SarIrasTamajjAviSezaH .

(1881) “zRiha prItO” (IV-divAdiH-1200. aka. vew. para.)
raDAdiH .
‘snehane snehayet, prItO snihyet— .’ (Slo. 198) iti devaH .
‘sniha—’ iti kecit . tad BAzyAdiviroDAdupekzyam .
snehakaH-hikA, snehakaH-hikA, 8 sisnihizakaH-sisnehizakaH-sisnikzakaH-kzikA, 9 sezRihakaH-hikA; 10 snehitA-snegDA-sneQA-QrI, snehayitA-trI, sisnihizitA-
sisnehizitA-sisnikzitA-trI, sezRihitA-trI, ityAdIni rUpARi dEvAdika- [Page1366+ 28]
druhyativat (885) boDyAni . 1 snihitvA-snehitvA-snigDvA-snIQvA, 2 snigDaH-snIQaH, 3 uzRik-uzRihA, 4 snihitiH, 5 snehuH, iti viSezarUpARi .
8. ‘raDAdiByaSca’ (7-2-45) itIqvikalpaH . ‘ralo vyupaDAt—’ (1-2-26) iti
kittvavikalpaH . zatvam . tena rUpatrayam . iqaBAvapakze ‘vA druhamuhazRuhazRihAm’
(8-2-33) iti GakAravikalpaH, tasya cartvena kakAraH . pakze hakArasya QakAre,
tasya kakAre'pi tulyaM rUpam .
9. yaNante'ByAse guRaH . uttaraKaRqe zatvam .
10. raDAditvAt (7-2-45) iqvikalpaH . ‘vA druhamuhazRuhazRihAm’ (8-2-33)
iti GatvavikalpaH . Gatvapakze Datve snegDA . Qatvapakze DatvaQatvazwutvaQalopadIrGezu
sneQA iti rUpam . evaM tavyadAdizvapi rUpatrayaM boDyam .
1. iqvikalpa-Gatvavikalpa-kittvavikalpAH . tena cAtUrUpyam .
2. nizWAyAmiRnizeDaH . Gatvapakze Qatvapakze ca rUpadvayam .
3. ‘ftvigdaDfksragdiguzRig—’ (3-2-59) ityatra nipAtanAt utpUrvakAdasmAt
kvin, upasargAntyalopaH, zatvaM ca . uzRik = CandoviSezaH . ‘kruYcA uzRihA
devaviSA’ iti BAzyakAraprayogAt ajAditvena sriyAM wApi uzRihA ityapi
sADuH . utsnihyatIti uzRik uzRihA vA .
4. nigfhItiH nipaWitiH ityAdizviva ‘titutrezvagrahAdInAm’ (vA. 7-2-9) iti
paryudAsAt iw iti prakriyAsarvasvam . etacca pAkzikam; tena snirDiH
snIQiH ityapi Bavatyeva .
5. ORAdike (da. u. 1-95) upratyaye snehuH = candramAH .

(1882) “zRiha snehane” (X-curAdiH-1572. saka. sew. uBa.)
‘sniwa’ iti ‘smiwa’ iti ca pAWaBedO . pUrvaDAtuvadrUpARyUhyAni .

(1883) “zRu prasravaRe” (II-adAdiH-1038. aka. sew. para.)
prasnavitA-trI, prasnavitum, susnUzan-ntI, prasnutaH iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi
tu AdAdikakzROtivat (323) boDyAni . valAderArDaDAtukasya sarvasyApi ‘snu-
kramoranAtmanepadanimitte’ (7-2-36) itIqAgamaH . sannantezu, kiti pratyaye ca
nizWAdO ‘sani grahaguhoSca’ (7-2-12) iti, ‘SryukaH kkiti’ (7-2-11) iti
ca iRnizeDaH .

(1884) “zRusu adane” (IV-divAdiH-1111. saka. sew. para.)
‘AdAne’ ityeke . ‘adarSane iti dramiqAH’ iti DAtuvfttiH . ‘zRusa
nirasane’ iti kecit paWanti . snuzA—igupaDalakzaRe kapratyaye wApi,
suzAmAditvAt (8-3-93) zatvam . ORAdiko'yamiti kecit . sarvARyapi
rUpARi knasyativat (265) boDyAni .

(1885) “zRuha udgiraRe” (IV-divAdiH-1199. saka. sew. para.)
raDAdiH . tena valAdyArDaDAtukezu iqvikalpaH . Jali padAnte ca ‘vA druhamu-
hazRuha—’ (8-2-23) iti GatvavikalpaH . sarvARyapi rUpARi dEvAdika-
druhyativat (885) boDyAni .

(1886) “zRE vezwane” (I-BvAdiH-923. saka. ani. para.)
‘SoBAyAM ca’ ityeke . ‘snAtIti SOce snaH snAyediti cecCanti kecana .’
(Slo. 12) iti devaH . ‘zwE’ ityeva prAyapAWaH . ‘uzRIzaM snAyateH’
(niruktam 7-12) ityatra skandasvAminA “uzRIpaM Sirovezwanam, snAyateH
SOcArTasya vezwanArTasya vA; uBayasyApi tatra samBavAt” iti vivftam . tena
DAturayaM BvAdAvapIti puruzakAre (Slo. 12) sapramARaM sADitam . rUpARi
sarvARyapi pAyativat (1062) boDyAni .

(1887) “zmiN IzadDasane” (I-BvAdiH-948. aka. ani. Atma.)
zopadeSo'yam . ‘IzadDAse smayeteti smAyayedityanAdare .’ (Slo. 15) iti
dEve, tadvyAKyAne puruzakAre ca ‘smiN’ iti paWitam . 1 sismayizakaH-zikA, 2 vismApayamAnaH, 3 smayamAno vivakzati, 4 smayaH, 5 smeraH,
smitam iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi BOvAdikakavativat (198) boDyAni .
1. ‘smipUNraYjvaSAM sani’ (7-2-74) iti sannante iqAgamaH . ‘sani grahaguhoSca’
(7-2-12) ityasyApavAdaH .
2. ‘BIsmyorhetuBaye’ (1-3-68) iti Atmanepadam . ‘nityaM smayateH’ (6-1-57)
iti Rijante sarvatra AkAraH prakfteH . Atve kfte pugAgamo'pi Bavati .
3. ‘lakzaRahetvoH kriyAyAH’ (3-2-126) iti lakzaRe SAnac .
4. ‘ajviDO BayAdInAmupasaMKyAnam’ (vA. 3-3-56) iti ac . atra lyuqapavAdo-
'yamiti kecit . smayanam ityapi lakzye'sti iti kecit .
5. ‘namikampismyajasakamahiMsadIpo raH’ (3-2-167) iti tAcCIliko rapratyayaH .

(1888) “zmiN anAdare”
(X-curAdiH-1573. (pA.) saka. sew. uBa.)
‘IzadDAse smayeteti smAyayedityanAdare’ (Slo. 15) iti devaH .
‘mEtrAyAdisammataH pAWo'yaM curAdizu’ iti vyAKyAtAraH . rUpARi yaTA-
samBavamUhyAni .

(1889) “zvaYja parizvaNge” (I-BvAdiH-976. saka. ani. Atma.) [Page1368+ 29]
1 pratizvajamARaH, 2 parizvajamARaH-nizvajamARaH-vizvajamARaH, 3 parizvaNgaH, 4 svaN-
ktvA-svaktvA, parizvajya, 5 parizizvaNkzamARaH, 6 sasvajivAn, iti viSezarUpARi .
sAmAnyarUpARi daMSativat (817) boDyAni .
1. SAnaci Sapi ‘daMSasaYjasvaYjAM Sapi’ (6-4-25) ityanunAsikalopaH . cavargapaYcamatvena
SrUyamARatve'pi nopaDo'yaM DAtuH . taduktam—‘nakArajAvanusvArapaYcamO Jali
DAtuzu’ iti . ‘upasargAt sunoti… svaYjAm’ (8-3-65) iti zatvam .
2. atra ‘pariniviByaH seva… svaYjAm’ (8-3-70) iti zatvam .
3. nizWAyAmaniwtvAt GaYi, ‘cajoH—’ (7-3-52) iti kutvam .
4. ‘jAntanaSAM viBAzA’ (6-4-32) iti nakAralopo vikalpena na Bavati .
tena rUpadvayam .
5. ‘sTAdizvaByAsena cAByAsasya’ (8-3-64) iti zatvam .
6. ‘SranTigranTidamBisvaYjInAM ca’ (vA. 1-2-6) iti liwaH kittvAt liqAdeSe
kvasAvapi kitvam . tenopaDAnakAralope, dvirvacanAdike ca, ‘vasvekAjAd—’
(7-2-67) iti iqAgame ca rUpamevam .

(1890) “zvada AsvAdane” (I-BvAdiH-18. saka. sew. Atma.)
‘AsvAdane'rTe svadate, svAdayediti SabRicoH .’ (Slo. 193) devaH .
‘saMvaraRe’ iti kecit . ‘AsvAdanam = jihvayA lehaH’ iti kzIrasvAmI .
‘anuBavaH’ iti mADavaH . ‘svadanti devA uBayA nihavyA’ (fk 7-2-2)
ityatra parasmEpadaM CAndasam . rasam 7 AsvadamAnaH, daDi 8 svadamAnaM devadattAya, 9 sisvAdayizu, ‘ 10 AsvAdanIM dAvaSoRitAnAm’ (yAdavAByudaye 20-31) iti
viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi BOvAdikakurdativat (230) boDyAni .
7. vastuto'karmako'yam . DAtoratra vivakzAvaSena sakarmakatvam . vistarastu
mADavIyAdO drazwavyaH .
8. ‘rucyarTAnAM prIyamARaH’ (1-4-33) iti rucyarTasyAsya DAtoryoge devadattasya
sampradAnatvAt caturTI .
9. RyantAt sani upratyaye rUpamevam . ‘saH svidisvadisahInAM ca’ (8-3-62)
iti sakAraH . ‘stOtiRyoreva—’ (8-3-61) iti niyamasya bADakaH .
10. ‘kftyalyuwo bahulam’ (3-3-113) iti bahulagrahaRAt RyantAt kartari lyuw;
wittvAt sriyAM NIp .

(1891) “zvada AsvAdane” (X-curAdiH-1805. saka. sew. uBa.)
AsvadIyaH . [Page1369+ 31]
‘AsvAdane'rTe svadate svAdayediti SabRicoH .’ (Slo. 103) iti devaH .
sarvARyapi rUpARi cOrAdikakAlayativat (185) boDyAni .

(1892) “Yi zvapa Saye” (II-adAdiH-1068. aka. ani. para.) [a]
svApakaH-pikA, svApakaH-pikA, 1 suzupsakaH-psikA, 2 sozupakaH-pikA;
svaptA-svaptrI, svApayitA-trI, suzupsitA-trI, sozupitA-trI;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikavapativat (1556) boDyAni . 3 suptaH,
suptvA-suptiH, 4 svapnaH, 5 svapnak, 6 suzuptaH-vizuptaH-nizuptaH-duHzuptaH, suzupsuH- 7 suzvApayizuH, iti viSezaH .
[a] ‘Yi zvapa Saye’ ‘halantyam’ (1-3-3) itIttvaprasaNgAt ‘Yi zvap Saye’
ityapapAWaH—iti DAtukAvyavyAKyAnam (2-51) . yujyate cEtat . yataH
sarvezvapi DAtupAWezu “Yi zvap Saye . udAttet, anudAttaH .” iti paWyate .
‘udAttet’ ityasya udAttopadeSo'kAra itsaMjYako'tra DAtO—iti KalvarTaH .
ataSca prAmAdikaH sArvatrikaH ‘zvap’ iti halantapAWa ityeva nyAyyam . ata
evApapAWaH SoDito DAtukAvyavyAKyAtfmahASayena .
1. ‘rudavidamuzagrahisvapipracCaH saMSca’ (1-2-8) iti sanaH kittvam . tena ‘vaci-
svapiyajAdInAM kiti’ (6-1-15) iti samprasAraRam . pUrvarUpAdikam . tato
dvirvacanam . uttaraKaRqe ‘AdeSapratyayayoH’ (8-3-59) iti zatvam .
2. ‘svapisyamivyeYAM yaNi’ (6-1-19) iti yaNante samprasAraRam . pUrvavat
aByAsakAryARi .
3. ‘YItaH ktaH’ (3-2-187) iti kartari BAve ca vartamAne ktapratyayaH . nizWAyAH
kittvAt samprasAraRam . evaM ktvAktinyakpraBftizvapi boDyam .
4. ‘svapo nan’ (3-3-91) iti BAve nanpratyayaH .
5. ‘svapitfzornajiN’ (3-2-172) iti tAcCIliko najiNpratyayaH . najiNi ‘naj’
ityevAbaSizyate . jakArasya padAnttvaprayuktaH kakAraH .
6. ‘suvinirdurByaH supisUtisamAH’ (8-3-88) iti zatvam . sUtre ‘supi’
iti kftasamprasAraRanirdeSaH . tena samprasAraRayogyasTalezu yatra ‘sup’ iti
SravaRaM tatra sarvatrApi zatvaM BavatIti boDyam .
7. RyantAt sani upratyaye rUpamevam . aByAsasya ‘dyutisvApyoH—’ (7-4-67)
iti samprasAraRam . ‘stOtiRyoreva zaRi—’ (8-3-61) ityuttaraKaRqe zatvam .

(1893) “zvazka gatyarTaH” (I-BvAdiH-100. saka. sew. Atma.)
‘zvakka’ iti dvikakArakaH kvAcitkaH pAWaH . ‘subDAtuzWivuzvazkatInAM—’
(vA. 6-1-64) iti nizeDAt DAtvAdizakArasya sakAro na . ‘vizvak paritrOki- [Page1370+ 28]
talocanEH sTitaM vizvazkamARAmbudanAdaSaNkayA ..’ (DA. kA. 1-14) iti
prayogaH . rUpARi sarvARyapi kaKativat (141) boDyAni .

(1894) “Yi zvidA gAtraprasravaRe”
(I-BvAdiH-744. aka. sew. Atma.)
‘gAtraprakzaraRe svidyet svedate snehamokayoH .’ (Slo. 107) iti devaH .
‘gAtraprakzaraRe’ iti mADavAdayaH . uBayaTA'pi svedasya = GarmAmBaso vivakzA'tra .
‘snehanamocanayoH’ iti haradattAdayaH (padamaYjarI 1-2-19) . sAmAnyarUpARi
BOvAdikakzvedativat (326) boDyAni . 1 sninnaH, 2 prasveditaH-prasveditam, 3 sisvedayizuH .
1. ‘YItaH ktaH’ (3-2-187) iti vartamAne ktaH . ‘AditaSca’ (7-2-16) iti
nizWAyAmiRnizeDaH . ‘radAByAM—’ (8-2-42) iti nizWAtakArasya, DAtudakArasya ca
nakAraH .
2. ‘viBAzA BAvAdikarmaRoH’ (7-2-17) iti iqvikalpaH . ‘nizwA SINsvidi—’
(1-2-19) iti sewo nizWAyAH kittvanizeDaH .
3. RyantAt sani upratyaye rUpamevam . ‘saH svidi—’ (8-3-62) iti aByAsAt
parasya sakAraH . ‘stOtiRyoreva zaRi—’ (8-3-61) ityasyApavAdaH .

(1895) “zvidA gAtraprakzaraRe”
(IV-divAdiH-1188. aka. ani. para.)
‘gAtraprakzaraRe svidyeta, svedate snehamokayoH .’ (Slo. 107) iti devaH .
sarvARyapi rUpARi dEvAdikakruDyativat (277) boDyAni . ‘nizWA SIN-
svidi—’ (1-2-19) ityatra YItAM kzvidAdInAM sAhacaryAt YIto BOvAdikasyEva
grahaRamiti padamaYjarI . ayamapi YIt iti nyAsakAraH . tattu puruzakAre
DAtuvfttO ca KaRqitam . BAvAdikarmaRoH prasveditam-prasveditaH ityasyApi rUpe .
Adittvamasya sarvasammatam . ayaM parasmEpadI, BOvAdikastu AtmanepadIti;
ayamaniw, BOvAdikaH sew iti ca viSezaH .

(1896) “saNketa ca AmantraRe” (X-curAdiH-1892. saka. sew. uBa.)
AmantraRaM = gUQoktiH . saMketakaH-tikA, sisaNketayizakaH-zikA; saMketayitA-trI,
sisaNketayizitA-trI; ityAdikAni rUpARi sarvARyapi cOrAdikaketayativat
(260) UhyAni .

(1897) “saNgrAma yudDe” (X-curAdiH-1922. aka. sew. Atma.)
adantaH .
“— ‘BfSAdiByaH—’ (3-1-12) ityatra kEyawe— ‘saMgrAmayatiranudAtted
bodDavyaH’ iti . padamaYjaryAM ca ‘anudAttedayaM saMgrAmayatirizyate’ iti .
taTA ca tatra BAzyamapi ‘asaMgrAmayata SUraH’ iti . saMgrAmaSabdAt ‘tatkaroti’
(ga. sU. curAdiH) iti RicApi sidDAviha saMgrAmasya pAWaH—sopasargAt saMGAtAt
pratyayArTaH, tena asaMgrAmayata ityupasargAt pUrvamaN Bavati . taTA saMgrAmayitvA
ityatrADItyetyAdivallyab na Bavati . sisaMgrAmayizate ityatra samo dvitvaM
Bavati . nanvayamanudAttettvArTamavaSyaM paWanIyaH iti kaTaM saMGAtAdutpattyarTaH ?
evamapi ‘grAma yudDe’ ityetAvati paWyamAne'pyarTasvABAvyAdiNikoraDivat
saMpUrvatve labDe saMGAtapAWasyopasargAdutpattyarTa eva . ata eva saMGAtAdutpatti-
vacanAdanyatra DAtUpasargasamudAyAt pratyaye viDitsitA upasargAH pfTak kriyanta
iti jYApyate” iti mADavaH . sarvARyapi rUpARi grAmayativat (442) jYeyAni .

(1898) “satra santAnakriyAyAm”
(X-curAdiH-1906-saka. sew. Atma.) adantaH . ‘sattra—’ iti kzIrasvAmI .
satrakaH-trikA, sisatrayizakaH-zikA; satrayitA-trI, sisatrayizitA-trI;
ityAdikAni rUpARi sarvARyapi cOrAdikakatrayativat (161) jYeyAni .

(1899) “saBAja prItidarSanayoH”
(X-curAdiH-1888. saka. sew. uBa.) adantaH .
‘— prItidarSane’ iti kzIrasvAmI . ‘— prItisevanayoH’ ityanye .
saBAjanam, saBAjanA, saBAjakaH, saBAjaH . saBAjayan iti Satari rUpam .
sarvARyapi rUpARi cOrAdikakAlayativat (185) jYeyAni .

(1900) “saSca gatO” (I-BvAdiH-202. saka. sew. para.)
BvAdizu zasjaDAtuprakaraRe mADavIye'Bihitam—“atra saScimapi kecit
paWanti; — ‘tamajihvA asaScata’ ityAdi ca dfSyate” iti . “cAnto-
'yaM(zasja) iti SivaH—saScati” iti kzIrasvAmI . ‘ati naH saScato [Page1372+ 26]
naya’ (fk 1-42-7) iti cAntaprayogo'pIti tawwIkA . tanmatena
DAturayaM liKyate .
saScakaH-ScikA, saScakaH-ScikA, sisaScizakaH-zikA, sAsaScakaH-ScikA;
saScitA-trI, saScayitA-trI, sisaScizitA-trI, sAsaScitA-trI;
ityAdIni rUpARi yaTAsamBavamUhyAni .

(1900-A) “samI pariRAme” (IV-divAdiH-1221. aka. sew. para.)
pariRAmo-vikAraH iti kzIrasvAmidIkzitAdayaH . sarve'pi ‘masI—’ iti
paWitvA ‘samI ityeke’ iti paWanti . sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikagrasativat
(440) jYeyAni .

(1901) “sAtiH suKe” (I-BvAdiH… saka. sew. para.)
“sAtiH sOtro DAtuH’ iti vfttO (3-1-138) . boDinyAse'pi ‘sAtiH
suKe vartate sOtraH’ iti . jinendraharadattO ‘sAtirhetumaRRyantaH’ iti .”

(1922) “skandir gatiSozaRayoH” (I-BvAdiH-979. saka. ani. para.)
‘— SozaRe’ iti svAmI . anye sarve ‘— gatiSozaRayoH’ ityeva paWanti .
skandakaH-ndikA, skandakaH-ndikA, 2 ciskantsakaH-tsikA, 3 canIskandakaH-ndikA;

nizWAyAm 4 viskannaH, 5 skandaH, [Page1382+ 35] 1 utkandaH, 2 vizkantA-viskantA, 3 parizkantA-pariskantA, 4 parizkaRRaH,
pariskannaH, 5 pariskandaH, 6 skantvA, praskandya, 7 gehAvaskandamAste . gehaM
gehamavaskandam, gehamavaskandamavaskandam, gehaMgehamavaskandya, [Page1383+ 29] 1 skanDaH, 2 kanduH, imAni rUpARi asya DAtoH viSezeRa BavantIti jYeyam .
2. sannante ‘SarpUrvAH KayaH’ (7-4-61) iti KayaH SezaH . kakArasya ‘aByAse carca’
(8-4-54) iti cartvena cakAraH . DAturayamaniw . DAtudakArasya sani pare ‘Kari
ca’ (8-4-55) iti cartvena takAraH . evaM sarvatra sannantezu prakriyA jYeyA .
3. yaNante, ‘nIg vaYcusraMsuDvaMsuBraMsukasapatapadaskandAm’ (7-4-84) iti aByAse
nIgAgamaH sarvatra boDyaH .
4. nizWAyAm, ‘radAByAM nizWAto naH pUrvasya ca daH’ (8-2-42) iti nizWAtakAra-
DAtudakArayornatvam . ‘veH skanderanizWAyAm’ (8-3-73) iti paryudAsAt na
zatvam .
5. skandayati = Sozayati BaktAnAM pApamiti, pacAdyaci skandaH = kArtikeyaH .
1. utkandati = Sozayati iti utkandaH rogaviSezaH . utpUrvakAt skandeH
pacAdyac . ‘rogAKyAyAM Rvul bahulam’ (3-3-108) iti Rvulo'pavAdaH .
‘roge ceti vaktavyam’ (vA. 8-4-61) iti vacanAt skandeH sakArasya pUrvasavarRa-
stakAraH . ‘savarRagrahaRasAmarTyAt iha (8-4-65) saMKyAtAnudeSo na Bavati;
(tena) savarRamAtre lopo vijYAyate .’ iti kASikAdizUktatvAt ekasya takArasya
prayoge na SravaRam ityAhuH . vastutastakAradvayasyEva ‘uttkandaH’ iti SravaRaM
nyAyyaM iti BAzyAdizu spazwamityalamatra .
2. vipUrvakAt tfci, DAtudakArasya cartvena takAre, ‘Jaro Jari savarRe’ (8-4-65)
iti tasya lope, ‘veH skanderanizWAyAm’ (8-3-73) iti zatvavikalpe ca
rUpadvayam . ‘Jaro Jari—’ (8-4-65) ityatra ‘anyatarasyAm’ ityanuvftterlopasya
pAkzikatvaM viskanttA—vizkanttA iti ca rUpadvayamizwamiti jYeyam . evaM
tavyadAdizvapi vizkantavyam—viskantavyam ityAdIni rUpARyUhyAni yaTA-
samBavam .
3. ‘pareSca’ (8-3-74) iti zatvavikalpaH . evaM tavyadAdizvapi boDyam .
4. ‘nipariByAM skanderanizWAyAm’ ityanuktvA pfTag ‘pareSca’ (8-3-74) iti
yogakaraRAt pariskannaH—parizkaRRaH ityatra paripUrvakAt skandaternizWAyAM
zatvavikalpo Bavatyeveti kASikAdizu spazwam . tenEvaM rUpamiti boDyam .
nizWAnatvamuBayatra samAnam . zatvapakze Ratvamapi BavatIti viSezaH .
5. paripUrvakAt skandateH pacAdyaci, prAcyaBaratavizayatve vAcye ‘pariskandaH
prAcyaBaratezu’ (8-3-75) iti nipAtanAt zatvABAvaH . anyatra parizkandaH .
kecit paripUrvakAt skandateH nizWAyAM nizWAtakAralopanipAtanamanena sUtreRa kriyata
iti vyAcaKyuH .
6. ktvAyAm, DAtudakArasya cartve, ‘Jaro Jari—’ (8-4-65) iti takArasya pAkzike
lope ca rUpamevam .
7. ‘viSipatipadiskandAM vyApyamAnAsevyamAnayoH’ (3-4-56) iti Ramul .
kriyayA padArTAnAM anavayavena sambanDaH = vyApyamAnatvam . tAtparyam =
AsevA . dravye vyAptiH, kriyAyAm AsevA . ‘tftIyApraBftIni ca’ (2-2-21)
iti samAsavikalpaH . ‘gehAvaskandamAste’ iti samAsena vyAptyAsevayo-
ruktatvAt ‘nityavIpsayoH’ (8-1-4) iti dvirvacanaM na . asamAsapakze vyApya-
mAnatAyAM dravyavacanasya ‘gehaMgehamavaskandamAste’ iti dvirvacanam . AsevyamAna-
tAyAM tu ‘gehamavaskandamavaskandamAste’ iti kriyAyA dvirvacanam . “kriyA-
Bede ktvA'pIzyate ityuktatvAt ‘gehaMgehamavaskandya’ ityAdyapi Bavati” iti
mADavaH .
1. ‘skandeSca svANge’ (da. u. 9-67) ityasunpratyaye DAtudakArasya DakArAdeSe ca rUpam .
2. ‘skanderlopaSca’ (da. u. 1-99) ityupratyaye, DAtvAdisakArasya lope ca rUpamevam .

sKAdakaH-dikA, 1 sKadakaH- 2 avasKAdakaH-parisKAdakaH- 3 apasKAdakaH- 4 prasKAdakaH-

pUrvaM paWitasyEva sKadeH upasargaviSezavaSAt mittvAmittvavyavasTArTaM punaH pAWaH iti
nyAyyam . kASakftsnaDAtupAWe tu ‘sKadir avatyAM ca’ iti GawAdizu
paWyate . tasyAyamarTaH-avatyAm = avaDAtvarTaBUte rakzaRe sKadirDAturmitsaMjYakaH .
cakArAt pUrvasmin gaRasUtra upAttasya ‘parivezaRe’ ityarTe'pi midayamiti .

2. ‘sKadiravapariByAM ca’ (ga. sU. BvAdiH) iti nizeDaprakaraRe GawAdizu vacanAt
avapUrvakAt paripUrvakAcca sKadateH na mittvam .
3. ‘apAvapariByaH sKadeH’ (boDinyAse evaM GawAdizu vacanamiti DAtuvfttiH)
iti pakze atrApi apapUrvakasya sKadeH mittvanizeDAt upaDAhrasvo neti boGyam .

yadi Bavati tarhi—avAdyupasfzwAdeva” iti manvAnAH kzIrasvAmyAdayaH
prapUrvakAdapi mittvABAvena rUpamicCanti . tattu kASikAdizu ‘na’ ityanuvartya
avAdyupasfzwAt sKadereva mittvaM na—anyatra mittvamastyeva—iti vyAKyAtatvAt
anAkaramiti boDyam .
A. ‘ityAdyavasKAditamAnasAstA bAlAH parisKAditaDEryabanDAH .
duzwAn apasKAdayituM prayAte kfzRe vilepuH PaRitA vimoham ..’ DA. kA. 2-19.

(1932) “stanBu pratiGAte” (V-svAdiH, IX-kryAdiH-saka. sew. para.)

sivu—’ (8-3-114) ityatra ca upAttaH sOtro'yaM DAtuH . ‘zwaBi pratiGAte’

sivu—’ (8-3-114) ityatra caNi zatvanizeDAcca samastAnyapi tiNantakfdantarUpA-
RyasmAd BavantIti jYAyate .
‘staBnAti staBnuyAt stuBnAtyapi stuBnoti sOtrayoH ..
stamBate pratibanDArTe stamBe'rTe stoBate Sapi .’
iti devaH (Slo. 142-3) . BOvAdikazwaBiDAturAtmanepadI . ayaM tu
‘SezAt kartari—’ (1-3-78) iti SAstrAt parasmEpadI . 2 staBnuvan-tI,
staBnan-tI, avazwaBya, 3 avazwabDA senA, avazwabDA Sarat, [Page1387+ 26] 1 pratistabDaH-nistabDaH, stamBanam- 2 uttamBanam, 3 vizwamBaH iti viSezarUpARi .
sAmAnyarUpARi sarvARyapi damBativat (816) jYeyAni .

mbanam = ASrayaRam . avazwaBya ityatra Alambane zatvam . avidUrasya BAva
AvidUryam = sAmIpyamityarTaH . ‘avazwabDA senA’ ityasya samIpamAgatA
senetyarTaH .
1. pratinipUrvakAt stamBeH nizWAyAm, DatvajaStvayoH, ‘pratistabDanistabDO ca’
(8-3-112) iti nipAtanAt zatvaM na . itaropasargezu igantezu tu ‘stanBeH’

pUrvasavarRastakAraH . upasargatakAra-pUrvasavarRaprAptatakAra-DAtutakArarUpAstrayastakArAH .
‘Jaro Jari—’ (8-4-65) iti maDyatakArasya pAkziko lopaH .

iti DA. kA. vyAKyA (2-23) .
4. anupUrvakAt asmAt GaYpratyaye rUpamevam .
5. ‘calanaSabdArTAt—’ (3-2-148) iti yuci rUpamevam .
6. ‘tAcCIlyavayovacanaSaktizu—’ (3-2-178) iti yaTAsamBavaM cAnaSpratyayaH .
7. ‘sanIvantarDaBrasjadamBuSrisvf—’ (7-2-49) itIqvikalpe rUpamevam .
8. ‘svaratisUti—’ (7-2-44) iti vEkalpikamiwaM bADitvA, ‘fdDanoH sye’
(7-2-70) iti nityamiqAgamo'tra . evaM saMpUrvakAdAtmanepade'pi saMsvarizyamARaH
iti nityamiqAgamo boDyaH .
9. ‘vidipracCisvaratInAmupasaMKyAnam’ (vA. 1-3-29) iti sampUrvakAdasmAt
Atmanepadam .
10. ORAdike (da. u. 1-95) upratyaye rUpamevam . svaruH = yUpe CidyamAne praTamaM patitaH
SakalaH .

(1989) “hawa dIptO” (I-BvAdiH-312. aka. sew. para.)
hAwakaH-wikA, hAwakaH-wikA, jihawizakaH-zikA, jAhawakaH-wikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakaKativat (141) boDyAni . atra
‘kuhoScuH’ (7-4-62) iti sannante yaNante ca aByAse JakAraH . tasya
‘aByAse carca’ (8-4-54) iti jakAraH . evaM hakArAdizu sarvezvapi DAtuzu
sannantayaNantayorboDyam . 1 hAwakam .
1. ‘saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-109) iti Rvul . bAhulakAt klIbatvam . hAwakaM suvarRam .

(1990) “haWa plutiSaWatvayoH” (I-BvAdiH-335. aka. sew. para.)
‘balAtkAre ityeke’ iti DAtukAvyavyAKyA (1-44) . pacAdyaci haWaH .
rUpARi sarvARi BOvAdikakaWativat (148) jYeyAni .

(1991) “hada purIzotsarge” (I-BvAdiH-977. aka. aniw. Atma.)
hAdakaH-dikA, hAdakaH-dikA, 2 jihatsakaH-tsikA, jAhadakaH-dikA;
hannaH-nizWAtakAraDAtudakArayornakAraH . ityAdIni rUpARi sarvARyapi AdAdikadvezwi-
vat (889) boDyAni .
2. ‘Kari ca’ (8-4-55) iti cartvena DAtudakArasya takAraH .

(1992) “hana hiMsAgatyoH” (II-adAdiH-1012. saka. ani. para.) 3 GAtakaH-tikA, 4 GAtakaH-tikA, 5 jiGAMsakaH-sikA, 6 jeGnIyakaH-yikA, [Page1406+ 31] 1 jaNGanakaH-nikA;
hantA-trI, GAtayitA-trI, jiGAMsitA-trI, jeGnIyitA-jaNGanitA-trI;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikagacCativat (376) boDyAni . 2 hanizyan-
ntI-tI, 3 AhanizyamARaH, 4 praRiGnan- 5 vyatiGnan-AGnan-cOrasya 6 nipraGnan-
ntI, 7 hatvA-hataH-hatavAn-hatiH, 8 padDatiH, padopahataH, 9 puttrahataH-putrahataH, 10 kumArihatA, [Page1407+ 33] 1 strIhatA-strihatA-brahmabanDUhatA-brahmabanDuhatA, 2 lakzmIhatA, 3 viduzihatA-
viduzIhatA-SreyasIhatA-SreyasihatA, vidvadDatA-SreyohatA, 4 mahadDatA, 5 antarhatya, 6 kaRehatya-manohatya, 7 GAtyaH-vaDyaH, 8 brahmahatyA-asihatyA, 9 aSvahatyA, 10 hatyASataM pAnasahasram’ (SrutiH) 11 GanAGanaH, 12 SatruhaH, 13 dArvAGAwaH, [Page1408+ 32]
dArvAGAtaH, 1 cArvAGAwaH-cArvAGAtaH, 2 varRasaMNGAwaH-varRasaNGAtaH, 3 kleSApahaH-tamo-
'pahaH, ‘sragiyaM yadi 4 jIvitApahA’ jvarApahA, niSSezajAqyApahA, 5 jaGnivAn-
jaGanvAn, 6 timihaH-arAtihaH, varAhaH-pawahaH-kalahaH, 7 aByAGAtI, 8 kumAraGAtI-SIrzaGAtI, 9 jyAyAGnaH, patiGnI, [Page1409+ 34] 1 SlezmaGnam-maDu, 2 AKuGAtaH, 3 kftaGnaH, 4 goGnaH, 5 hastiGnaH-kapAwaGnaH-
kavAwaGnaH, 6 pARiGaH-tAqaGaH, 7 pitfvyaGAtI, 8 brahmahA-BrURahA-vftrahA, 9 vftraGnaH-
vftraGRaH, 10 GAtukaH-GAtukI, 11 vaDakaH, [Page1410+ 33] 1 vaDaH, 2 viGnaH, 3 abBraGanaH, 4 antarGanaH-antarGaRaH, 5 praGaRaH-praGARaH, 6 udDanaH, 7 apaGanaH, 8 ayoGanaH, viGanaH, druGanaH-druGaRaH, 9 stambaGnaH-stambaGanaH, 10 pariGaH-
paliGaH, 11 pratiGaH, [Page1411+ 28] 1 parvatopaGnaH, upaGnaH, 2 saNGaH-udDaH, 3 saNGAtaH, 4 hetiH, 5 niGaH, 6 niGnaH, 7 samUlaGAtaM hanti, 8 pARiGAtaM vediM hanti, 9 daRqopaGAtaM gAH SAtayati, 10 prahaRanam, itImAni viSezarUpARi . jaNGA, jaGanam, pariGAtanaH, hanuH,
hanu[nU]mAn, hanUH, himam, hemantaH, aMhatiH, GAtiH, ahiH, anehA, GoraH,
haMsaH, ime ORAdikAH .
3. ‘RvultfcO’ (3-1-133) iti Rvul . ‘ho hanterYRinnezu’ (7-3-54) iti
hanterhakArasya kutvam . sozmaRo Gozavato nAdavato mahAprARasya hakArasya tAdfSa eva
GakAra AdeSo Bavati . idamuttaratrApi Yit-Rit-pratyayezu nakAre ca paratra Bavati .
‘hanasto'ciRRaloH’ (7-3-32) iti DAtunakArasya takAraH .
4. Rijante'pi sarvatra hanterhakArasya kutvaM GakAraH, nakArasya takAraSca pUrvavat boDyaH .
5. sannante ‘ajJanagamAM sani’ (6-4-16) iti dIrGaH, dvirvacanAdikam, aByAse
‘kuhoScuH’ (7-4-62) iti cutvena jakAraH, ‘aByAsAcca’ (7-3-55) iti
uttaraKaRqe kutvam . nakArasyAnusvAraH . evaM sannante sarvatra prakriyA boDyA .
6. ‘hanterhiMsAyAM yaNiGnIBAvo vaktavyaH’ (vA. 7-1-30) iti vacanAt yaNi vivakzite
sati hiMsArTe'sya GnIBAvaH, dvirvacanAdikam . halAdiSezaH . ‘aByAse carca’
(8-4-54) iti aByAse jakAraH . ‘guRo yaNlukoH’ (7-4-82) iti guRaH .
1. gatyarTatve tu DAtoH ‘nugato'nunAsikAntasya’ (7-4-85) iti nugAgamaH . nukaH
‘padAntavat’ ityatideSAt anusvAraH upalakzyate . ‘aByAsAcca’ (7-3-55)
ityuttaraKaRqe'pi hakArasya kutvena GakAraH . evaM sannante sarvatra boDyam .
2. ‘fdDanoH sye’ (7-2-70) itIqAgamaH syapratyaye parataH .
3. ‘ANo yamahanaH’ (1-3-28) iti akarmakAdasmAt Atmanepadam . ‘akarmakAt’
(1-3-26) ityukteH ‘coramAGnan’ ityatra passmEpadameva . ‘AjaGne vizamavilocanasya
vakzaH’ (kirAtArjunIye 17-63) ‘AhaDvaM raGUttamam’ (BawwikAvye) ityAdizu
sakarmakasTalezu AtmanepadaM cintyameveti mADavAcAryAH . pare tu pAWAntaraM tatra-
tatrASritya samAhitavantaH . ‘etya’ iti aDyAhftya vakzaH, raGUttamaM vA etya—iti
haradatto vyAcaKyO .
4. Satari, Sapo luki, SatuH sArvaDAtukatvena NidvadBAvAt ‘gamahanajanaKanaGasAM lopaH
kNiti anaNi’ (6-4-98) iti hanterupaDAkArasya lopaH . ‘ho hanteH—’
(7-3-54) iti kutvena GakAraH . ‘nergadanadapatapadaGumAsyatihanti—’ (8-4-17)
iti upasargasTAnnimittAduttarasya neH Ratvam .
5. ‘na gatihiMsArTeByaH’ (1-3-15) iti karmavyatIhArAtmanepadanizeDaH, DAtoH
hiMsArTakatvAt gatyarTatvAt ca .
6. ‘jAsiniprahaRa—’ (2-3-56) iti corasya zazWI .
7. ‘anudAttopadeSa—’ (6-4-37) ityAdinA JalAdizu kNitpratyayezu ktvA-ktin-kta-
ktavatupraBftizu anunAsikalopaH .
8. pAdAByAM hanyate = gamyate iti padDatiH . atra DAtorgatyarTakam . ktin . ‘himakAzi-
hatizu ca’ (6-3-54) iti pAdaSabdasya padBAvaH . bAhvAditvAt (4-1-96) NIzi
padDatI ityapIti mADavaH . ‘padopahataH’ ityatra tu ‘pAdasya pad AjyAtigo-
pahatezu’ (6-3-52) iti padAdeSaH .
9. ‘vA hatajagDaparezu’ (vA. 8-4-48) iti putratakArasya hataSabde pare vA dvitvam .
10. kumArI cAsO hatA ceti karmaDAraye ‘GarUpakalpacelaqbruvagotrahatezu—’ (6-3-43)
iti kumArISabdasya hrasvaH . kumAryA hatA iti samAse tu na hrasvaH—kumArIhatA
ityeva .
1. ‘nadyAH SezasyAnyatarasyAm’ (6-3-44) iti hrasvavikalpaH .
2. ‘kfnnadyAH pratizeDaH’ (vA. 6-3-44) iti pratizeDAnna hrasvaH .
3. ‘ugitaSca’ (6-3-45) iti pUrvapadasya hrasvavikalpaH . vidvacCreyasoH puMvadBAvo'pi
vfttikAravacanAdatreti boDyam .
4. mahacCabdasyApi puMvadBAvo'tra AtreyeRokta iti mADavaH .
5. ‘antaraparigrahe’ (1-4-65) iti ‘antar’ ityasya gatitvam . ‘kugatiprAdayaH’
(2-2-18) iti samAse lyapi ‘vA lyapi’ (6-4-38) iti vyavasTitaviBAzA-
vijYAnAt nAntAniwo'sya DAtornakAralopo nityaH . antarhatya maDye hatvA ityarTaH .
parigrahArTe tu ‘antarhatvA mUzikAM gataH SyenaH’ ityatra na gatitvam . tena na
lyap . svaBAvAdayaM yogaH hantivizayakaH .
6. ‘kaRemanasI SradDApratIGAte’ (1-4-66) iti kaRe, manasi ityanayoH gatitvam .
saptamyantapratirUpake ime . pUrvavat samAse lyap . kaReSabdo'BilAzArTakaH, mana-
siSabdo'pIti nyAsapadamaYjaryO . ‘kaRehatya manasihatya vA payaH pibati .’
aBilAzanivfttiparyantaM payaH pibatItyarTaH . niruktaBinnArTatve tu kaRe hatvA, manasi
hatvA ityeva . idamapi sUtraM svaBAvAt hantivizaya eva pravfttam .
7. ‘hano vA vaDa ca’ (vA. 3-1-97) iti karmaRi yat, prakftervaDAdeSaSca . vaDyaH
vaDakarmIBUtaH . pakze Ryati, kutve takAre ca GAtyaH . digAditvAt (4-3-54)
yatEva sidDamiti BagavAn kAtyAyanaH .
8. ‘hanasta ca’ (3-1-108) iti BAvArTe supyanupasarge upapade hanteH kyap . nakArasya
takAraSca . evaM BrURahatyA ityAdikamapi . strItvaM svaBAvAt .
9. aSvahatyASabdo'pi pUrvavat hanteH kyapi nakArasya takArAdeSe sidDaH . kecinnedaM
paWantIti mADavaH .
10. atra SrutivAkye CAndasatvAt nirupapadAdapi hanteH kyap iti mADavIye spazwam .
11. ‘hanterGatvaM ca’ (vA. 6-1-12) iti vacanAt hanteH pacAdyaci dvitvam, pUrvottara-
KaRqayorGakAro hakArasya, pUrvaKaRqe Ak AgamaSca . ‘GanAGanaH = varzukameGaH, hantA
ca’ iti prakriyAsarvasvam . ‘GanAGanaH kzoBaRaScarzaRInAm’ (tE. saM. 4-6-4-1) .
12. SatruM vaDyAt ityASIrarTe gamye ‘ASizi hanaH’ (3-2-49) iti karmaRyupapade
qapratyayaH . qittvAt wilopaH . evaM timirahaH, arAtihaH ityAdyapi .
13. ‘dArAvAhano'R antasya ca waH saMjYAyAm’ (vA. 3-2-49) iti dAruSabda upapade
ANpUrvAt hanteH kartari aR, nakArasya wakAraH—saMjYAyAm . antyasya pratyayasya
RittvAt DAtorGaH . dArvAGAwaH pakziviSezaH, yasya caYcUruBayatra pratirUQA
kuddAlavat . anyatra tu dArvAGAtaH ityeva .
1. cAru AhantIti cArvAGAwaH—cArvAGAto vA . ‘cArO vA’ (vA. 3-2-49)
iti pUrvavat kartari aR, antyasya wakAravikalpaH . pratyayasya RittvAt DAtorGakAraH .
2. varRAn saMhantIti varRasaMGAwaH varRasaMGAto vA . ‘karmaRi sami ca’ (vA. 3-2-49)
iti pUrvavat aRAdikam .
3. ‘ape kleSatamasoH’ (3-2-50) iti kleSatamasorupapadayoH apapUrvakAt hanteH qaH .
qittvAt wilopaH .
4. atra ‘kvip ca’ (3-2-76) iti kvip . supi ‘sO ca’ (6-4-13) iti dIrGe,
nalopaH . striyAm, ‘fnneByaH—’ (4-1-5) iti nAntatvalakzaRaNIb na Bavati,
‘bahvAdizu (ga. sU. 4-1-45) NIzvikalpArTaM ‘han’ iti pAWAt’ iti mADavaH .
iyameva gatiH jvarApahA, niSSezajAqyApahA ityAdizvapi . kzIrasvAmI tu
‘anyeByo'pi’ iti qapratyaye pariKetyAdivat sADitavAn .
5. liwaH kvasO, ‘viBAzA gamahanavidaviSAm’ (7-2-68) iti vA iqAgamaH .
iwpakze jaGnivAn iti, iqaBAvapakze jaGanvAn iti ca rUpam . GatvopaDAkAra-
lopAdikaM pUrvavat boDyam .
6. ‘anyeByo'pi—’ iti qapratyaye kzIrasvAmI etAn sADayati . tAdfSaM
vacanaM na dfSyate . gamerqapratyayaviDAyakaM vacanamasya vivakzitamiti BAti .
varaM AhantIti varAhaH . pawe hanyate iti pawahaH . kalaM = mADuryaM hantIti
kalahaH .
7. ‘sampfca…muzAByAhanaSca’ (3-2-142) iti tAcCIliko GinuR .
Gatvatatve ca .
8. ‘kumAraSIrzayorRiniH’ (3-2-51) iti RinipratyayaH . Gatvatatve ca . atrEva nipAtanAt
SirasaH SIrzAdeSaH . ‘kutsita iti vaktavyam’ (vA. 3-2-93) iti vacanAdatra
kutsA dyotyA .
9. ‘lakzaRe jAyApatyozwak’ (3-2-52) iti wakpratyayo lakzaRavati kartari . sUtre ‘lakzaRe’
iti lakzaRavato nirdeSaH . ‘gamahana—’ (6-4-98) iti upaDAkAralopaH . Gatvam .
jAyAGnaH tilakAlakaviSezavAn . yasya hastAdizu jAyAmaraRalakzayitf tilAkAraM
kAlakaM vidyate sa evamucyate . evaM yasyAH striyAH pARO patihananasUcikA reKA
vidyate socyate patiGnI pARireKA iti . jAyAGnaH patiGnI ityatra
viSezyavaSAt niyataliNgatA .
1. ‘amanuzyakartfke ca’ (3-2-53) iti wak . pUrvavat prakriyA . SlezmaGnam maDu,
pittaGnaM jambIraPalam, vAtaGnaH SAkaviSezaH .
2. AKuM hantItyarTe ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) ityaR . Gatvatatve ca .
3. atra ‘kaprakaraRe mUlaviBujAdiByaH—’ (vA. 3-2-5) iti kapratyaye, upaDAkAralope,
Gatve ca rUpamiti kecit . mADavastu kftaM hantItyarTe ‘kftyalyuwo bahulam’
(3-3-113) iti bahulagrahaRAt wakpratyayamavAdIt . evameva kriyamARaGnaH,
karizyamARaGnaH, SatruGnaH ityAdizvapi gatiH . waki kftaGnI iti; ke kftaGnA
iti ca striyAM Bavet .
4. gOrhanyate'smE iti goGnaH = atiTiH . ‘dASagoGnO sampradAne’ (3-4-73) iti
sUtre nipAtanAdeva sampradAne wakpratyayaH . ajanto'yamiti prakriyAsarvasvam .
5. hastihanane Sakta evamucyate . ‘SaktO hastikapAwayoH’ (3-2-54) iti hantezwak .
hastiGno BawaH . kapAwaGnaH coraH . aSaktO yo vizAdiBirhastiM hanti saH
hastiGAtaH . evam—yaH kuWArAdiBirbahuBiH sADanEH kapAwaM hanti sa ucyate
kapAwaGAta iti . uBayatra ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) ityaR . ‘—kavAwayoH’ iti
sUtre pAWaBedaH .
6. ‘pARiGatAqaGO Silpini’ (3-2-55) iti nipAtanAt hantezwaki wilope,
Gatve ca rUpam . pARiM hantIti pARiGaH hastenEva tAlavAdyaprAvIRyapradarSayitA .
tAqaM = hanuM hantIti tAqaGaH muKenEva vAdyaviSezavAdayitA .
7. pitfvyaM hatavAn pitfvyaGAtI . ‘karmaRi hanaH’ (3-2-86) iti hante-
rBUte RiniH .
8. hanteH ‘brahmaBrURavftrezu kvip’ (3-2-87) iti kvip . hantereva, brahmAdizveva,
kvibeva, BUte eva iti caturviDo'tra sUtre niyamaH . brahma hatavAn brahmahA . BrURaM = garBaM
hatavAn BrURahA . vftraM hatavAn vftrahA indraH . ‘sO ca’ (6-4-13) iti dIrGaH .
evaM niyamANgIkArAt himahA, keSihA, kAlaneminihA ityAdizu ‘kvip
ca’ (3-2-76) iti sArvatrikaH kvip .
9. dvitIyAbahuvacanAntamidam . atra ‘prAtipadikAntanumviBaktizu ca’ (8-2-154)
iti RatvavikalpaH .
10. ‘lazapatapadasTABUbfzahana—’ (3-2-154) iti ukaY tAcCIlikaH . Gatvatatve .
striyAM GAtukI .
11. ‘bahulaM taRyannavaDaka—’ (vA. 2-4-54) iti vacanAt Rvuli prakfteH vaDAdeSaH .
so'yamakArAntAdeSaH . yadvA halantatve'pi ‘janivaDyoSca’ (7-3-15) iti
vfdDinizeDaH .
1. ‘hanaSca vaDaH’ (3-3-76) iti BAve'ppratyaye prakftervaDAdeSaH .
2. ‘GaYarTe kaviDAnaM sTAsnApAvyaDihaniyuDyarTam’ (vA. 3-3-58) iti kapratyayaH .
viSezeRa hantIti viGnaH .
3. ‘mUrtO GanaH’ (3-3-77) iti hanterappratyaye prakfterGanAdeSaH; kAWinye gamye .
mUrtiH = kAWinyam . abBraGanaH = abBrasya kAWinyamityarTaH . GanaM daDi .
viSezaRaviSizwavastuno'pi mUrtiSabdena grahaRamiti prakriyAsarvasvam .
4. ‘antarGano deSe’ (3-3-78) iti nipAtanAt deSe vAcye antaHpUrvakAdasmAt
appratyaye prakfterGanAdeSaH . antarGanaH = vAhIkagrAmaviSezaH . antaH maDye hanyate-
'treti vfttiH . ‘antarGaRaH’ iti kftaRatvaM kecit sUtra eva paWanti . tezAM,
‘antaSSabdasya aNkiviDiRatvezu upasargatvaM vaktavyam’ (vA. 1-4-65) ityuktyEva
sidDaM Ratvam-iti BAvaH .
5. ‘agArEkadeSe praGaRaH praGARaSca’ (3-3-79) iti nipAtanAt sADuH . bAhya-
prakozWake'linde vA vAcye prapUrvakAdDanteH appratyaye prakfteH GanAdeSaH ‘praGARaH’
ityatra dIrGaH, RatvaM ca nipAtanalaByAni . ‘praGaRaH’ ityatra tu ‘hanteratpUrvasya’
(8-4-22) iti RatvaM sidDameva .
6. ut upari yasya niDAya anyat kAzWAdikaM takzyate tasmin = atyADAne vivakzite
‘udGano'tyADAnam’ (3-3-80) iti nipAtanAt pUrvavat GanAdeSAdikam .
7. apa hanyate iti ‘apaGano'Ngam’ (3-3-81) iti nipAtanAt sADuH .
8. ayaH hanyate yena saH ayoGanaH kUwaH . vihanyate yena saH viGanaH = samIkaraRasA-
Danam . druH hanyate yena saH druGanaH = kuWArAdiH . ‘karaRe'yovidruzu’ (3-3-82)
iti hano'ppratyaye GanAdeSaH . ‘druGaRaH’ iti kecit . tadAnIm, ‘pUrvapadAt
saMjYAyAmagaH’ (8-4-3) iti, arIhaRAdizu (4-2-80) ‘druGaRaH’ iti pAWAdvA
Ratvamatreti jYeyam .
9. stambaSabda upapade karaRe hanaH kapratyayaH; ap ca . ‘stambe ka ca’ (3-3-83) iti
kapratyaye stambaGnaH . appratyaye tu stambaGanaH iti . dAtrAdikamevamucyate—yena
stambaH tfRaviSezo hanyate . vistarastu mADavIye drazwavyaH .
10. ‘parO GaH’ (3-3-84) iti parAvupapade karaRe hanterappratyayaH, GaSca prakfteH
sarvAdeSaH . pari hanyate iti pariGaH = argalam . ‘pareSca GANkayoH’
(8-2-22) iti latvavikalpaH . tena paliGaH ityapi .
11. ‘pratiGaH’ iti bAhulakAt-ityAtreyaH—iti mADavaH . pratiGaH kopaH .
‘anyeByo'pi—’ (3-2-101) iti qapratyaye nyaqkvAditvAt kutvamiti’
BAnudIkzitaH .
1. upaGnaH = pratyAsannaH ‘upaGna ASraye’ (3-3-85) iti nipAtanAt hanterappratyaye
upaDAlopaH . parvatenopahanyate = gamyate iti parvatopaGnaH . atra DAtoH gatyarTakatvam .
2. samudByAM parasya hanteH appratyaye saMGe praSaMsAyAM ca gamyamAne sati ‘saMGodDO gaRa-
praSaMsayoH’ (3-3-86) iti nipAtanAt Gatvam . saMhananaM saMGaH = prARisamudAyaH .
BAve'p . anyatra saMGAtaH . udDanyate = utkfzwatayA jYAyata iti gatyarTAnAM
jYAnArTatvAt udGaH = praSastaH, karmaRyaR . anyatra udGAtaH .
3. saMpUrvakAt asmAt GaYi GatvatatvayoH saMGAtaSabdaH sADuH . Ga-GaYoH pratyayayorapa-
vAdo'treti manvAna AtreyaH ‘hantyarTASca’ (ga. sU. curAdiH) iti curAdipAWAt,
RijantAt saMGAtaSabdanizpattimAheti mADavaH .
4. hantIti hetiH . hanyate'neneti vA ‘UtiyUtijUtisAtiheti—’ (3-3-97) iti
nipAtanAt nalope, prakftyakArasyekAre ca hetiH iti mADavaH .
5. ‘niGo nimitam’ (3-3-87) iti nipAtanAt nipUrvakAdasmAt appratyaye sADuH .
nimitam = samantAt mitam, samArohapariRAhamityarTaH . nirviSezaM hanyante iti
niGAH vfkzAH, SAlayaSca .
6. niGnaH AyattaH, aDInaH . nipUrvakAdasmAt, bAhulakAt, ‘GaYarTe kaviDAnam—’
(vA. 3-3-58) iti vA kapratyayaH .
7. ‘samUlAkftajIvezu han—’ (3-4-36) iti yaTAsaMKyaM samUle upapade Ramul .
‘kazAdizu yaTAviDi—’ (3-4-46) iti vacanAt Ramulprayojakasyeva hanteranu
prayogaH . ‘kfnmejantaH’ (1-1-39) Ramulantamavyayam iti .
8. ‘karaRe hanaH’ (3-4-37) iti Ramul . pARinA hantItyarTaH . kazAditvAt
(3-4-46) pUrvaprayuktasyEvAnuprayogaH .
9. ‘hiMsArTAnAM ca samAnakarmakARAm’ (3-4-48) iti Ramul .
10. ‘hanteratpUrvasya’ (8-4-22) iti Ratvam .

(1993) “hamma gatO” (I-BvAdiH-467. saka. sew. para.)
hammatiH-DAtvarTanirdeSe ikpratyayaH . gatyarTAnAM jYAnArTatvAt ahammatiH = ajYAnam .
sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakmarativat (268) boDyAni .

(1994) “haya gatO” (I-BvAdiH…saka. sew. para.)
‘BaktiSabdayoH ityeke’ iti DAtukAvyavyAKyA (1-66) . hayati = viSezeRa
tvarayA gacCatIti hayaH = aSvaH . pacAdyac . gOrAditvAt (4-1-4) NIzi hayI
baqavA . kvipi-valilope tuki hat . sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakAyativat
(263) boDyAni .

(1995) “harya gatikAntyoH” (I-BvAdiH-514. saka. sew. para.)
haryA-striyAmakArapratyayaH . haryataH-yajYaH . ORAdike (da. u. 6-14) 'tacpratyaye
sidDam . sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikagarhativat (385) boDyAni .

(1996) “hala vileKane” (I-BvAdiH-837. saka. sew. para.) jvalAdiH .
vileKan = karzaRam . hAlaH-jvalityAditvAt kartari RapratyayaH . samyak
liKan yassa ucyate . saMjYAyAM Gapratyaye halaH = sIraH . hAlikaH-halaM vahati
yaH saH . haliH-ORAdika inpratyaye sidDam . halAnAM samUhaH-halyA .
sarvARItarARi rUpARi BOvAdikacalativat (510) boDyAni .

(1997) “hase hasane” (I-BvAdiH-721. aka. sew. para.)
1 vyatihasan-ntI, 2 hasaH-hAsaH, prahAsaH, 3 vyAvahAsI, 4 hastaH, hastraH, iti viSeza-
rUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi sarvARi kaKa (141) DAtuvat boDyAni .
1. ‘pratizeDe hasAdInAmupasaMKyAnam’ (vA. 1-3-15) iti karmavyatIhAratvaprayuktA-
tmanepadanizeDAt parasmEpadaM SatA .
2. anupasfzwAdasmAt pakze ‘svanahasorvA’ (3-3-62) iti ap . pakze hAsaH .
sopasfzwAt tu ‘prahAsaH’ iti .
3. ‘karmavyatihAre Rac striyAm’ (3-3-43) iti Rac striyAm . ‘RacastriyAmaY’
(5-4-14) iti aY . NIp . vyAvahAsI = parasparaM hAsa ityarTaH . strItvaM
svABAvyAt .
4. ‘hasimf—’ (da. u. 6-7) ityAdinA tanpratyayaH . ‘titutra—’ (7-2-9) iti
iRnizeDaH . hastaH = karaH, etannAmako nakzatraviSezo vA .

(1998) “o hAk tyAge” (III. juhotyAdiH-1090. saka. ani. para.)
‘gatO tyAge yaTAsaMKyaM jihIte ca jahAti ca .’ (Slo. 11.) iti devaH . [Page1413+ 30] 1 hitvA, 2 hInaH-sArTAt hInaH, hInavAn, 3 vihAya, 4 jahat, 5 hAyanAH-brIhayaH, 6 hAniH, 7 SarDaM-jahAH-mAzAH 8 pUrvApahARA-aparApahARA, samprahARA, 9 jahakaH, 10 ahaH, 11 kalahaH, 12 nihAkA iti viSezaH . sAmAnyarUpARi, jOhotyAdika-
dadAtivat (830) boDyAni . [Page1414+ 28]
1. ‘jahAteSca ktvi’ (7-4-43) iti ‘hi’ iti prakfterAdeSaH .
2. ‘GumAsTAgApAjahAtisAM hali’ (6-4-66) iti DAtvAkArasya IkAraH . odittvAt
nizWAnatvam . ‘sArTAt hInaH’ ityatra ‘apAdAne cAhayIruhoH’ (5-4-55) iti
paYcammAstasilnizeDaH . ‘mantro hInaH svarato varRato vA’ (pARinIyaSikzA)
ityatra tu AdyAditvAt (vA. 5-4-44) tasipratyaya iti kEyawaH (paspaSAyAm) .
vistarastu mADavIyAdizu drazwavyaH .
3. ‘na lyapi’ (6-4-69) iti IkAranizeDaH .
4. Satari, ‘SlO’ (6-1-10) iti dvirvacanam . DAtoH kittvAt aByAse ‘dIrGo-
'kitaH’ (7-4-83) iti dIrGanizeDa iti kecit—iti kzIrataraNgiRI;
tanna . tatra sUtre ‘akitaH’ iti na DAtukakAro vivakzitaH; kiMtu pratyayasya
kittvamevetyAstAM tAvat . ‘nAByastAcCatuH’ (7-1-78) iti numnizeDaH .
5. ‘haSca vrIhikAlayoH’ (3-2-148) iti Ryuw . jahAti udakamiti hAyanaH
saMvatsarasADyo vrIhiviSezaH . jahAti jIrRamiti hAyano = vatsaraH .
6. ‘glAjyAhAByo niH’ (vA. 3-3-95) iti nipratyayaH . ItvaM na . kecittu
‘hIniH’ ityeva vadanti .
7. SarDaM jahAti hApayatIti vA SarDajahAH = mAzAH . SarDo'pAnaSabdaH . ‘vAtaSunI-
tilaSarDezu ajaDewjahAtInAm—’ (vA. 3-2-28) ityupasaMKyAnAt KaS .
SittvAt Sap . tasya SluH . ‘SlO’ (6-1-10) iti dvirvacanam . ‘SnAByastayoH—’
(6-4-112) ityAkAralopaH . pUrvapadasya ‘arurdvizadajantasya—’ (6-3-67)
iti mum .
8. pUrvAn aparAMSca jahAtItyarTaH . bAhulakAt kartari lyuw . ajAdi (4-1-4) pAWAt
wAp . Ratvam . ‘samprahARA’ ityapi ajAdizu paWantItyAtreyAdimatamiti
mADavaH .
9. jahAtIti jahakaH tyAgI, kAlapuruzaSca . ‘jahAterdve ca’ (da. u. 3-6) iti
kvun, dvitvaM ca .
10. ‘naYi jahAteH’ (da. u. 6-52) iti kaninpratyaye AkAralopaH . ahaH = dinam .
11. ‘kalaM jahAtIti kalahaH . ‘supi—’ (3-2-5) iti kapratyayaH . AkAralopaH .’
iti kzIrasvAmI .
12. ‘nO haH’ (da. u. 3-22) iti kan . nihAkA goDA .

(1999) “o hAN gatO” (III-juhotyAdiH-1089. saka. aniw. Atma.)
‘gatO tyAge yaTAsaMKyaM jihIte ca jahAti ca .’ (Slo. 11) iti devaH .
hAyakaH-yikA, hApakaH-pikA, jihAsakaH-sikA, jAhAyakaH yikA;
hAnaH-hAnavAn, hAyanaH, hAniH ityAdIni rUpARi jOhotyAdikadadAtivat

(2000) “hi gatO vfdDO ca” (V-svAdiH-1257. saka-aka. ani. para.)
hAyakaH-yikA, hAyakaH-yikA, 1 jiGIzakaH-zikA, 2 jeGIyakaH-yikA;
ityAdIni rUpARi sarvARi piDAtuvat (991) boDyAni . 3 prahiRvan-tI, 4 praji-
GAyayizan-ntI, 5 sahitam-saMhitam, saMhitA, 6 hayaH-hayI, 7 hetiH, 8 hetuH, iti
viSezarUpARi .
1. sani ‘ajJanagamAM sani’ (6-4-16) iti dIrGaH . ‘heracaNi’ (7-3-56)
iti aByAsAduttarasya kutvena GakAraH . evaM sannante'tra DAtO sarvatra boDyam .
2. yaNante'pi ‘heracaNi’ (7-3-56) iti kutvaM boDyam .
3. Satari, svAditvAt SnupratyayaH, guRanizeDaH . ‘hinumInA’ (8-4-15) iti
Ratvam .
4. RyaDikasyApi ‘heracaNi’ (7-3-56) iti kutvam . atra RijantAt san .
tadantAt SatA .
5. sampUrvakAt asmAt nizWAyAm ‘samo vA hitatayoH’ (vA. 6-1-144) iti
samo makArasya lopavikalpaH . ‘saMhitA’ iti tu ‘kticktO ca saMjYAyAm’
(3-3-74) iti ktAntaH vedasaMhitAvAcikA .
6. pacAdyaci hayaH = aSvaH . atiSayena gacCatItyarTaH . hayI iti tu gOrAdiNIzantaH .
7. ‘UtiyUtijUtisAtihetikIrtayaSca’ (3-3-97) iti nipAtanAt ktini prakfterguRaH .
hetiH = AyuDam .
8. ORAdike (da. u. 1-125) tunpratyaye rUpam . hetuH = kAraRam .

(2001) “hikka avyakte Sabde” (I-BvAdiH-861. aka. sew. uBa.)
BOvAdikakaqqativat (156) sarvARi rUpARi boDyAni . 9 hikkA . [Page1415+ 27]
9. ‘guroSca halaH’ (3-3-103) iti appratyayaH striyAm . hikkA = vAyoH balAtkAreRa
muKAt nissAraRam, yasyAH BAzAyAm ‘vikkal’ iti nAma .

kilativat (193) boDyAni .

kvAcitko'yaM pAWo DAtukoSezu . sarvARyapi rUpARi cOrAdikacitrayativat

(2007) “hisi hiMsAyAm” (VII-ruDAdiH-1456. saka. sew. para.)
1 hiMsakaH, 2 hiMsraH, 3 hiMsA, 4 hiMsan-tI, 5 siMhaH iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnya-
rUpARi kuMSayativat (232) boDyAni . [Page1416+ 29]
1. ‘nindahiMsa—’ (3-2-146) iti tAcCIliko vuY . hiMsakaH = krUraH .
2. ‘namikampismyajasakamahiMsadIpo raH’ (3-2-167) iti tAcCIliko rapratyayaH .
‘neq vaSi kfti’ (7-2-8) itIRnizeDaH .
3. ‘guroSca halaH’ (3-3-103) iti striyAmakArapratyayaH .
4. Satari ‘ruDAdiByaH—’ (3-1-78) iti Snam vikaraRapratyayaH . ‘SnasorallopaH’
(6-4-111) iti akAralopaH . ‘SnAnnalopaH’ (6-4-23) iti pratyayanakAralopaH .
idittvAt num tu sarvatra SrUyata eva . sarvatra prayogezu idittvaprayuktanumaH ‘naScApadA-
ntasya Jali’ (8-3-24) ityanusvAraH .
5. pacAdyaci hinastIti siMhaH . ‘siMho varRaviparyayAt’ ityukteH pfzodarAditvAt
(6-3-109) varRayorviparyayaH .

(2008) “hisi hiMsAyAm” (X-curAdiH-1830. saka. sew. uBa.)
ADfzIyaH .
idittvAdevAsya Rijvikalpe sidDe yujAdizu (curAdO) pAWaH cintyaprayojana iti
mADavAdayaH . rUpARi sarvARyapi kuMSayativat (232) UhyAni .

(2009) “hu dAnAdanayoH”
(III-juhotyAdiH-1083. saka. aniw. para.)
‘dAnAdAnayoH’ ityeke . dAnamatra ‘codita ADAre haviHprakzepaH’ iti
mADavaH . ‘jIva’ DAtO prARasyeva atrApi dAne havizo antarBAvAt akarmakatvaM
kecidaNgIcakruH . ‘tftIyA ca hoSCandasi’ (2-3-3) ityatra BAzye tu ‘juhotiH
prakzepe vartate’ ityuktam . ‘agnizu hUyamAnezu’ ityAdizu prIRAnArTakatvamapi
BAzyasammatam . 1 hotA, kzIrahotA, 2 juhvad brAhmaRaH, 3 juhUH, 4 hAvyam, 5 homaH, 6 hotram-agnihotram, hotrA, 7 haviH iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi
jOhotyAdikakiDAtuvat (189) boDyAni .
1. ‘ftvikzu cAnupasargasya’ (vA. 3-2-135) iti tAcCIlikastfn . ‘aptfn—’
(6-4-11) ityAdinA sarvanAmasTAne dIrGaH . hotA = ftvigviSezaH . kzIrahotA
iti tu yAjakAditvAt (2-2-9) samAse sADuH .
2. Satari, ‘juhotyAdiByaH—’ (2-4-75) iti SapaH SluH . ‘SlO’ (6-1-10)
iti dvirvacanam . ‘huSnuvoH sArvaDAtuke’ (6-4-87) ityajAdikNitpratyayatve SatuH
atrApi yaR . ‘nAByastAcCatuH’ (7-1-78) iti numnizeDaH .
3. ‘dyutigamijuhotInAM dve ca’ (vA. 3-2-168) iti karaRe kvip, dvitvaM ca .
juhnatyanayeti juhUH-sruk .
4. ‘orAvaSyake’ (3-1-125) iti Ryat . avaSyaM hotavyaM yat devArhameva haviH,
taducyate hAvyamiti . ajantatvalakzaRayato'pavAdaH .
5. ORAdike (da. u. 7-26) manpratyaye homaH = agnO pUjitasya dravyasya prakzepaH .
6. ‘huyAmA—’ (da. u. 8-84) iti tranpratyayaH . ftvigvAcako hotrASabdastu
svaBAvAt strIliNgaH iti ‘hotrAByaSCaH’ (5-1-135) ityatra padamaYjarI .
7. ORAdike isipratyaye rUpam . hUyate iti haviH = devatoddeSena mantrasaMskftaM daDipaya-
AjyAdikaM dravyam .

(2010) “huqi varaRe” (I-BvAdiH-269. saka. sew. Atma.)
varaRam-svIkAraH . ‘haraRam’ iti mEtreyaH . huRqI = DanaprakzepasTAnam . [Page1417+ 27]
huRqikA = mudrA . BOvAdikakuRWativat (209) rUpARyUhyAni .
‘BvAdAveva dramiqAH ‘huqi saNGAte’ iti paWanti, AryAstu na paWanti;’ iti
kASyapamatapradarSanapUrvakaM mADavIye pratipAditam .

(2011) “huqf gatO” (I-BvAdiH-352. saka. sew. para.)
‘hoqatIti gatO hoqerhoqate'nAdare punaH .’ (Slo. 86) iti devaH .
BOvAdikatoqativat (738) sarvARyapi rUpARyUhyAni .

(2012) “hurCA kOwilye” (I-BvAdiH-211. saka. sew. para.)
‘kOwilyam = apasAraRam’ iti mEtreyaH . hUrCA, 1 hUH-hurO-huraH, 2 hUrRaH-
hUrRavAn, hUrRamanena-hUrCitamanena, iti viSezaH . sAmAnyarUpARi kUjativat
(239) boDyAni .
1. kvipi ‘rAllopaH’ (6-4-21) iti CakArasya lopaH . ‘rvorupaDAyAH—’ (8-2-70)
iti dIrGaH . sarvatra prayoge padAntatvanibanDanaH, upaDAdIrGo'sya drazwavyaH .
2. nizWAyAm, ‘AditaSca’ (7-2-16) itIRnizeDe, rAllope, ‘radAByAM—’ (8-2-42)
iti nizWAnatvam . Ratvam . BAve, AdikarmaRi ca DAtoriRnizeDavikalpaH .

(2013) “hula gatO” (I-BvAdiH-844. saka. sew. para.)
jvalAdiH .
‘hiMsAsaMvaraRayoSca’ iti mEtreyaH . holaH . jvalityAditvAt (3-1-140)
kartari RapratyayaH . gOrAdipAWAt, saMjYAyAM GaYantAt striyAM NIzi-holI = Ottara-
krIqAviSezaH . BOvAdikakolativat (231) itararUpARyUhyAni .

(2014) “hUqf gatO” (I-BvAdiH-353. saka. sew. para.)
BOvAdikatoqativat (738) sarvARi rUpARyUhyAni .

(2015) “hf prasahyaharaRe”
(III-juhotyAdiH-1097. saka. ani. para.)
‘prasahyahftyAM haraRe jiharti harate haret ..’ (Slo. 27) iti devaH .
ayaM CAndasaH iti ‘artipipartyoSca’ (7-4-77) ityatra BAzye spazwam . ‘ayaM sruvo
aBijiharti homAn’ (ApastambaSrOtasUtre 4-7-2) . kAtantrIyAstu BAzAyAmapi
DAtumamuM paWanti . sarvARyapi rUpARi jOhotyAdikagarati (420) vat boDyAni .

(2016) “hfY haraRe” (I-BvAdiH-899. saka. ani. uBa.)
‘prasahyahftyAM haraRe jiharti harate haret ..’ (Slo. 27) iti devaH .
haraRam = prApaRam, svIkAraH, stEnyam, nASanaM ca . 1 hArayan BAraM devadattaM yajYadatto gacCati, 2 saMpraharamARA rAjAnaH, ‘tataH 3 samprahari-
zyantO dfzwvA karRaDanaYjayO’, pEtfkamaSvAH 4 anuharamARAH, mAtfkaM gAvo'nuhara-
mARAH, Satasya 5 vyavaharan-ntI, 6 pratihartA, 7 harizyan-ntI, harizyamARaH, 8 avahAraH, 9 aMSaharaH, 10 BArahAraH, 11 kavacaharaH, 12 puzpAharaH, [Page1419+ 33] 1 dftihariH-nATaharirvA paSuH, 2 saMhAraH, avahAraH, 3 hAraH, 4 hArA, 5 AhAraH, 6 haraH-paSyatoharaH, 7 hariH-hariRI, haritaH, hfdayam, harimARaH, harImA,
prahiH, hareRuH, iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi BOvAdikaBarativat
(1170) boDyAni .
1. ‘hfkroranyatarasyAm’ (1-4-53) iti aRO kartuH RO karmasaMjYA; tena devadattaSabdAt
dvitIyA .
2. haraterhiMsArTatve'pi ‘na gatirhisArTeByaH’ (1-3-15) iti AtmanepadanizeDo na Bavati .
‘hfvahyorapratizeDaH’ (vA. 1-3-15) iti vacanAt .
3. atra yudDABimuKyamAtramarTaH, na tu karmavyatIhAraH-tena parasmEpadam . vistarastvatra
mADavIye drazwavyaH .
4. ‘haratergatatAcCIlye’ (vA. 1-3-21) iti Atmanepadam . gataM = prakAraH, tasya
svaBAvaH tAcCIlyam . pitfguRamaSvAH, mAtfguRaM gAvaSca laBante iti vAkyArTaH .
‘gatitAcCIlye’ iti nyAsakArakzIrasvAminO . gatiH = gamanam . arTAt
vegAdikaM gfhyate .
5. karmaRaH ‘vyavahfpaRoH samarTayoH’ (2-3-57) iti Seze zazWI ‘Satasya’ iti .
6. ‘tfnviDO ftvikzu cAnupasargasya’ (vA. 3-2-135) iti vacanAt atra ca sopasarga-
tvAt ‘RvultfcO’ (3-1-133) iti tfc . pratihartA = ftvigviSezaH .
7. DAtoraniwtve'pi sye ‘fdDanoH sye’ (7-2-70) itIqAgamaH .
8. avaharatIti avahAraH = grAhaH, graho vA . ‘SyAdvyaDASrusaMsravatIRavasAvahf—’
(3-1-141) iti kartari RapratyayaH .
9. aMSaM haratIti aMSaharaH . ‘harateranudyamane'c’ (3-2-9) iti acpratyayaH .
anudyamanam = anupekzaRam, yasya haraRena SArIraka udyamaH = prayatno na Bavati
taducyate .
10. SArIraka udyame vivakzite tu ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) iti atra aRpratyayaH .
upapadasamAsaH . vfdDiH .
11. ‘vayasi ca’ (3-2-10) iti karmopapadAdasmAt vayasi gamye harateracpratyayaH .
kavacaharaH = kavacaDAraRayogyavayoviSizwa ityarTaH .
12. ANupasfzwAt, karmopapadAt asmAt tAcCIlye gamye ‘ANi tAcCIlye’
(3-2-11) iti ac . puzpAharaH = yaH puzpavikrayAdiBiH, mAlAgraTanAdiBiSca
puzpEkajIvI, sa ucyate . evaM tfRAharaH, darBAharaH, SAkAharaH ityAdyapyu-
dAhAryam .
1. dftiSabde nATaSabde ca karmaBUte upapade sati paSO viSezye, ‘haraterdftinATayoH
paSO’ (3-2-25) itInpratyayaH . dftiM = carmaBastrikAM haratIti dftihariH = SvA .
nATaM = nAsArajjuM haratIti nATahariH = paSuH .
2. saMhriyante'nena, atra iti vA saMhAraH = yudDam, pralayaSca . ‘aDyAyanyAyodyAva-
saMhArASca’ (3-3-122) iti nipAtanAt GaY . sUtre cakArasyAnuktasamuccAyArTa-
katvAt avahAraH ityapIti kASikA . avahAraH = coraH . GApavAdo GaY .
upasargeRa DAtorarTAH Bidyante; taTAcoktaM pUrvEH--
“upasargeRa DAtvarTo balAdanyatra nIyate .
vihArAhArasaMhAraprahAraparihAravat ..” iti .
3. ‘akartari ca kArake saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-19) iti GaY . hriyate paSyatAM mano'neneti
hAraH = muktAdisaraH .
4. BidAdi (3-3-104) pAWAt striyAmaNi, ‘fdfSo'Ni—’ (7-4-16) iti guRe,
gaRapAWAdeva dIrGe ca rUpam . haraRaM hArA .
5. Ahriyante'smAt rasAH iti AhAraH Bojanam . evam aByavahAraH ityapi .
atra ‘akartari ca—’ (3-3-19) iti GaY .
6. harati pApAdikamiti haraH = SivaH . pacAdyac . praRatArti haratIti praRatArtiharaH .
atra ‘harateranudyamane—’ (3-2-9) iti ac . paSyantaM anAdftya haratIti
paSyatoharaH-kasyacitsaMjYA . ‘zazWI cAnAdare’ (2-3-38) iti zazWI . ‘zazWyA
AkroSe’ (6-3-21) iti zazWyA aluk .
7. harati natAnAM kleSAdIn iti hariH = vizRuH . atra ‘haraterdftinATayoH paSO’
(3-2-25) ityatra yogaviBAgena inpratyayaH . kecit tu yogaviBAge BAzyAdi-
pramARABAvAt ORAdike inpratyaye sADayanti .

(2017) “hfza tuzwO” (IV-divAdiH-1229. aka. sew. para.)
‘…kramato'lIke tuzwO harzati hfzyati .’ (Slo. 176) iti devaH .

ca dantAH sUcayantIti BAvaH .

yam . ‘lomAni aNgajAni, keSASca’ iti vfttiH . tuzwiM lomAni sUcayantItyarTaH .
1. RijantAt ORAdike itnucpratyaye rUpamevam .

‘akftsArvaDAtukayoH—’ (7-4-25) iti dIrGaH .

“atra sparDA DAtvarTasya Sabdanasya hetutayA vizayaH” iti kASikAdizu
spazwam .
1. ‘jvalahvala—’ (ga. sU. BvAdiH) ityAdinA Rijante mittvavikalpaH . sopasfzwAt tu
nityaM mittvam .
1. ‘sarvatra prasAraRiByo qaH’ (vA. 3-2-48) iti vacanAt kartari Adantatvala-
kzaRakapratyasyApavAdo qapratyayaH . qittvAt wilopaH . BAzye tu ‘Ato'nupasarge
kaH’ (3-2-3) ityatra kapratyaye samprasAraRe, yaRi AhvaH ityapIti sADitam .
2. yagantAcCAnaci ‘vacisvapiyajAdInAM kiti’ (6-1-15) iti samprasAraRe ‘halaH’
(6-4-2) iti dIrGe ca rUpam . evaM ktvA-lyap-ktAdizvapi prakriyohyA .
3. ‘hvAvAmaSca’ (3-2-2) iti karmaRyupapade'RpratyayaH . AdantalakzaRakapratyayApavAdaH .

prakriyAsarvasvam .
‘bAhulakAd AhvayateH SaH puMstvaM ceti BAzate svAmI .
SittvAdAtvABAvaH, Sapi sati pararUpam—Ahvayo nAma ..’ iti .
nAmeti . ‘AhvayaH’ ityanena nAma = aBiDAnamucyata ityarTaH .
5. ‘hvaH samprasAraRaM ca nyaByupavizu’ (3-3-72) iti BAve'pUpratyaye samprasAraRA-
dikam .
6. appratyaye, ‘ANi yudDe’ (3-3-73) iti samprasAraRam . AhavaH = yudDaH .
7. ‘BAve'nupasargasya’ (3-3-75) iti samprasAraRam . ap .
8. ‘nipAnamAhAvaH’ (3-3-74) iti nipAtanAt sADuH . upakUpaM jalASaye
vivakzite BAve'ppratyaye samprasAraRavfdDI nipAtanAt . AhAvaH = yatra gAvo jalASaye
pAnArTamAhUyante sa pradeSaH .
9. ‘AtaScopasarge’ (3-3-106) ityaNi ‘Ato lopa iwi ca’ (6-4-64) ityA-
kAralopaH . AhvA nAma .
10. atra bAhulakAt striyAM ktin . ‘AtaScopasarge’ (3-3-106) ityaNo'pavAdaH .
